法律状态/事件: 期限届满 | 质押 | 权利转移

标题: Method for process system identification using neural network
摘要: The method of making the tool, for process system identification that is based on the general purpose learning capabilities of neural networks. The method can be used for a wide variety of system identification problems with little or no analytic effort. A neural network is trained using a process model to approximate a function which relates process input and output data to process parameter values. Once trained, the network can be used as a system identification tool. In principle, this approach can be used for linear or nonlinear processes, for open or closed loop identification, and for identifying any or all process parameters.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 该工具的制作方法,用于基于神经网络的通用学习能力的过程系统识别。 该方法可用于各种系统识别问题,只需很少或无需分析工作。 使用过程模型训练神经网络以逼近将过程输入和输出数据与过程参数值相关联的函数。 一旦经过训练,该网络就可以用作系统识别工具。 原则上,这种方法可用于线性或非线性过程,用于开环或闭环识别,以及用于识别任何或所有过程参数。

标题: 다수 개의 패턴 발생기를 포함하는 패턴 검사 장치
摘要: The checker includes subunits (1,3,4,5) transmitting digital video data of an object, a detector (10,11) detecting x and y axis of a picture digitized by the subunits, a pattern generator (7) comprising a memory (50) recording a caliber data (a) and a rectangular data (b) , caliber pattern gunerators (47,51), rectangular pattern generators (48,52), a selector (46) inputting the caliber data or rectangular data to the pattern generators and a beat low synthesizer (54) synthesizing the caliber pattern and rectangular pattern, and a comparator (12) comparing the digital video data and patterns from the pattrn generator.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 检查器包括传输对​​象的数字视频数据的子单元(1、3、4、5)、检测子单元数字化图片的 x 和 y 轴的检测器(10、11)、包括存储器的模式生成器(7)  (50)记录口径数据(a)和矩形数据(b),口径图案发生器(47,51),矩形图案发生器(48,52),选择器(46)输入口径数据或矩形数据到 模式发生器和低拍合成器(54)合成口径模式和矩形模式,以及比较器(12)比较来自模式发生器的数字视频数据和模式。

标题: Method and system for shadowing file system structures from multiple types of networks
摘要: A method and system for showing file system structures on a computer system that can be connected to multiple types of networks. The file shadowing mechanism automatically and transparently stores shadow copies of remote file system structures when they are accessed by a computer. The shadow copies of the file system structures are stored within a shadow database that resides within local memory of the computer. When the computer becomes disconnected from a network, shadow copies of file system structures for the network are used to service requests to access such file system structures.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种用于在可连接到多种网络的计算机系统上显示文件系统结构的方法和系统。 当计算机访问远程文件系统结构时,文件镜像机制会自动透明地存储远程文件系统结构的卷影副本。 文件系统结构的影子副本存储在驻留在计算机本地内存中的影子数据库中。 当计算机与网络断开连接时,网络文件系统结构的影子副本用于服务访问此类文件系统结构的请求。
[标]当前申请(专利权)人: 微软技术许可有限责任公司
法律状态/事件: 期限届满 | 权利转移

标题: Communication system and wireless communication terminal device used therein
摘要: A communication system is provided whereby desired information can be transmitted in accordance with conditions and the application. The communication system includes a PHS terminal and a provider system that is capable of information communication with this terminal. The PHS terminal has a voice recognition section that receives voice from a microphone and recognises the received voice signal, an input device that selects the output form of the voice signal, a conversion section that converts the recognised voice signal with the selected output form, and a transceiver that transmits the converted voice signal to the provider equipment; the converted voice signal is further transferred from the provider system to another destination wireless communication terminal device. This output form includes for example "dialect", "intonation/imitated voice of a celebrity etc." or "modulation". Conversion filters convert the voice signal in accordance with these.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 提供了一种通信系统,由此可以根据条件和应用来发送期望的信息。 通信系统包括PHS终端和能够与该终端进行信息通信的提供商系统。  PHS终端具有从麦克风接收语音并识别接收到的语音信号的语音识别部分、选择语音信号的输出形式的输入装置、将识别的语音信号转换为所选择的输出形式的转换部分,以及 将转换后的语音信号发送到提供商设备的收发器; 转换后的语音信号进一步从提供商系统传送到另一个目的地无线通信终端设备。 该输出形式包括例如“方言”、“名人的语调/模仿声音等”。 或“调制”。 转换滤波器根据这些转换语音信号。

标题: Information processing element
摘要: An information processing element for processing information with a function of neural network includes a semiconductor integrated circuit element portion comprising a plurality of neuron circuit regions constituting a neuron function among the neural network function, a molecular film element having a light-electricity function, provided on the circuit element portion, and the combination between the plurality of neurons is realized by utilizing a photoconductivity property of the molecular film element.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种用于利用神经网络功能处理信息的信息处理元件包括半导体集成电路元件部分,该半导体集成电路元件部分包括构成神经网络功能中的神经元功能的多个神经元电路区域,具有光电功能的分子膜元件,设置在 电路元件部分,多个神经元之间的结合是利用分子膜元件的光电导特性实现的。
发明人: ISODA, SATORU | HANAZATO, YOSHIO | UEYAMA, SATOSHI | KAWAKUBO, HIROAKI | TANAKA, KEN-ICHI | MAEDA, MITSUO

标题: Secondary color modification of a digital image
摘要: An ellipsoid chroma region of a chroma plane may be defined to specify a range of chromas for which a secondary chroma modification is to be applied, and to determine an output chroma for each chroma of the chroma plane based on the ellipsoid chroma region. Further, two or more different-shaped chroma regions of a chroma plane may be defined and manipulated, each chroma region specifying a range of chroma for which a secondary chroma modification is to be applied, and to determine an output chroma for each chroma of the chroma plane based on the two or more different-shaped chroma regions. Also, chroma-matching techniques may be used to define and manipulate the chroma region of a chroma plane that specifies a range of chroma for which a secondary chroma modification is to be applied, and an output chroma may be determined for each chroma of the chroma plane based on the chroma region.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 可以定义色度平面的椭圆体色度区域以指定要对其应用二次色度修正的色度范围,并基于椭圆体色度区域确定色度平面的每个色度的输出色度。 此外,可以定义和操纵色度平面的两个或更多个不同形状的色度区域,每个色度区域指定要对其应用二次色度修改的色度范围,并确定每个色度的输出色度。 基于两个或多个不同形状的色度区域的色度平面。 此外,色度匹配技术可用于定义和操纵色度平面的色度区域,该区域指定要应用二次色度修改的色度范围,并且可以为色度的每个色度确定输出色度 基于色度区域的平面。
发明人: COOPER, BRIAN C. | GONSALVES, ROBERT | PAONI, ROBERT ALAN
发明人地址: Foxborough, MA | Wellesley, MA | Nashua, NH

标题: Reading apparatus for reading a record carrier on which coded pictures have been recorded
摘要: A read device (320) for reading a record carrier (184) on which coded pictures (4TV, TV, TV/4) have been recorded. The recorded coded pictures represent pictures made up of a matrix of P rows of Q pixels (p). The dimension of the pixels in a horizontal direction is substantially equal to the dimension of the pixels in a vertical direction. A read unit (6) reads the recorded coded pictures (4TV, TV, TV/4) from the record carrier (184). The device comprises a picture converter, which preferably comprises a sample rate converter (290), for converting the read-out coded pictures into an adapted coded picture comprising P'xQ' coded pixels. The sample rate converter is arranged in a data path between the read unit (6) and a picture memory unit (321). The picture memory unit (321) supplies a coded picture representing a picture made up of pixels (p') whose ratio between the dimension in the horizontal direction and the dimension in the vertical direction is substantially equal to Q/P, P and Q being integers. The coded pictures supplied by the picture memory unit (321) are converted into a video signal suitable for a standard TV set.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种读取设备(320),用于读取已记录编码图像(4TV、TV、TV/4)的记录载体(184)。 记录的编码图像表示由 P 行 Q 像素 (p) 的矩阵组成的图像。 像素在水平方向上的尺寸基本上等于像素在垂直方向上的尺寸。 读取单元(6)从记录载体(184)读取记录的编码图像(4TV、TV、TV/4)。 该设备包括图片转换器,其优选地包括采样率转换器(290),用于将读出的编码图片转换成包括PxQ编码像素的适配编码图片。 采样率转换器设置在读取单元(6)和图像存储单元(321)之间的数据路径中。 图片存储器单元(321)提供表示由像素(p)构成的图片的编码图片,所述像素(p)在水平方向上的尺寸与在垂直方向上的尺寸之比基本上等于Q/P,P和Q分别为 整数。 图片存储单元(321)提供的编码图片被转换成适合标准电视机的视频信号。

标题: Databærer med en optisk ægthedsafprøvning samt fremgangsmåde til fremstilling og afprøvning af databæreren
摘要: The present invention relates to a data carrier (identification card, bank card, credit card, etc.) in which information is provided in an inner volume area by means of a laser beam, the information being visible in the form of changes in the optical properties of the carrier material due to an irreversible change in the material caused by the laser beam and to a method for producing the data carrier and for testing it.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 本发明涉及一种数据载体(身份证、银行卡、信用卡等),其中通过激光束在内部体积区域中提供信息,该信息以光学变化的形式可见。 由于激光束引起材料的不可逆变化而导致的载体材料的特性,以及用于生产数据载体和测试它的方法。

标题: 支持動態適應反饋之基於目標的教育系統之製造系統、方法和物品
摘要: 本發明揭示一種提供基於目標的學習系統的系統，利用基於規則的專家訓練系統提供認知性的教育經歷。此系統為用戶提供一模擬的環境，該環境提供了以最佳方式理解和解決問題的商業機會。另外，還可以記錄錯誤並動態地提供矯正性的教育資料，以幫助用戶建立在商業工作中獲得成功所必備的技能。此系統利用了人工智慧引擎來驅動個性化的動態反饋，所述反饋中還具有用於模擬真實世界環境和互動的同步視頻和圖形。學習系統中還整合了多個"正確"答案，以容許個性化的學習經歷，其中通過整個系統的瀏覽過程之步調係由學員自己控制。一個健全的商業模型提供了對現實活動的支持，容許用戶體驗他們的行動和決策在真實世界所造成之影響，並使對針對學員獨特個性最佳化過的教育資料之實時決策和綜合成為必要。
摘要(译)(简体中文): 本发明揭示一种提供基于目标的学习系统的系统,利用基于规则的专家训练系统提供认知性的教育经历。 此系统为用户提供一模拟的环境,该环境提供了以最佳方式理解和解决问题的商业机会。 另外,还可以记录错误并动态地提供矫正性的教育资料,以帮助用户建立在商业工作中获得成功所必备的技能。 此系统利用了人工智慧引擎来驱动个性化的动态反馈,所述反馈中还具有用于模拟真实世界环境和互动的同步视频和图形。 学习系统中还整合了多个"正确"答案,以容许个性化的学习经历,其中通过整个系统的浏览过程之步调系由学员自己控制。 一个健全的商业模型提供了对现实活动的支持,容许用户体验他们的行动和决策在真实世界所造成之影响,并使对针对学员独特个性最佳化过的教育资料之实时决策和综合成为必要 。

标题: Device for optically scanning a record carrier
摘要: A watermark detector is disclosed to judge whether multimedia content can be copied or not. The watermark detector examines the multimedia content and outputs a signal indicating whether a watermark is present or not. A decision variable indicating to which extent the watermark is present is determined, for example, the amount of correlation between the input signal and a reference copy of the watermark to be detected. The watermark is detected if the decision variable exceeds a predetermined threshold (y2). The detector also generates a random output signal for a predetermined range of decision values between the threshold (y2) and a further threshold (y1).
摘要(译)(简体中文): 公开了一种水印检测器来判断多媒体内容是否可以被复制。 水印检测器检查多媒体内容并输出指示水印是否存在的信号。 确定指示水印存在程度的决策变量,例如,输入信号与要检测的水印的参考副本之间的相关量。 如果决策变量超过预定阈值 (y2),则检测到水印。 检测器还为阈值 (y2) 和另一个阈值 (y1) 之间的预定决策值范围生成随机输出信号。
[标]当前申请(专利权)人: 皇家飞利浦电子股份有限公司

法律状态/事件: 未缴年费 | 权利转移

标题: Method and apparatus for optical data analysis
摘要: An optical inspection device generates a plurality of measured optical data from inspection of a thin film stack. A processor evolves models of theoretical data, which are compared to the measured data, and a "best fit" solution is provided as the result. Each model of theoretical data is represented by an underlying "genotype" which is an ordered list of "genes." Each gene corresponds to a selected thin film parameter of interest. Many such individual genotypes are created thereby forming a "population" of genotypes, which are evolved through the use of a genetic algorithm. Each genotype has a fitness associated therewith based on how much the theoretical data derived therefrom differs from the measured data. Individual genotypes are selected based on fitness, then a genetic operation is performed on the selected genotypes to produce new genotypes. Multiple generations of genotypes are evolved until an acceptable solution is obtained.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种光学检查装置从薄膜叠层的检查中产生多个测量的光学数据。 处理器演化理论数据模型,将其与测量数据进行比较,并提供“最佳拟合”解决方案作为结果。 每个理论数据模型都由一个潜在的“基因型”表示,它是“基因”的有序列表。 每个基因对应于一个选定的感兴趣的薄膜参数。 创建了许多这样的个体基因型,从而形成基因型“种群”,这些基因型是通过使用遗传算法进化而来的。 每种基因型都具有与其相关的适应度,这取决于从中得出的理论数据与测量数据的差异程度。 根据适应度选择个体基因型,然后对选定的基因型进行遗传操作以产生新的基因型。 进化了多代基因型,直到获得可接受的解决方案。

标题: Method and apparatus for enhancing discrete pixel images
摘要: Pixel data representative of a discrete pixel image is processed to identify structures and non-structures in the image defined by the pixel data. The structures and non-structures are processed in different manners. The structures are identified by computing gradient information on each pixel and by comparing the gradient information to a gradient threshold, and by comparing gradient directions for adjacent pixels to one another. The edges defining the structures are binary rank order filtered. The structures are orientation smoothed and sharpened. The non-structures are homogenization smoothed and original texture is blended back into non-structural regions.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 处理代表离散像素图像的像素数据以识别由像素数据定义的图像中的结构和非结构。 结构和非结构以不同的方式处理。 通过计算每个像素的梯度信息并将梯度信息与梯度阈值进行比较,并通过将相邻像素的梯度方向相互比较来识别结构。 定义结构的边缘是二进制排序过滤的。 结构被定向平滑和锐化。 非结构被均匀化平滑,原始纹理被混合回非结构区域。

标题: Debriefing systems and methods for retrieving and presenting multiple datastreams with time indication marks in time synchronism
摘要: Event debriefing systems and methods are provided for recording a plurality of datastreams related to an event. An observer of the event may create time indication marks that facilitate recalling, during debriefing, what transpired at any particular point in time during the event. The recorded datastreams may be retrieved and presented beginning at marked time indications and continued chronologically thereafter in time synchronism.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 提供了用于记录与事件相关的多个数据流的事件汇报系统和方法。 事件的观察者可以创建时间指示标记,以便在汇报期间回忆事件期间任何特定时间点发生的事情。 记录的数据流可以在标记的时间指示处开始检索和呈现,然后在时间同步中按时间顺序继续。
法律状态/事件: 期限届满 | 权利转移

标题: Identification system
摘要: L'invention concerne un syst??me d'identification.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 本发明涉及一种识别系统。

标题: Methods, systems and computer program products for analyzing information in forms using cell adjacency relationships
摘要: Information in the form is analyzed based on adjacency relationships among cells in the forms. By using adjacency relationships, a format may be provided for forms which are divided into cells by separators such as lines, notwithstanding that the positions and sizes of the cells may change, as long as their order remains unchanged. In particular, cells are extracted from the image data of a form. Adjacency relationships among the extracted cells are determined. The determined adjacency relationships are compared with a set of adjacency relationships are compared with a set of adjacency relationships in order to identify the extracted cells. Information contained in the form is then recognized based upon the identified extracted cells. In particular, the information contained in the form is recognized, based upon the identified cell in which the information is contained.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 根据表格中单元格之间的邻接关系分析表格中的信息。 通过使用邻接关系,可以为通过诸如线之类的分隔符划分为单元格的表格提供格式,尽管单元格的位置和大小可以改变,只要它们的顺序保持不变。 特别是,从表格的图像数据中提取单元格。 确定提取的单元格之间的邻接关系。 将确定的邻接关系与一组邻接关系与一组邻接关系进行比较,以便识别提取的单元格。 然后根据所识别的提取单元格识别表单中包含的信息。 具体而言,基于所识别的包含信息的单元格来识别表单中包含的信息。

标题: Print inspecting method and apparatus
摘要: PCT No. PCT/JP82/00285 Sec. 371 Date Mar. 22, 1983 Sec. 102(e) Date Mar. 22, 1983 PCT Filed Jul. 23, 1982 PCT Pub. No. WO83/00557 PCT Pub. Date Feb. 17, 1983.This invention relates to a technique for inspecting picture patterns on prints which are being run in a rotary press or the like, and more particularly to a method in which reference data read out of a reference print is written in a memory, and inspection data read out of a print under inspection is compared with the reference data for every picture element for instance to determine whether or not the print is acceptable, and an apparatus for practicing the method. The specific feature of the invention resides in that (1) in reading the above-described data a print running speed or the position of a picture pattern in the direction of width is detected to rewrite the reference data, (2) in data comparison, the comparison level is optionally set up, and (3) the data comparison is carried out not only for every picture element, but also for the sum of picture elements over the entire picture pattern and for the sum of picture elements arranged linearly in the print running direction.
摘要(译)(简体中文): PCT 编号 PCT/JP82/00285 秒。  371 日期 1983 年 3 月 22 日 102(e) 日期 1983 年 3 月 22 日 PCT 1982 年 7 月 23 日提交 PCT Pub. 编号 WO83/00557 PCT 公开。 日期 1983 年 2 月 17 日。本发明涉及检查在轮转印刷机或类似设备中运行的印刷品上的图片图案的技术,更具体地说,涉及将从参考印刷品中读出的参考数据写入 存储器,以及从被检查的印刷品中读出的检查数据与例如每个像素的参考数据进行比较以确定印刷品是否可接受,以及用于实施该方法的设备。 本发明的具体特征在于(1)在读取上述数据时,检测打印运行速度或图像图案在宽度方向上的位置以重写参考数据,(2)在数据比较中, 比较级别可选设置, (3) 数据比较不仅针对每个像素,还针对整个图片图案上的像素总和以及打印中线性排列的像素总和进行 运行方向。

标题: Speech recognition apparatus capable of recognizing signals of sounds other than spoken words and displaying the same for viewing
摘要: A speech recognition apparatus includes a sound pickup, a standard feature storage device, a comparing device, a display pattern storing device, and a display. The apparatus can display non-speech sounds either as a message or as an image, and is especially useful for hearing-impaired individuals. For example, if a fire engine siren is detected, the display can show a picture of a fire engine, or can display the message "siren is sounding".
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种语音识别装置,包括拾音器、标准特征存储装置、比较装置、显示模式存储装置和显示器。 该装置可以将非语音声音显示为消息或图像,对听力受损的人特别有用。 例如,如果检测到消防车警报器,显示器可以显示消防车的图片,或者可以显示消息“警报器正在响起”。
法律状态/事件: 期限届满 | 权利转移

标题: 非線形演算ユニットおよびそれによる情報処理装置
摘要:
【目的】 神経回路網全体の動作を変えることなく、各神経に相当するユニットを簡素化し、演算を高速に行うこと。
【構成】 1つ以上の入力があり、その各入力に非線形の関数g(uj)の演算を施す非線形関数演算手段11a〜11nと、それらの非線形関数演算手段の演算の結果得られた各々の関数値に対しそれぞれ重み値(wji)を乗ずる乗算手段図1の2a〜2nと、その各々の乗算手段により得られた各々の結果の和を求め、さらに閾値を加算する加算手段13とを備えている。
摘要(译)(简体中文):
[目的] 简化每条神经对应的单元,在不改变整个神经网络运行的情况下进行高速计算。 
 【构造】有一个或多个输入,每个输入都有一个非线性函数g(u j ), 和权值 (w ji )和加法装置13,用于获得由各个乘法装置获得的结果的总和并加上阈值。

标题: Automatic conversation inspecting system using instantaneous invariant
摘要: 1532944 Verification NCR CORP 21 Feb 1977 [1 March 1976] 07151/77 Heading G4R The identity of a person is verified from an electrical signal representing a reference utterance by (1) sampling the electrical signal, (2) computing a plurality of moment variants from the samples to form an identifier moment invariant vector, (3) comparing the vector with a plurality of stored imposter moment invariant vectors derived in a similar manner from other people to provide a plurality of weighting factors forming a weighting vector which maximizes the difference between the identifier and imposter vectors. As described i (= 23) moment invariants MI are computed for each person k according to the formula where y i  = value of the sampled signal at time x i , N = number of samples and p+q#6 (p, q integers). For a plurality n of utterances by the same individual k, average moment invariants for  are calculated and the difference E kj  between each reference vector and the average computed i.e.  where for The difference E hr  between each stored vector belonging to a particular class r (r = 1 .... m) of people and the average is also computed, i.e. where C ik  is the weight for the ith component of the vector so that the C ik  coefficients form the weight vector for person k and are selected to minimize E kj  and maximize E hr . This is effected by using a separation function:- where and a ih  and a ik  are standard deviations of A ijk , B trh . The value S ik  = 0 is selected if B ih  is less than A ik . An error threshold level T 1k  for the person k is computed such that the probability of an error resulting from the rejection of a correct hypothesis is equal to the probability of an error resulting from the acceptance of an incorrect hypothesis. From this a second threshold T 2k  is derived by multiplying T 1k  by a selected ratio factor. In a bank customer verification system, the computed data items relating to a customer (i.e., the moment invar iant vector, weight vector and threshold level T 1k ) are recorded on for example a magnetic credit card. When used, from the reference utterance of the person the coefficients of the moment invariant vector MI i  are computed and using the moment invariant vector and the weight vector recorded on the card an error value is computed and compared with the threshold T 2k  derived from the recorded threshold T 1k  to verify the user.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 1532944 验证 NCR CORP 1977 年 2 月 21 日 [1976 年 3 月 1 日] 07151/77 标题 G4R 通过 (1) 对电信号进行采样,(2) 计算多个矩变量,从代表参考话语的电信号中验证人的身份 从样本中形成标识符矩不变向量,(3)将该向量与以类似方式从其他人导出的多个存储的冒名顶替矩不变向量进行比较,以提供多个加权因子,形成一个加权向量,使两者之间的差异最大化 标识符和冒名顶替者向量。 如上所述,i (= 23) 个矩不变量 MI 根据公式计算每个人 k,其中 y i = 在时间 x i 处的采样信号的值,N = 样本数和 p+q#6(p,q 整数)。 对于同一个人 k 的多个 n 次话语,计算平均矩不变量 for 并计算每个参考向量与平均值之间的差异 E kj ,即,对于属于特定类别 r (r  = 1 .... m) 并计算平均值,即其中 C ik 是向量的第 i 个分量的权重,因此 C ik 系数形成人 k 的权重向量,并被选择以最小化 E  kj 和最大化 E hr 。 这是通过使用分离函数来实现的:- 其中a ih 和a ik 是A ijk 、B trh 的标准偏差。 如果B ih 小于A ik ,则选择值S ik = 0。 计算人员 k 的错误阈值水平 T 1k ,使得由拒绝正确假设导致的错误概率等于由接受不正确假设导致的错误概率。 由此,第二阈值T 2k 是通过将T 1k 乘以选定的比率因子而得出的。 在银行客户验证系统中,与客户相关的计算数据项(即矩不变量向量、权重向量和阈值水平 T 1k )记录在例如磁性信用卡上。 使用时,从人的参考话语计算矩不变向量 MI i 的系数,并使用矩不变向量和记录在卡片上的权重向量计算误差值,并与从 记录阈值 T 1k 以验证用户。
发明人: JERAAMU GOTSUDOFUMARU ADOBAANI | BURUUNO HOSEI PAGANIINI | UIRIAMU JOERU HEERU

标题: A method for comparison between a first optical signal and at least one other signal
摘要: Method for comparison between a first optical signal ( PHI 1) and at least one other signal. The invention can for instance be used for image recognition. In this application it is a problem to be able to perform parallel processing of the content of an image. This problem among others is solved in connection with the invention by illuminating a MIS-structure (11; Fig. 1) with the first optical signal ( PHI 1), which creates an optically induced change in the surface potential of the MIS-structure and by influencing the surface potential also by said at least one other signal by illuminating the MIS-structure (11; Fig. 1) with a second optical signal ( PHI 2) or by applying the signal in the form of a voltage across the structure or by providing the structure with charge in the insulator or its interfaces or by a combination of these methods and by varying at least one of all signals as a function of time.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 用于在第一光信号(PHI 1)和至少一个其他信号之间进行比较的方法。 本发明例如可以用于图像识别。 在该应用中,能够对图像内容进行并行处理是一个问题。 结合本发明,该问题通过用第一光信号(PHI1)照射MIS结构(11;图1)来解决,这在MIS结构的表面电势中产生光感应变化,并且 通过用第二光信号(PHI 2)照射MIS结构(11;图1)或通过在结构上施加电压形式的信号,也通过所述至少一个其他信号影响表面电势,或 通过在绝缘体或其界面中为结构提供电荷或通过这些方法的组合以及通过根据时间改变所有信号中的至少一个。

标题: Apparatus and method for disaster recovery of an operating system utilizing long file and directory names
摘要: An apparatus and method facilitates the conversion of filenames using the conventional 8.3 filename construct and long filenames. A converter is coupled to a software library which permits the running of backup applications from an 8.3 filename system. The library contains internal and external APIs which allow the 8.3 filename system to create files and directories using the long filename convention.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种装置和方法使用传统的 8.3 文件名结构和长文件名来促进文件名的转换。 转换器与允许从 8.3 文件名系统运行备份应用程序的软件库耦合。 该库包含允许 8.3 文件名系统使用长文件名约定创建文件和目录的内部和外部 API。
[标]当前申请(专利权)人: 惠普发展公司有限责任合伙企业
法律状态/事件: 期限届满 | 权利转移

标题: Image retrieval and registration system
摘要: A visual information retrieval and registration system including a memory device for storing schematic images and data images, and a display device for displaying simultaneously one of the schematic images and one of the data images readout of the memory device. When a position on the displayed schematic image is indicated by a light-pen, a data image of the indicated position is retrieved and displayed.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种视觉信息检索和配准系统,包括用于存储示意图和数据图像的存储装置,以及用于同时显示从存储装置读出的示意图之一和数据图像之一的显示装置。 当显示的示意图上的位置由光笔指示时,指示位置的数据图像被检索并显示。
[标]当前申请(专利权)人: 奥林柏斯光学工业株式会社

标题: Relational data base system and method for rapidly realizing a query to a database
摘要: In a relational data base system having a function of view resolution for analyzing a query sentence in an execution procedure for a query from a user, using a content defined in a view table for the query designating the view table, converting the retrieval of the view table to that of an actual table, and creating the execution procedure, the system includes: an early bind definition unit for the view table for creating plural execution procedures in advance to realize the query to the defined view table in accordance with a query structure to the view table; a definition information dictionary operatively connected to the early bind definition means; an execution procedure management unit provided in the definition information dictionary for storing plural execution procedures to realize the query to the view table previously created; an execution procedure composition unit operatively connected to the definition information dictionary for retrieving an information of the execution procedure stored in the dictionary when receiving the query to the defined view table, extracting the execution procedure adapted to the query, and composing the extracted execution procedure with the query input from the user; and an execution unit operatively connected to the execution procedure composition unit for executing the composed execution procedure.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 在具有视图解析功能的关系数据库系统中,用于分析来自用户的查询的执行过程中的查询语句,使用视图表中定义的内容用于指定视图表的查询,转换视图的检索 该系统包括: 视图表的早期绑定定义单元,用于预先创建多个执行程序,实现根据查询结构对定义的视图表的查询, 视图表; 与早期绑定定义装置有效连接的定义信息字典; 定义信息字典中提供的执行过程管理单元,用于存储多个执行过程,以实现对先前创建的视图表的查询; 执行过程组合单元,与定义信息字典可操作地连接,用于在接收到对定义的视图表的查询时检索存储在字典中的执行过程的信息,提取适合于该查询的执行过程,并将提取的执行过程与 来自用户的查询输入; 执行单元,操作性地连接到执行程序组成单元,用于执行组成的执行程序。

标题: Letter pitch detection system
摘要: A method and apparatus for determining the pitch of a character of an aligned group of character images on the surface of a paper where the group contains several characters which touch or merge with each other. Blocks of separable letters are extracted from the aligned group of characters and the size and location of each is detected and stored. Based upon this information a permissible range for a one-letter block width is ascertained and the most frequently occurring letter block width in that permissible range is determined. Based on the most frequently occurring letter block width, an effective range or interval for determining letter pitch is ascertained and numerical method are employed to estimate the letter pitch.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种用于确定纸张表面上对齐的字符图像组的字符间距的方法和设备,其中该组包含多个相互接触或合并的字符。 从对齐的字符组中提取可分离字母块,检测并存储每个字符的大小和位置。 根据该信息,确定一个字母块宽度的允许范围,并确定在该允许范围内出现频率最高的字母块宽度。 根据出现频率最高的字母块宽度,确定确定字母间距的有效范围或区间,并采用数值方法估算字母间距。

标题: Image processing method and apparatus
摘要: Images picked up by a plurality of cameras are corrected and projected on a single plane. The input images are converted to projected images on a reference projection plane in accordance with reference parameters and camera parameters. Then images of an area of nxxny whose center is an intersection B that is a perpendicular from a center of a lens of a m-th camera on the reference projection plane are extracted from the projected images. By extracting the area as described above, there is obtained an image which can be assumed that optical axes of each camera intersects perpendicular to the reference projection plane and the optical axes are parallel to each other. Therefore, when an epipolar plane is constructed during an image interpolation process, corresponding points form a straight line on the epipolar plane, thus it becomes easier to detect the corresponding points.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 由多个照相机拍摄的图像被校正并投影在单个平面上。 根据参考参数和相机参数将输入图像转换为参考投影平面上的投影图像。 然后,从投影图像中提取nxxny区域的图像,该区域的中心是与参考投影平面上的第m个摄像机的透镜的中心垂直的交点B。 通过如上所述地提取区域,获得了可以假定每个照相机的光轴与参考投影平面垂直相交并且光轴彼此平行的图像。 因此,在图像插值过程中构建核平面时,对应点在核平面上形成一条直线,从而更容易检测对应点。
发明人: KATAYAMA, AKIHIRO | TANAKA, KOICHIRO | OSHINO, TAKAHIRO
发明人地址: Yokosuka, JP | Tokyo, JP | Yokohama, JP

标题: Pattern matching apparatus and method that considers distance and direction
摘要: An apparatus and method for matching sets of patterns. The apparatus matches an input pattern with reference patterns by extracting feature points of the input pattern to obtain a feature vector, and compares the feature vector of the input pattern with previously stored feature vectors of the reference patterns. The apparatus selects a reference pattern from a database and calculates the distance and direction between the input pattern and the selected reference pattern, to thereby include the reference pattern whose distance from the input pattern is equal to or less than a first threshold value in a matching comparison target, and determines whether the selected reference pattern and its neighbor reference patterns are included in the matching comparison target in consideration of the direction of the neighbor reference patterns with respect to the reference pattern, located within a circle having the point of the selected reference pattern as its center, if the distance between the input pattern and the selected reference pattern is greater than the first threshold value and the difference between the distance and the first threshold value is equal to or less than a second threshold value; and matches the patterns determined as the matching comparison target by the pattern classifier with the input pattern. Effective reference patterns are dynamically selected considering the direction and distance between the input pattern and the reference patterns, thus improving the accuracy and speed of pattern matching.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种用于匹配模式集的设备和方法。 该装置通过提取输入图案的特征点来将输入图案与参考图案匹配以获得特征向量,并将输入图案的特征向量与先前存储的参考图案的特征向量进行比较。 该设备从数据库中选择参考图案并计算输入图案与选择的参考图案之间的距离和方向,从而将与输入图案的距离等于或小于第一阈值的参考图案包括在匹配中 比较目标,并考虑相邻参考图案相对于参考图案的方向,确定所选参考图案及其相邻参考图案是否包括在匹配比较目标中,该参考图案位于具有所选参考点的圆内 如果输入图案与选择的参考图案之间的距离大于第一阈值且距离与第一阈值的差值等于或小于第二阈值,则以图案为中心; 并将模式分类器确定为匹配比较目标的模式与输入模式进行匹配。 考虑输入模式与参考模式之间的方向和距离,动态选择有效的参考模式,从而提高模式匹配的准确性和速度。

标题: Frame comparison method for word recognition in high noise environments
摘要: Abstract A method and arrangement for a speech recognition system employs channel bank information to represent speech. The method considers background noise included with the speech. The method includes determining three energy levels for each channel, the first representative of background noise, the second representative of the input frame and the third representative of the word template frame. Values representing energy level differentials are assigned at each channel. If the second energy level is less than the first energy level, then a predetermined constant value is assigned at that particular channel. These values are combined to generate a distance measure depicting the similarity between the two frames.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 摘要 一种用于语音识别系统的方法和装置采用信道库信息来表示语音。 该方法考虑了语音中包含的背景噪声。 该方法包括确定每个通道的三个能级,第一个代表背景噪声,第二个代表输入帧,第三个代表词模板帧。 在每个通道上分配代表能级差异的值。 如果第二能级小于第一能级,则在该特定通道处分配预定的恒定值。 这些值被组合以生成描述两个帧之间相似性的距离度量。
发明人: GERSON IRA ALAN | LINDSLEY BRETT LOUIS

标题: Systems and methods for storing, retrieving, and manipulating data in medical processing devices
摘要: A device has processing hardware to carry out a blood processing procedure. A processing control manager resides on the device to monitor status conditions over time during the blood processing procedure. A data interface also resides on the device. The data interface includes a flash memory data storage medium formatted to allocate discrete block file spaces to receive data. Chronologic data or time-specific data are created based upon sensed conditions by a data generator task, which also resides on the device. A file manager task appends chronologic data to an allocated file space to create a chronologic block file, which, when read, provides a time-ordered account of processing activities or hardware conditions. The file manager also operates to block-write time-specific data to another allocated file space, which, when read, creates a snap-shot of processing conditions at a given point in time. The data file structure created on the flash memory medium withstands corruption of data due to power failure.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 设备具有执行血液处理程序的处理硬件。 处理控制管理器驻留在设备上,以在血液处理过程中随着时间的推移监控状态条件。 数据接口也驻留在设备上。 数据接口包括格式化为分配离散块文件空间以接收数据的闪存数据存储介质。 时间数据或特定时间的数据由数据生成器任务根据感知的条件创建,该任务也驻留在设备上。 文件管理器任务将时序数据附加到分配的文件空间以创建时序块文件,该文件在读取时提供处理活动或硬件条件的时间顺序帐户。 文件管理器还用于将特定时间的数据块写入另一个分配的文件空间,当读取该文件空间时,会在给定时间点创建处理条件的快照。 在闪存介质上创建的数据文件结构可以承受由于电源故障而导致的数据损坏。
发明人: CORK, WILLIAM H | WEBER, MARK | CECKOWSKI, DOUGLAS | MORROW, DAVID
发明人地址: Lake Bluff, IL | Algonquin, IL | Gurnee, IL | Chicago, IL

标题: Verfahren zur Defuzzifizierung für signalverarbeitende Fuzzy-Baueinheiten und Filtereinrichtungen hierfür
摘要: Mit dem Verfahren zur Defuzzifizierung für signalverarbeitende Fuzzy-Baueinheiten treten an die Stelle der herkömmlichen, meist aufwendigen Defuzzifizierung bzw. Hyperdefuzzifizierung die beiden Verfahrensschritte Filterung von Zugehörigkeitsfunktionen und Defuzzifizierung nach der wenig aufwendigen Methode Maximale Höhe oder nach der Maximummittelwertmethode. Hierdurch ergeben sich einerseits funktionelle Vorteile. Sie liegen erstens in einer viel größeren Flexibilität, die aufgrund ihrer Transparenz zur interaktiven Optimierung genutzt werden kann. Zweitens liefern die Fuzzy-Baueinheiten neben den eigentlichen Ausgangsgrößenwerten Zusatzinformationen über die Verläßlichkeit dieser Werte. Drittens läßt sich bei zweisträngigen Fuzzy-Baueinheiten, die positive und negative Regeln verarbeiten können, der zwischen den Empfehlungen und Warnungen bzw. Verboten zu schließende Kompromiß gezielter steuern. Andererseits ergeben sich aus dem Verfahren auch realisierungstechnische Vorteile: Es sind handelsübliche Bausteine, wie digitale FIR-Filter oder Signalprozessoren, bekannt, mit deren Hilfe sich die Filterung der Zugehörigkeitsfunktionen auch für schnelle Echtzeitanwendungen kostengünstig durchführen läßt.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 在信号处理模糊分量的去模糊化过程中,通过不那么繁琐的最大高度或最大均值方法过滤隶属函数和去模糊化这两个过程步骤取代了现有技术和通常昂贵的去模糊化或超去模糊化。 这提供了功能优势。 它们首先存在于更大的灵活性中,由于它们对交互优化的透明性,可以使用这种灵活性。 其次,除了实际输出值之外,模糊分量还提供了有关这些值可靠性的附加信息。 第三,利用可以处理正负规则的双向模糊组件,可以更准确地控制建议和警告或禁止之间的折衷。 该过程还提供了结构优势:有标准的商业组件,如数字 FIR 滤波器或信号处理器,借助它们可以经济地过滤隶属函数,即使对于快速实时应用也是如此。
法律状态/事件: 期限届满 | 许可 | 权利转移

标题: Arc lamp stabilization and intensity control for imaging microscopy
摘要: An operator independent image cytometer having a method for image segmentation. Image segmentation comprises the steps of filtering a digital image of a cellular specimen and thresholding the resultant image. In addition, the thresholding may include the sorting of features extracted from the filtered image. The present invention also includes a method for cytometer autofocus that combines the benefits of sharpening and contrast metrics. The present invention further includes an arc lamp stabilization and intensity control system. The image cytometer has broad applications in determining DNA content and other cellular measurements on as many as 105 individual cells, including specimens of living cells. Image segmentation applications include PAP smear analysis and particle recognition.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种具有图像分割方法的独立于操作者的图像细胞仪。 图像分割包括过滤细胞样本的数字图像和对所得图像进行阈值处理的步骤。 此外,阈值处理可以包括对从过滤后的图像中提取的特征进行排序。 本发明还包括一种用于细胞仪自动聚焦的方法,该方法结合了锐化和对比度度量的优点。 本发明还包括弧光灯稳定和强度控制系统。 图像细胞仪在确定多达 105 个单个细胞(包括活细胞样本)的 DNA 含量和其他细胞测量方面具有广泛的应用。 图像分割应用包括 PAP 涂片​​分析和粒子识别。

标题: Anordning och förfarande för analys av naturligt språk i ett datorbaserat informationsbehandlingssystem
摘要: A system for natural language (NL) analyzis is provided which comprises apparatus and method. It has the capability to analyze NL expressions and to resolve ambiguities and present them to the user for verification of correct interpretation. The invention is based on a language independent model of the contents of a data base. The model contains records of information defining entity types and relations between such entity types. The model is created (customizing the system) by the user, and is stored as a conceptual schema. The entities of the schema are linked or connected to natural language terms in a vocabulary. The entities represent objects in the data base, and there is a link or connection between the entities and those objects of the data base. The actual analysis of NL expressions is performed by a Natural Language Engine (NLE) in cooperation with an Analysis Grammar and the schema. The analysis results in an intermediate, language independent logic form representation of the input, which is paraphrased back to NL for verification, and if the input is a query, there is a translation into a query language such as SQL.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 提供了一种用于自然语言(NL)分析的系统,包括装置和方法。 它有能力分析 NL 表达式并解决歧义并将它们呈现给用户以验证正确解释。 本发明基于数据库内容的语言独立模型。 该模型包含定义实体类型和这些实体类型之间的关系的信息记录。 该模型由用户创建(定制系统),并存储为概念模式。 模式的实体链接或连接到词汇表中的自然语言术语。 实体表示数据库中的对象,实体与数据库中的对象之间存在链接或连接。  NL 表达式的实际分析由自然语言引擎 (NLE) 与分析语法和模式合作执行。 分析的结果是输入的一种中间的、与语言无关的逻辑形式表示,它被解释回 NL 以进行验证,如果输入是查询,则会翻译成查询语言,例如 SQL。
发明人: E B HEDIN | G I JONSSON | L E OLSSON | M A SANAMRAD | S O G WESTLING
发明人地址: Lidingö, Sverige | Kista, Sverige | Stockholm, Sverige

标题: Pattern recognitions systems
摘要(译)(简体中文): 1242039。模式识别。 INTERNATIONAL BUSINESS MACHINES CORP。，1970年4月30日，第20836/70号。标题G4R。模式识别系统包括用于将输入模式减少为位串形式的输入装置，多个相关存储单元，其输入并联连接到输入装置的输出，用于响应位串是否符合单词或存储在存储器中的字的组合，以及连接到关联存储器的输出的输出装置，用于产生表示由关联存储器的输出确定的模式的输出信号。通过另一个选择的“关联存储器”将位串提供（用于匹配）到关联存储器，该关联存储器依次与控制键一起提供串的连续部分。关联存储器可以如规范1,186,703（参考）中那样。和定时单元包括一个只读存储器和一个时钟系统，控制关联存储器＆c ;;将控制键提供给关联存储器，这些关联存储器只能在它们所针对的存储器中实现匹配。并联连接的存储器的数量可以在不改变系统其余部分的情况下增加，并且可以通过串联添加更多存储器来扩展这些存储器中的任何一个。在这些关联存储器中匹配（以识别模式）可以通过首先使用的另一个关联存储器的输出来完成。识别模式的特征。如果位串是逐位的，则可以简化或省略“选择”存储器。缓冲存储器可以在t之前。他选择了“记忆。位串可以来自飞点扫描仪。

标题: Computer implemented method of recognizing a position of an object
摘要: A method for position recognition, includes the steps of: picking up an image of an object having a circular arc shape as at least part of its profile, by an image pickup device; converting image information of the picked-up image in gray image data and storing the gray image data into a storage device; scanning the stored gray image with a profile scanning window composed of plural gray-level detection areas crossing an imaginary scanning circular profile corresponding to the shape on the gray image and arranged in circular along the scanning circular profile and using it to measure gray-level representative values of an inner- and outer-side gray-level detection areas inside and outside of the scanning circular profile; calculating, at each scanning position during scanning and for each detection area, an absolute value of a difference between the measured gray-level representative values of the inner- and outer-side gray-level detection areas; determining a number of such detection areas in which the absolute value of the difference is larger than a specified gray-level threshold value; detecting a position of the window where the calculated number of detection areas becomes a maximum with respect to their neighborhood, as a position of the shape of the object; and recognizing a position of the object from the detected position of the shape thereof.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种用于位置识别的方法,包括以下步骤: 通过图像拾取装置拾取具有圆弧形状的物体的图像作为其轮廓的至少一部分; 将所拍摄图像的图像信息转换为灰度图像数据,并将灰度图像数据存储到存储设备中; 用轮廓扫描窗口扫描存储的灰度图像,该轮廓扫描窗口由多个灰度检测区域组成,该区域跨越与灰度图像上的形状对应的假想扫描圆形轮廓,并沿扫描圆形轮廓呈圆形排列,并用它来测量灰度级代表 扫描圆形轮廓内外的内侧和外侧灰度检测区域的值; 在扫描过程中的每个扫描位置,针对每个检测区域,计算内侧和外侧灰度检测区域的实测灰度代表值之差的绝对值; 确定差值的绝对值大于指定灰度阈值的多个这样的检测区域; 检测计算出的检测区域的数量相对于其邻域最大的窗口的位置,作为物体形状的位置; 根据检测到的物体的形状位置识别物体的位置。

标题: Neural network system and circuit for use therein
摘要: A neural network system comprises a memory for storing in binary code the synaptic coefficients indicative of the interconnections among the neurons. Means are provided for simultaneously supplying all the synaptic coefficients associated with a given neuron. Digital multipliers are provided for determining the product of the supplied synaptic coefficients and the relevant neuron states of the neurons connected to said given neuron. The multipliers deliver their results into an adder tree for determining the sum of the products. As a result of the parallel architecture of the system high operating speeds are attainable. The modular architecture enables extension of the system.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 神经网络系统包括用于以二进制代码存储指示神经元之间的互连的突触系数的存储器。 提供了用于同时提供与给定神经元相关联的所有突触系数的装置。 提供数字乘法器以确定所提供的突触系数与连接到所述给定神经元的神经元的相关神经元状态的乘积。 乘法器将它们的结果传递到加法器树中,以确定乘积的总和。 由于系统的并行架构,可以实现高运行速度。 模块化架构可以扩展系统。

发明人: DURANTON, MARC | GOBERT, JEAN | SIRAT, JACQUES-ARIEL

标题: PROCEDE DE TRAITEMENT D'UNE REQUETE
摘要: La présente invention concerne un procédé de traitement d'une requête.Le procédé de traitement de requêtes et de résultat entre un client et une pluralité de sources hétérogènes de données par un dispositif adaptateur (1) spécifique à chaque source, d'architecture donnée, réalise les étapes suivantes de façon indépendante :- réception de la requête (71) émise par l'application client,- établissement d'une représentation interne (73, 74) de la requête par l'adaptateur,- utilisation de cette représentation interne de la requête pour réécrire la requête en un format compréhensible par la source,- transmission de la requête traduite (75) à la source (7), production d'un objet filtre (52) et initialisation d'au moins une chaîne de filtres (46) constituée d'un ou plusieurs composants " filtres " (45, 44, 43, 42),- récupération par l'objet filtre (52) des résultats provenant de la source pour les transmettre et les faire filtrer à travers la chaîne (46) de composants "filtres ", - production d'un objet réponse (22) pour transférer les résultats provenant du module de transformation du résultat à l'application client.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 本发明涉及一种用于处理查询的方法。 一种由每个源特有的、具有预定架构的适配器设备(1)处理客户端与多个异构数据源之间的查询和结果的方法,包括以下独立执行的步骤:接收客户端发送的查询(71) 应用; 使用适配器设置查询的内部表示(73、74); 使用查询的所述内部表示以源可理解的格式重写查询; 将翻译后的查询 (75) 传输到源 (7),生成过滤器对象 (52) 并初始化至少一个由一个或多个过滤器组件 (45、44、43、42) 组成的过滤器链 (46); 使用过滤器对象 (52) 恢复从源获得的结果以传输它们并通过过滤器组件链 (46) 过滤它们; 产生回复对象(22)以将从结果转换模块得到的结果传输到客户端应用程序。
发明人地址: 43 RUE DES EAUX CLAIRES, 38100 GRENOBLE, FR

标题: Display and navigation method for large data files containing graphic elements, and method for compressing data files containing text and graphic or image data
摘要: The invention relates to a display and navigation method for large data files containing graphic elements, in which the relevant data sections are displayed or presented on a monitor. In accordance with the invention, visual and controlled division of the display surface of the monitor takes place, preferably in a Cartesian co-ordinate grid with a centre field and surrounding edge fields. The data files necessary for the first display are then charged from a data base. After this, navigation directions and recharge orders are assigned to each of the edge fields of the grid, so that, when one of the edge fields activated, the data file content representing this field becomes the centre field, while the data file content which was hitherto not displayed, and was on the edge field or adjacent to the edge fields, can be reloaded from the main data file. The remaining, non-activated edge fields, which were adjacent to the hitherto centre field, are moved away from the selected navigation direction, or optionally removed from the monitor display. During navigation, reloading of the adjacent data file content takes place by means of the edge fields and the movement of the existing data files for the centre field, and by means of the edge fields which are not activated during navigation. This enables acceleration of the whole display process.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 本发明涉及一种用于包含图形元素的大数据文件的显示和导航方法,其中在监视器上显示或呈现相关数据部分。 根据本发明,监视器的显示表面的视觉和受控划分发生,优选地在具有中心场和周围边缘场的笛卡尔坐标网格中。 然后从数据库中收取第一次显示所需的数据文件。 之后,将导航方向和补给顺序分配给网格的每个边缘字段,这样,当其中一个边缘字段被激活时,表示该字段的数据文件内容成为中心字段,而之前的数据文件内容 迄今为止未显示,并且在边缘场或与边缘场相邻的情况下,可以从主数据文件重新加载。 与迄今为止的中心场相邻的其余未激活的边缘场从选定的导航方向移开,或可选地从监视器显示中移除。 在导航期间,相邻数据文件内容的重新加载通过边缘域和用于中心域的现有数据文件的移动以及通过在导航期间未激活的边缘域来进行。 这能够加速整个显示过程。

标题: 言語解析装置
摘要: PURPOSE:To effectively perform morpheme analysis, by selecting the combination of words having high coupling degrees by referring data of coupling degree when an analyzing means retrieves plural dictionary data. CONSTITUTION:On an English text inputted from an input part 10, the pre- processing of transition is applied at a pre-editing part 14, and English data is sent to a morpheme analyzing part 16 with a bit of information obtained in the pre-processing. The analyzing part 16 indexes a word dictionary 18, then divides it to texts based on a retrieval key character string, and analyzes the morpheme of the English text, but, when the analysis of the morpheme is performed, all of the words, the copulas, and the phrases beginning from the segmenting position of a dictionary consulting unit, are taken out, and dictionary information obtained from individual word consisting of the copulas, or the phrase recognized as a set according to a flag having the highest priority included in the dictionary information, is deleted. In other words, the strength of coupling between the words in a text is decided, and the text having strong coupling is estimated as the way of using of the phrase, and for a case other than that, the possibility of the way of independent using of a word is considered. In this way, the analysis of the morpheme can be performed efficiently.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 目的:为了有效地进行语素分析,在分析装置检索多个词典数据时,通过引用耦合度数据选择具有高耦合度的词的组合。 组成:在从输入部分 10 输入的英文文本上,在预编辑部分 14 处应用过渡的预处理,并将英文数据发送到词素分析部分 16,其中包含在预编辑部分中获得的一些信息。 加工。 解析部16对单词词典18进行索引,然后根据检索关键字符串将其划分为文本,并解析英文文本的语素,但是,当进行语素分析时,所有的词,系词 ,以及从词典查询单元的切分位置开始的词组被取出,从由系词组成的单个词或根据词典中包含的具有最高优先级的标志识别为集合的词组获得词典信息 信息,被删除。 换言之,决定了文本中单词之间的耦合强度,将具有强耦合的文本估计为短语的使用方式,对于除此之外的情况,独立使用方式的可能性 一个词的考虑。 这样,可以有效地进行词素的分析。
发明人地址: 東京都大田区中馬込1丁目3番6号  株式会社リコー内

标题: Data bank apparatus and method of a video recording and reproducing system
摘要: A data bank apparatus and method for use in a video recording and reproducing system are disclosed. The apparatus includes scanning devices for scanning two recording media install to and drive a video recording medium and an additional data recording medium, and two servos for driving the two recording media. Accordingly, user-assigned information can be recorded on a proper position of the data recording medium by the data scanning devices and the data servos, or can be retrieved from the data recording medium to be displayed on a display unit.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 公开了一种用于视频记录和再现系统的数据库设备和方法。 该装置包括用于扫描安装到视频记录介质和附加数据记录介质的两个记录介质的扫描装置,以及用于驱动这两个记录介质的两个伺服器。 因此,用户指定的信息可以通过数据扫描装置和数据伺服系统记录在数据记录介质的适当位置,或者可以从数据记录介质中检索以显示在显示单元上。

标题: PROCEDE DE GESTION DE FICHIERS POUR UN SYSTEME INFORMATIQUE, ET MODULE SYSTEME POUR LA MISE EN OEUVRE DE CE PROCEDE
摘要: In a computer system having a hierarchical file structure a file system is provided wherein per-process mounting of file systems can be performed. To provide per-process mounting, a temporary directory tmp is created off the current root directory. The file system, starting at the root directory, is then mounted on the temporary directory using an innovative loop-back file system function which results in the file system being duplicated but having the temporary directory as its root directory. A mount can then be performed on the temporary directory without affecting the original file system. A change root directory command is then executed to change the root directory to the temporary directory whereby execution continues on the file system having the temporary directory as its root.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 在具有分层文件结构的计算机系统中,提供了一种文件系统,其中可以执行文件系统的按进程安装。 为了提供每个进程的挂载,在当前根目录之外创建了一个临时目录 tmp。 文件系统从根目录开始,然后使用创新的环回文件系统功能安装在临时目录上,这导致文件系统被复制但临时目录作为其根目录。 然后可以在临时目录上执行挂载,而不会影响原始文件系统。 然后执行更改根目录命令以将根目录更改为临时目录,从而在以临时目录为根的文件系统上继续执行。

标题: Vorrichtung zum Messen des Nasalgrades in der Stimme
摘要: Eine Vorrichtung zum Messen des Nasalgrades im Klang der menschlichen Stimme erfaßt getrennt voneinander und ohne Leckverluste die bei der Lautbildung aus Nase und Mund jeweils ausgestoßenen Luftströmungsmengen und bestimmt deren Verhältnis.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种用于单独且无泄漏地测量人声声音中鼻音程度的装置检测在声音形成期间从鼻子和嘴巴排出的气流量并确定它们的比率。

标题: Two-layer neuron network
摘要: This concerns an artificial neural network with binary representation of input and output signals. The network is intended for signal or image classifiers and character recognition devices. The essence of the solution is that each neuron (1l to 1k) of the covered layer forms a logical sum of input signals, whereas individual neuron inputs are connected to the network inputs through synapses (3ll to 3kn). The outputs of all neurons (1l to lk) of the covered layer are connected through the synapses (6ll to 6mk) to the input neurons (81 to 8m) of the output layer.<IMAGE>
摘要(译)(简体中文): 这涉及具有输入和输出信号二进制表示的人工神经网络。 该网络用于信号或图像分类器和字符识别设备。 解决方案的本质是覆盖层的每个神经元(1l 到 1k)形成输入信号的逻辑和,而单个神经元输入通过突触(3ll 到 3kn)连接到网络输入。 覆盖层的所有神经元(1l 到 lk)的输出通过突触(6ll 到 6mk)连接到输出层的输入神经元(81 到 8m)。

当前第一申请(专利权)人: ÚSTAV INFORMATIKY A VÝPOČETNÍ TECHNIKY AVČR

标题: Fuzzy computers
摘要: ABSTRACT OF THE DISCLOSURE A fuzzy computer basically includes a plurality of fuzzy membership function generator circuits, and a fuzzy inference engine for executing a predetermined fuzzy operation among fuzzy membership functions that have been generated. A fuzzy membership function is represented by electric signal distributed on a plurality of lines.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 发明内容模糊计算机基本上包括多个模糊隶属函数发生器电路,以及用于在已经生成的模糊隶属函数中执行预定模糊运算的模糊推理机。 模糊隶属函数由分布在多条线上的电信号表示。

标题: Speech recognition system and technique
摘要: There is disclosed a speech recognition system and technique which is of the acoustic/phonetic type. It is made speaker-independent and capable of continuous speech recognition during fluent discourse by a combination of techniques which include, inter alia, using a so-called continuously-variable-duration hidden Markov model in identifying word segments and making all steps of the technique responsive to the durational information, and using a separate step for aligning the members of the candidate word arrays with the acoustic feature signals representative of the corresponding portion of the utterance, including using pairs of candidate phonetic segments in the alignment technique. Any residual word selection ambiguities are then more readily resolved than in the prior art, regardless of the ultimate sentence selection technique employed.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 公开了一种声学/语音类型的语音识别系统和技术。 它与说话者无关,并且能够在流利的话语中通过多种技术进行连续语音识别,其中包括使用所谓的连续可变持续时间隐马尔可夫模型来识别词段并完成该技术的所有步骤 响应于持续时间信息,并使用单独的步骤将候选词阵列的成员与代表话语的相应部分的声学特征信号对齐,包括在对齐技术中使用候选语音片段对。 与现有技术相比,任何残留的词选择歧义都更容易解决,而不管所采用的最终句子选择技术如何。

标题: APPARATUS FOR INTRODUCING CONTROL WORDS BY SPEECH
摘要: Speech recognition is improved by adaptive update of reference word codes. The apparatus can be used for controlling a piece of equipment and comprises memories which in coded form contains the references of the vocabulary of the machine; a microphone, a coding circuit and a memory for coding and memorizing the word pronounced by the user; a device for displaying the word recognized by the apparatus; and a control circuit for comparing the pronounced word to the different memorized references and for displaying at each repetition of the word the words corresponding to the references in their order of resemblance to the pronounced word. The user is able to train the apparatus easily by repeating a word until the displayed word agrees with what he has said, the coded form of this spoken word then being stored as the reference for the corresponding word of the vocabulary.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 通过参考词代码的自适应更新改进了语音识别。 该装置可用于控制一件设备并包括存储器,该存储器以编码形式包含机器词汇表的参考; 麦克风、编码电路和存储器,用于对用户发音的词进行编码和记忆; 用于显示由该装置识别的单词的装置; 和一个控制电路,用于将发音的单词与不同的记忆参考进行比较,并用于在单词的每次重复时显示与参考对应的单词与发音的单词相似的顺序。 用户可以通过重复一个单词直到显示的单词与他所说的一致,从而轻松地训练该装置,然后将这个说出的单词的编码形式存储起来作为词汇表中相应单词的参考。
[标]当前申请(专利权)人: 阿苏拉布股份有限公司

标题: Remote access and geographically distributed computers in a globally addressable storage environment
摘要: A computer system employs a globally addressable storage environment that allows a plurality of networked computers to access data by addressing even when the data is stored on a persistent storage device such as a computer hard disk and other traditionally non-addressable data storage devices. The computers can be located on a single computer network or on a plurality of interconnected computer networks such as two local area networks (LANs) coupled by a wide area network (WAN). The globally addressable storage environment allows data to be accessed and shared by and among the various computers on the plurality of networks.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种计算机系统采用全局可寻址存储环境,即使当数据存储在诸如计算机硬盘和其他传统上不可寻址的数据存储设备之类的持久性存储设备上时,该环境也允许多个联网计算机通过寻址来访问数据。 计算机可以位于单个计算机网络或多个互连的计算机网络上,例如通过广域网(WAN)耦合的两个局域网(LAN)。 全局可寻址存储环境允许数据被多个网络上的各种计算机访问和共享。
发明人: CARTER, JOHN B. | DAVIS, SCOTT H. | FRANK, STEVEN J.
发明人地址: Salt Lake City, UT | Groton, MA | Hopkinton, MA
法律状态/事件: 期限届满 | 权利转移

标题: Rotational correction and duplicate image identification by fourier transform correlation
摘要: The invention corrects for rotational misalignment of images having a prominent periodic structure in a preferred direction, particularly imaged text pages. It preferably also finds the degree of correlation between different images. First the rotational misalignment of an imaged page is detected and corrected, bringing the page into alignment with an axis. The angle of rotation of the page is detected by performing a linear regression analysis on filtered, two-dimensional power spectral density distribution of the page, to find the angular orientation of the periodic components. In the preferred embodiment, two imaged pages are then cross-correlated, preferably by an optical correlator, to find the degree of correlation between the pages.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 本发明校正了在优选方向上具有显着周期性结构的图像的旋转错位,特别是成像的文本页面。 它最好还找出不同图像之间的相关程度。 首先,检测并校正成像页面的旋转错位,使页面与轴对齐。 通过对页面的滤波后的二维功率谱密度分布进行线性回归分析来检测页面的旋转角度,以找出周期性分量的角方向。 在优选实施例中,然后优选地通过光学相关器对两个成像页面进行交叉相关,以找到页面之间的相关程度。

标题: Data processing apparatus for a temporal based rule system
摘要: A data processing apparatus includes a computer (1), a detector (2) for external events signalled on a set of input lines (7,8, etc.), and a real time clock 3. A table (20) of rules (24) is included in the computer storage (19). The computer is programmed to respond to a condition, (B,t) stored in a field (26,27) of a rule, being satisfied by generating an associated response (R) stored in a field (28) of that rule. The condition part of each rule requires the continous presence of a specific internal or external behavior (B) stored in the field 26 for a specific finite time (t) stored in the field 27 in order for the rule to be fired. Each time a change of internal behavior occurs due to the firing of a rule, and each time a change of external behavior occurs, signalled on one of the lines 7,8 etc., the rules are examined and the response associated with the next one to be fired on the basis of the behaviors currently present is loaded into a field (33) of a register (23), the time at which the firing is to occur (if there is no intermediate change of behavior which results in a new rule being potentially the next to be fired) being stored in a field 34. If the output of the clock (3) reaches the time stored in the field 34 the response indicated by the data in the field 33 is generated. This response may be purely internal, indicated by changing a flag associated with an entry (25) in a stored table (21), or external, taking the form of a signal on an output line (14,15, etc.).
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种数据处理装置包括计算机 (1)、用于在一组输入线 (7,8 等) 上发出信号的外部事件的检测器 (2) 和实时时钟 3。规则表 (20) (  24) 包含在计算机存储器 (19) 中。 计算机被编程为响应存储在规则的字段(26,27)中的条件(B,t),通过生成存储在该规则的字段(28)中的相关响应(R)来满足。 每个规则的条件部分需要在存储在字段27中的特定有限时间(t)内连续存在存储在字段26中的特定内部或外部行为(B),以便触发规则。 每次由于触发规则而发生内部行为的变化,并且每次发生外部行为的变化时,在第 7,8 行之一上发出信号,等等,都会检查规则并与下一个相关联的响应 将根据当前存在的行为触发的加载到寄存器 (23) 的字段 (33) 中,触发发生的时间(如果没有导致新规则的中间行为变化 如果时钟(3)的输出达到存储在字段34中的时间,则生成由字段33中的数据指示的响应。 该响应可以是纯内部的,通过改变与存储的表 (21) 中的条目 (25) 相关联的标志来指示,或者是外部的,采用输出线 (14,15 等) 上的信号形式。
发明人: CONNAH, DAVID M. | WAVISH, PETER R.

标题: Systems for checking the authenticity of identification papers
摘要: On issuing the document, certain parameters characteristic of the picture (2) affixed thereto are determined, these constituting a code (3) which is stored on the document itself or elsewhere. Whenever the authenticity of the document is to be verified it is necessary to redetermine the said code by constructing a distribution function of the values of brightness of the picture, calculating the integral of the said function and, by subdividing the said integrated function along the ordinate axis into X equal parts, obtaining on the abscissa axis (X-1) values representing the characteristic parameters of the picture. A comparison with the previously determined code is performed next. The apparatus for carrying out this process comprises a device (4) able to register the picture, a device (10, 11) for inputting the comparison code, a device (5, 6, 7) for converting the signals provided by the picture-registering device into digital values and a microcomputer (8). The process and the apparatus can be used to determine the authenticity of credit cards.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 在发布文件时,确定附加到其上的图片(2)的某些参数特征,这些参数构成存储在文件本身或其他地方的代码(3)。 每当要验证文件的真实性时,都需要通过构造图片亮度值的分布函数、计算所述函数的积分并通过沿纵坐标细分所述积分函数来重新确定所述代码 轴分成X等份,在横坐标轴(X-1)上获得代表图片特征参数的值。 接下来执行与先前确定的代码的比较。 用于执行该过程的设备包括能够注册图片的设备(4)、用于输入比较代码的设备(10、11)、用于转换图片提供的信号的设备(5、6、7)- 将装置登记成数字值和微型计算机(8)。 该过程和装置可用于确定信用卡的真实性。

标题: パターンマッチング方法
摘要: PURPOSE:To shorten processing time by taking the data of plural picture elements in a picture as unit data, storing this unit data respectively to the respective addresses of a picture memory while shifting the data by a unit picture element, and collating en bloc the data with the respective addresses of a reference pattern memory for each address. CONSTITUTION:The data of the plural picture elements in the picture are taken as the unit data, and this unit data is shifted by unit picture element to be stored in the respective addresses of a picture memory 4 respectively. This unit data of the respective addresses and the unit data of the respective addresses corresponding to the reference pattern are collated summarily by a collating circuit 6, and the matching degree between the picture and the reference pattern is calculated by a calculation part 7. Thus, the rapid pattern matching can be performed.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 目的:为了缩短处理时间,将一幅图像中多个像素的数据作为单位数据,将该单位数据分别存储到图像存储器的各个地址中,同时将数据移位一个单位像素,并进行整体整理。 与每个地址的参考模式存储器的相应地址。 组成:图片中的多个图片元素的数据被视为单位数据,并且该单位数据由单位图片元素移位,分别存储在图片存储器4的各个地址中。 该各个地址的单位数据和对应于基准图案的各个地址的单位数据由对照电路6进行汇总对照,由计算部7计算图像与基准图案的匹配度。因此, 可以进行快速模式匹配。

标题: 表形式文書読取装置
摘要: PURPOSE:To improve the recognition accuracy of a list of names, an address book, etc., by extrating the ruled parts of a table type document to be read out and converging a target to be recognized in accordance with a reading condition appropriate for each item divided by ruled lines. CONSTITUTION:When the image data of a table type document are inputted from an image input part 13 and a scanner 12, the data are informed to an image host processor 10 and a ruled line extracting part 14. The extracting part 14 inputs the specification of an area to be read out from the processor 10, extracts a ruled line between items and informs the extracted ruled line position information to the processor 10. Thereby, divisions of respective items can be detected, and when the attribute of each item is inputted by an item specification input part 15, the target to be recognized or a proper word can be converged by a character recognizing part 17 and a post processing part 18. Consequently, the recognition accuracy in the reading of various table type documents such as the list of names and the address book can be improved.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 目的:通过提取要读出的表格类型文档的规则部分,并根据适合每个人的阅读条件收敛要识别的目标,提高对姓名列表、通讯录等的识别准确性 项目由格线划分。 组成:当表格类型文件的图像数据从图像输入部分 13 和扫描仪 12 输入时,数据被告知图像主机处理器 10 和格线提取部分 14。提取部分 14 输入规范 从处理器10读出的区域,提取项目之间的格线,并将提取的格线位置信息通知处​​理器10。由此,可以检测各个项目的划分,并且当每个项目的属性被输入时 通过字符识别部17和后处理部18,可以使项目指定输入部15、识别对象或适当的词收敛。因此,在读取各种表格类型文档时的识别精度,例如列表 姓名和通讯录可以改进。
发明人: 桑村 良則 | 佐藤 純

摘要: A transition code recognition system which includes a coded record medium (like a color-coded label) which may, if desired, be secured to an article. The record medium utilizes detectable indicia like color bands placed on the record medium in a reading order so that each color band is different from the preceding one. The color transitions from one color band to the next, when reading, are used to identify binary states "1" and "0," and the transitions obviate the need for a separate clocking arrangement. An optical probe scanner is used to read the record medium by "scribing" or gliding the probe scanner across the color bands, and the changing light signals resulting from the reading operation are routed to electronic circuitry for interpretation and processing.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种转换代码识别系统,包括编码记录介质(如彩色编码标签),如果需要,可以将其固定到物品上。 记录介质利用以读取顺序放置在记录介质上的可检测标记,例如色带,使得每个色带都不同于前一个色带。 在读取时,从一个色带到下一个色带的颜色转变用于识别二进制状态“1”和“0”,并且这种转变消除了对单独时钟安排的需要。 光学探针扫描仪用于通过“划线”或在色带上滑动探针扫描仪来读取记录介质,读取操作产生的变化的光信号被路由到电子电路进行解释和处理。

标题: Tracking system, method and computer program product for document processing
摘要: An integrated computer system architecture for tracking of job data in a document processing environment including an infrastructure built on processes, hardware, software and interfaces designed to monitor and control mail processing and data collection through a variety of manual and machine processes in real-time. Computers, networks, web-based applications, databases and scanners are used to interface and integrate traditional mail processing equipment with customized software. The invention integrates the entire mail production process to form and establish a complete end-to-end system. A job tracking scheme is detailed illustrating a particular data mining application.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 用于在文档处理环境中跟踪工作数据的集成计算机系统架构,包括建立在流程、硬件、软件和界面之上的基础设施,旨在通过各种手动和机器流程实时监控邮件处理和数据收集。 计算机、网络、基于 Web 的应用程序、数据库和扫描仪用于将传统邮件处理设备与定制软件连接和集成。 本发明整合了整个邮件制作过程,形成并建立了一个完整的端到端系统。 工作跟踪方案详细说明了特定的数据挖掘应用程序。

标题: Method and device for recognizing individual words of spoken speech
摘要: A method and device for recognizing individual words of spoken speech can be used to control technical processes. The method proposed by the invention is based on feature extraction which is particularly efficient in terms of computing capacity and recognition rate, plus subsequent classification of the individual words using a neuron network.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种用于识别口语中单个单词的方法和装置,可用于控制技术过程。 本发明提出的方法基于在计算能力和识别率方面特别有效的特征提取,以及随后使用神经元网络对单个单词进行分类。

标题: Data input by means of a keyboard and a touch-sensitive graphical data input field
摘要: A data processing system is provided for emulating keyboard input. In one embodiment, the invention provides a contact sensitive graphical data input-output field for receiving graphical user input and for displaying graphical output. The graphical data input-output field includes multiple contact sensitive data input fields. The embodiment also provides a keyboard overlying the graphical data input-output field. The keyboard includes multiple keys, each of which corresponds to a data input field of the graphical data input-output field. Each key, when pressed by a user, contacts the data input field that corresponds to that key, thereby causing the data processing system to provide an electrical signal of a predetermined value that corresponds to the key pressed by the user. The keyboard further includes a window through which at least a portion of the graphical data input-output field can be viewed when the keyboard is fully overlying the graphical data input-output field, wherein the portion of said graphical data input-output field that can be viewed through the window can display graphical output.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 提供了一种用于模拟键盘输入的数据处理系统。 在一个实施例中,本发明提供了一种用于接收图形用户输入和用于显示图形输出的接触敏感图形数据输入-输出字段。 图形数据输入输出字段包括多个接触敏感数据输入字段。 该实施例还提供了覆盖图形数据输入-输出字段的键盘。 键盘包括多个按键,每个按键对应图形数据输入输出栏的一个数据输入栏。 每个键在被用户按下时接触与该键对应的数据输入字段,从而使数据处理系统提供与用户按下的键对应的预定值的电信号。 键盘还包括窗口,当键盘完全覆盖图形数据输入-输出字段时,通过该窗口可以查看图形数据输入-输出字段的至少一部分,其中所述图形数据输入-输出字段的部分可以 可通过窗口查看,可显示图形输出。

标题: Image processing apparatus for effecting a series of processes
摘要: An image processing apparatus for effecting a series of processes for capturing an image and scrutinizing the captured image is disclosed. Each process in series of processes is selected from different modes of processes. Selector selects a mode of process for each of the series of processes. A preselected number of parameters are set for each of the selected mode of processes, and the set parameters are stored in a parameter memory sequentially. Mode data indicative of the selected modes for the series of processes are stored in the mode memory. A parameter number table informs the number of parameters necessary for each mode in each of the series of processes. When the parameters and the mode data are read from the parameter memory and said mode memory, respectively, parameter allocator allocates and produces proper parameters to corresponding modes of processes with reference to the parameter number table.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 公开了一种图像处理设备,用于执行一系列用于捕获图像和仔细检查捕获的图像的处理。 一系列流程中的每个流程都是从不同的流程模式中选择的。  Selector 为一系列进程中的每一个进程选择一种进程模式。 为每个选定的过程模式设置预选数量的参数,并将设置的参数顺序存储在参数存储器中。 表示为一系列过程选择的模式的模式数据存储在模式存储器中。 参数编号表通知每个过程系列中每个模式所需的参数数量。 当分别从参数存储器和所述模式存储器中读取参数和模式数据时,参数分配器参照参数编号表为相应的进程模式分配并产生合适的参数。

标题: Internet server and method of controlling an internet server
摘要: An internet server is controlled wherein the server receives a hypertext transfer protocol file request from a web browser over the internet and any identification signal included with the hypertext transfer protocol file request. The identification signal is compared with one or more predetermined identification signals and depending upon the result of the comparison a file may be transmitted from the server to the web browser.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 互联网服务器被控制,其中服务器通过互联网从网络浏览器接收超文本传输​​协议文件请求以及包括在超文本传输​​协议文件请求中的任何标识信号。 将识别信号与一个或多个预定识别信号进行比较,并且根据比较的结果,可以将文件从服务器传输到网络浏览器。

标题: PROCEDE DE VERIFICATION DE BILLETS DE BANQUE ET APPAREIL DE MISE EN OEUVRE DU PROCEDE
摘要: Selon le procédé de la présente invention, pour déterminer si un billet de banque est vrai ou faux, on utilise des éléments photosensibles associés à des points de lecture dudit billet de banque, on amplifie les signaux ainsi produits jusqu'à une valeur normalisée, et on detecte l'écart par rapport à ladite moyenne, et on vérifie enfin si de tels écarts ou erreurs par rapport à la moyenne se trouvent dans une fourchette pré-etablie déterminée d'après un nombre de vrais billets de banque statistiquement significatif.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 根据本发明的方法,为了判断纸币的真假,使用与该纸币的读取点相关联的光敏元件,将由此产生的信号放大到归一化值,并检测与该平均值的偏差,最后验证这些与平均值的偏差或误差是否在基于统计上显着数量的真实纸币确定的预先确定的范围内。
[标]当前申请(专利权)人: 诺沃皮尼奥内有限公司

标题: Apparatus and method for aiding in deciding or setting ideal lighting conditions in image processing system
摘要: The sizes and equiluminous characteristics of illumination devices (11, 13) are stored beforehand in a data base. Shape features such as the size of an object, the depths and widths of grooves formed in the object and visual field information necessary for illuminating the object are inputted through an input device (51). On the basis of inputted information and data base information, the conditions for photographing the object suitably, e.g., the condition for darkening the grooves formed in the object and illuminating the other surface parts of the object equiluminously is calculated by determining sections (54, 55). For example, the optimum heights and optimum angle of the illumination devices, etc, are derived, and those are displayed on a display device (41).
摘要(译)(简体中文): 照明装置(11、13)的尺寸和等光特性预先存储在数据库中。 通过输入装置(51)输入物体的大小、物体上形成的凹槽的深度和宽度、照明物体所需的视野信息等形状特征。 在输入的信息和数据库信息的基础上,通过确定部分(54、55)来计算适合拍摄物体的条件,例如使物体中形成的凹槽变暗和均匀地照亮物体的其他表面部分的条件。  ). 例如,导出照明装置的最佳高度和最佳角度等,并显示在显示装置(41)上。
发明人: TOSHIHIKO MATSUMOTO | HIROSHI TERAMOTO | FUMIO SHIBATA | SHIRO FUJIEDA | FUJIEDA, SHIRO | MATSUMOTO, TOSHIHIKO | SHIBATA, FUMIO | TERAMOTO, HIROSHI

标题: Voice recognition
摘要: An automatic voice recognition system uses time encoded speech format. This has previously only been proposed for digital speech transmission.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 自动语音识别系统使用时间编码语音格式。 这以前只被提议用于数字语音传输。

标题: マイクロフィルム検索·読取装置
摘要: PURPOSE:To retrieve/read a target image in a short time by moving a scanner itself incorporating a microfilm running driver and an image reader up and down in front of a container shelf in which many cartridges are piled vertically. CONSTITUTION:Many cartridges 14 are piled vertically and contained in the container shelf 12 of a case 10, and on the respective shelf plates 12A of the shelf 12, a mechanism to exhaust a cartridge 14 composed of a guide roller 18, a belt 20, pulleys 22, 24 etc., is mounted. And in front of the shelf 12, the scanner 30 is arranged, which is moved vertically by a pair of wires 32 driven by the driver 100. In this scanner 30, the microfilm running mechanism and the image reader are incorporated. A position where the cartridge 14 is contained is stored in a memory 112 provided in the CPU 102 of the means 100. The scanner 30 is moved toward the target cartridge 14, so that, upon the intruding of the scanner 30, the cartridge 14 is exhausted, and a target image is read by the scanner 30.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 目的:通过移动扫描仪本身在短时间内检索/读取目标图像,该扫描仪本身结合了缩微胶卷运行驱动器和图像阅读器,在垂直堆放许多墨盒的容器架前上下移动。 组成:许多墨盒 14 垂直堆放在容器架子 12 的案例 10 中,并在架子 12 的相应架板 12A 上,一个机构排出墨盒 14 由导辊 18、皮带 20、 安装有滑轮22、24等。 并且在搁板12的前面,布置了扫描仪30,扫描仪30由驱动器100驱动的一对电线32垂直移动。在该扫描仪30中,结合了缩微胶卷运行机构和图像读取器。 包含盒14的位置存储在装置100的CPU 102中提供的存储器112中。扫描仪30向目标盒14移动,使得在扫描仪30侵入时,盒14被移动。 用完后,扫描仪30读取目标图像。

标题: High-speed fault detecting method and apparatus
摘要: PCT No. PCT/JP88/00787 Sec. 371 Date Mar. 29, 1989 Sec. 102(e) Date Mar. 29, 1989 PCT Filed Aug. 9, 1988 PCT Pub. No. WO89/01669 PCT Pub. Date Feb. 23, 1989.In appearance inspection for a printed image, image data without a fault or image data in which a fault is corrected is selected as a reference image, and a table having, as its elements, flags in a number corresponding to the number of levels of an image for each pixel of the reference image is prepared. An index space is formed by a set of tables of all the pixels, and a reference pattern is formed by turning on the flags in the space. The flags in the index space are inspected and determined once for each pixel in accordance with attribute values of an image to be inspected. Setting of an allowable range for inspection is performed as pre-processing before flag propagation processing for turning on flags within the allowable range in the index space is performed. The flag is not limited to a binary one having values of ON and OFF but may be a multivalue one. The index space can be compressed by expressing flags by a hierarchical structure utilizing image data characteristics. By setting the reference image and the index space in a relationship other than a one-to-one correspondence, X and Y sizes or a level axis of the index space can be reduced.
摘要(译)(简体中文): PCT 号 PCT/JP88/00787 Sec.  371 日期 1989 年 3 月 29 日 102(e) 日期 1989 年 3 月 29 日 PCT 申请 1988 年 8 月 9 日 PCT Pub.  WO89/01669 PCT 公开号 日期 1989.02.23. 在印刷图像的外观检查中,选择没有缺陷的图像数据或修正了缺陷的图像数据作为参考图像,并以相应编号的标记作为其元素的表格 为参考图像的每个像素准备图像的级别数。 索引空间由所有像素的一组表形成,参考模式通过打开空间中的标志形成。 索引空间中的标志根据待检查图像的属性值对每个像素进行一次检查和确定。 检查的允许范围的设置作为在执行用于在索引空间中的允许范围内打开标志的标志传播处理之前的预处理来执行。 标志不限于具有ON和OFF值的二进制标志,而是可以是多值标志。 索引空间可以通过利用图像数据特性的分层结构来表示标志来压缩。 通过以一一对应以外的关系设置参考图像和索引空间,可以减小索引空间的X和Y尺寸或水平轴。

标题: Pufferung für Lastausgleichung in auf-Aufrage-Video-Server
摘要(译)(简体中文): 向视频服务器提供缓冲管理器，缓冲管理器通过优先缓冲高负载存储元件上的流来平衡视频服务器的各种“电影存储”元件上的负载。缓冲区的分配仅在存储元件负载由于新请求的到达而增加时或者由于暂停或停止旧​​请求而缓冲区变得可用时发生。 <MATH>

标题: 並列データベースの性能を監視する方法および装置
摘要:
【課題】コンピュータ中の並列データベースの性能を監視する方法、装置および製品を提供する。
【解決手段】並列データベースは、コンピュータ中のデータ記憶装置に記憶されている。データベース·ノード群は識別され、識別したデータベース·ノード群から性能統計値を収集するための収集期間を決定する。収集期間中、識別した各ノード群の部分集合から性能統計値を定期的に収集する。収集した性能統計値を、コンピュータに接続されたメモリに記憶し、後続の収集期間中に1個以上のデータベース·ノード群から性能統計値を収集する際に再利用する。
摘要(译)(简体中文):
一种用于监控计算机中并行数据库性能的方法、设备和产品。 
 并行数据库存储在计算机中的数据存储设备中。 识别数据库节点并确定收集周期以从识别的数据库节点收集性能统计数据。 在收集期间,会定期从每个已识别的节点子集收集性能统计信息。 收集到的性能统计信息存储在连接到计算机的内存中,并在后续收集期间从一个或多个数据库节点收集性能统计信息时重复使用。

标题: Automatic download device
摘要: The invention enables the automatic addition of new data to a database by means of a communications line. Communication is periodically established with a center equipped with a memory device and on occasions when it is found that there is new data in the center memory device, space is secured in the terminal memory device for storage of the new data. At the same time the new data is read out of the center memory device and stored in the terminal memory device. In order to secure the requisite data storage space, data which is only infrequently accessed may be deleted from the terminal memory.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 本发明能够通过通信线路将新数据自动添加到数据库中。 周期性地与配备有存储设备的中心建立通信,并且在发现中心存储设备中有新数据的情况下,在终端存储设备中确保空间用于存储新数据。 同时,新数据从中央存储设备中读出并存储在终端存储设备中。 为了保证必要的数据存储空间,可以从终端存储器中删除不经常访问的数据。

标题: Gerät zum Ermitteln von abnormalen Mustern
摘要(译)(简体中文): 异常图案检测设备包括:用于从表示放射线图像的图像信号中找到对象的放射线图像中的预期异常图案的设备;以及用于从图像信号中找到关于对象的解剖学信息的设备。 根据表示每个预期异常图案附近的位置处的图像信息的图像信号的图像信号分量,特征量度计算装置针对每个预期异常图案计算多个特征量度。 异常模式发现装置利用特征量度和解剖学信息以便从预期异常模式中发现真实的异常模式。 <图像>

标题: Apparatus and method for efficiently processing color and monochrome images
摘要: An image processing apparatus comprises an input unit for inputting image data constituting an image to be output, a determination unit for determining whether the image to be output is a monochrome image, a color image having a number of colors larger than a predetermined value or a color image having a number of colors smaller than the predetermined value, and an image processing unit for carrying out image processing on the input image data based on the result of the determination.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 图像处理设备包括:输入单元,用于输入构成要输出的图像的图像数据;确定单元,用于确定要输出的图像是单色图像、具有大于预定值的颜色数量的彩色图像还是彩色图像。 具有小于预定值的颜色数量的彩色图像,以及用于基于确定结果对输入图像数据执行图像处理的图像处理单元。

标题: Method and apparatus for detecting defects of printed circuit patterns
摘要: A printed circuit pattern inspection system, in which the optical image of circuit patterns is transformed into an electrical signal, the signal is converted into a binary digital signal, the connectivity relationship between selected two points of pattern in the form of binary signal is examined, connection data representative of the connectivity relationship and expressed by a pair of numbers given to the points is generated, and the connection data is compared with design data which is produced from design information and expressed in the form of a circulation list of numbers given to points in linkage relationship, whereby determination of defectiveness of patterns is made basing on the result of comparison.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种印刷电路图案检测系统,其中将电路图案的光学图像转换为电信号,将信号转换为二进制数字信号,以二进制信号的形式检查所选图案两点之间的连通关系, 生成代表连通性关系的连接数据,用一对给点的数字表示,并将连接数据与设计数据进行比较,设计数据由设计信息产生,以给点数字的循环列表的形式表示 在联动关系中,根据比较的结果确定图案的缺陷。
发明人: NINOMIYA, TAKANORI | NAKAGAWA, YASUO | SAITO, KEIYA
发明人地址: Dainiyoshiharaso 13-go 1208,Shimokuratacho Totsuka-ku Yokohama,JP | 4-2-604, Chigasaki 2-chome,Chigasaki-shi,JP | Corpo. Kamiooka 103-go 15-26,Morigaoka-2-chome Isogo-ku Yokohama,JP

标题: Digital threshold detector with hysteresis
摘要: As the 8-bit input signal applied to a threshold device reaches a first threshold level, the 1-bit output signal changes from a logical zero to a logical one. The 1-bit output signal is delayed by one system clock period and fed back. The delayed 1-bit output signal is combined (e.g., merged or added) with the 8-bit input signal, and the resulting signal is applied to the threshold device to provide a hysteresis feature. Once the delayed 1-bit output signal becomes a logical one, the input signal has to drop below a second, lower threshold level before the 1-bit output signal can revert back to a logical zero, whereby a margin of noise immunity is provided.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 当施加到阈值器件的8位输入信号达到第一阈值电平时,1位输出信号从逻辑0变为逻辑1。  1 位输出信号延迟一个系统时钟周期并反馈。 延迟的 1 位输出信号与 8 位输入信号组合(例如,合并或相加),并将所得信号应用于阈值设备以提供滞后特性。 一旦延迟的 1 位输出信号变为逻辑 1,输入信号必须下降到低于第二个较低阈值电平,然后 1 位输出信号才能恢复到逻辑零,从而提供了抗噪裕度。

标题: Efficient table-lookup based visually-lossless image compression scheme
摘要: An image compression scheme is disclosed which models the human visual perception system. Using quantization of image error values, according to a visually-lossless scheme, an image can be compressed such that it is visually indistinguishable to the naked eye from the original image. To aid in image compression on portable devices such as a digital camera, the quantization can be precoupled into a look-up table.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 公开了一种模拟人类视觉感知系统的图像压缩方案。 使用图像误差值的量化,根据视觉无损方案,可以压缩图像,使得肉眼在视觉上无法将其与原始图像区分开。 为了帮助便携式设备(例如数码相机)上的图像压缩,可以将量化预耦合到查找表中。

标题: Printer control device
摘要: A printer control device (2) is connected between the output of one or more word processing terminals (12) and the input to a printer (16). The device (2) is also connected to an envelope printer (22) and/or a label printer (21). The device functions to recognise printable control codes inserted into a document text while it is being composed by a word processor operator to identify the beginning and end of address data in a letter. The device controls printing of this address data on envelopes or labels while the letter itself is being printed on the main printer (16).
摘要(译)(简体中文): 打印机控制设备(2)连接在一个或多个字处理终端(12)的输出和打印机(16)的输入之间。 装置(2)还连接到信封打印机(22)和/或标签打印机(21)。 该设备的功能是识别插入到文档文本中的可打印控制代码,同时它由文字处理器操作员组成,以识别字母中地址数据的开头和结尾。 该设备控制在信封或标签上打印此地址数据,同时在主打印机 (16) 上打印信件本身。

标题: Method and apparatus for image processing
摘要: An image processor (10) is provided in which imaging data obtained by an image sensor (12) is processed for purposes of detecting motion. An optical flow field generator (16) processes the image data to provide condition number-based smoothed optical flow vectors, and stores those smoothed vectors in memory (18). The optical flow field stored in memory (18) is accessed and further processed by analyzer (20) for purposes of providing users with information on the motion of objects in the image plane of image sensor (12). Such user information may be displayed on a monitor (22).
摘要(译)(简体中文): 提供了一种图像处理器(10),其中处理由图像传感器(12)获得的成像数据以用于检测运动。 光流场发生器(16)处理图像数据以提供基于条件数的平滑光流矢量,并将那些平滑矢量存储在存储器(18)中。 存储在存储器(18)中的光流场由分析器(20)访问并进一步处理,以便为用户提供关于图像传感器(12)的图像平面中物体运动的信息。 这样的用户信息可以显示在监视器(22)上。
