标题: Method of identifying contour lines
摘要: A contour line of a circle or an object having a configuration close to a circle or a portion thereof is identified by presuming picture image data representing a contour candidate point of the object to be detected among picture image data representing the brightness of one picture in which the object presents, and then scanning the picture image data of a predetermined region containing the picture image.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 圆形或具有接近圆形的形状的物体或其一部分的轮廓线是通过在代表一张图片的亮度的图片图像数据中假定代表要检测的对象的轮廓候选点的图片图像数据来识别的,其中 对象呈现,然后扫描包含图片图像的预定区域的图片图像数据。
当前第一申请(专利权)人: KABUSHIKI KAISHA KOMATSU SEISAKUSHO, A CORP OF JAPAN

标题: Debugging system wherein multiple code views are simultaneously managed
摘要: A computer-implemented method is described for displaying on a screen, a plurality of views of a software code listing. The method includes the steps of displaying a first view-type of at least a portion of the software code listing and selecting and displaying additional view-types of the software code listing. The system includes a prioritized listing of view-types, each view-type providing a different presentation of a code listing. When a program listing in one file presents a call to another file, the system automatically presents a window including the called code listing, with the view-type automatically selected in accordance with the preestablished priority listing. Windows/code views are handled as objects, and are thus immediately recallable using a graphical interface.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 描述了一种用于在屏幕上显示软件代码列表的多个视图的计算机实现的方法。 该方法包括显示软件代码列表的至少一部分的第一视图类型以及选择和显示软件代码列表的附加视图类型的步骤。 该系统包括视图类型的优先列表,每个视图类型提供代码列表的不同表示。 当一个文件中的程序列表出现对另一个文件的调用时,系统会自动显示一个包含被调用代码列表的窗口,并根据预先建立的优先级列表自动选择视图类型。  Windows/代码视图作为对象处理,因此可以使用图形界面立即调用。

标题: Method of determining motion vectors
摘要: In a method of determining motion vectors for a picture signal, in which each picture is divided into blocks and a motion vector is determined for each block in at least two steps, a number of motion vectors being assumed to be possible in each step and a deviation function for each pixel of the block being used for each of these assumed motion vectors, the most favorable vector being selected in dependence upon the value of its deviation function and being selected as one of the assumed vectors for the next step, if any, an optimal insensitivity to noise is obtained in that in the first step a first predetermined value is subtracted from the determined value of the deviation function of the vector having the smallest length, the thus reduced value being subsequently compared with the determined values of the deviation function of the other assumed motion vectors,; and in that in a subsequent step a further predetermined value is subtracted from the value of the deviation function of that assumed motion vector which was determined as the most favorable motion vector in the previous step, and in that the thus reduced value of the deviation function of this vector is compared with the values of the deviation function of the other vectors of the same step for determining the most favorable vector. Each further predetermined valve is allow than the lasts.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 在确定图像信号的运动矢量的方法中,其中每个图像被划分为块并且在至少两个步骤中为每个块确定运动矢量,假设在每个步骤中可能有多个运动矢量并且 用于这些假定运动矢量中的每一个的块的每个像素的偏差函数,根据其偏差函数的值选择最有利的矢量,并被选为下一步的假定矢量之一,如果有的话, 获得对噪声的最佳不敏感度,因为在第一步中,从具有最小长度的向量的偏差函数的确定值中减去第一预定值,随后将因此减小的值与偏差函数的确定值进行比较 其他假设的运动矢量,; 并且在随后的步骤中,从在前一步骤中被确定为最有利的运动矢量的假设运动矢量的偏差函数的值中减去进一步的预定值,并且由此减少的偏差函数的值 将该向量的值与同一步骤的其他向量的偏差函数的值进行比较,以确定最有利的向量。 每个另外的预定阀门都比楦头允许。

标题: Computerized work flow system
摘要: A computerized work flow system and computerized web site generation are disclosed. In one embodiment of the invention, a computerized system includes a work flow server. The server instantiates a process having a plurality of activities, and tracks completion of the plurality of activities as each activity is independently performed. In another embodiment, the work flow server comprises a web application server that receives Internet world-wide-web site orders. The web application server tracks the performance of the orders such that each activity within a work flow of activities is assignable for independent completion by different individuals.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 公开了一种计算机化工作流程系统和计算机化网站生成。 在本发明的一个实施例中,一种计算机化系统包括工作流服务器。 服务器实例化具有多个活动的过程,并在每个活动独立执行时跟踪多个活动的完成。 在另一个实施例中,工作流服务器包括接收因特网万维网站点订单的网络应用服务器。  Web 应用程序服务器跟踪订单的执行情况,以便活动工作流中的每个活动都可以分配给不同的个人独立完成。

标题: Iterative motion estimation process, between a reference image and a current image, and device for canying out the process
摘要: This iterative method for estimating movement consists of carrying out a fixed number of iterations, each iteration consisting of: sampling (8, 9) both images with a resolution which increases for each iteration; detecting characteristic samples in the reference image (11'); estimating a local movement vector (14') for each characteristic sample of the reference image, by initializing this estimation with a movement vector deduced from an estimation of overall movement, carried out during the iteration preceding the current iteration; making an estimation of the overall movement of the current image, by calculating the parameter values of a model (13') from the local movement vectors estimated during the previous iteration.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 这种用于估计运动的迭代方法包括执行固定次数的迭代,每次迭代包括: 对两个图像进行采样(8、9),分辨率随着每次迭代而增加; 检测参考图像中的特征样本(11'); 为参考图像的每个特征样本估计局部运动矢量(14'),通过用从整体运动的估计推导出的运动矢量初始化该估计,在当前迭代之前的迭代期间执行; 通过从先前迭代期间估计的局部运动矢量计算模型(13')的参数值来估计当前图像的整体运动。
[标]当前申请(专利权)人: 汤姆森无线电报总公司
发明人地址: THOMSON-CSF, SCPI, Cédex 67,F-92045 Paris la Défense,FR

标题: 連続音声認識装置
摘要: In a system for recognizing a continuous speech pattern, based on a speech pattern entered through a microphone, a feature vector  alpha i is extracted by a feature extraction unit, and a feature vector beta jn is read out from a reference pattern memory. A first recursive operation unit (DPM1) computes a set of similarity measures Sn(i, j) between the feature vectors. A maximum similarity measure at a time point i is determined and produced by a first decision unit (DSC1) and is stored in a maximum similarity memory (MAX). A second recursive operation unit (DMP2) computes a reversed similarity measure. Based on a computed result g(v, l) and the output from said maximum similarity measure memory, a second decision unit determines a boundary vmax. A word Wu based on data u=vmax-1 obtained by the boundary v is stored as nx(x=1, . . . , Y) in an order reversing unit (REV). The order reversing unit finally reverses the order of data and produces an output nx(x=1, . . . , Y).
摘要(译)(简体中文): 在用于识别连续语音模式的系统中,基于通过麦克风输入的语音模式,特征提取单元提取特征向量α i ,并且从参考模式存储器中读出特征向量β jn 。 第一个递归运算单元 (DPM1) 计算特征向量之间的一组相似性度量 Sn(i, j)。 在时间点i的最大相似度度量由第一决策单元(DSC1)确定和产生,并存储在最大相似度存储器(MAX)中。 第二个递归运算单元 (DMP2) 计算反向相似性度量。 基于计算结果g(v,l)和来自所述最大相似性度量存储器的输出,第二决策单元确定边界vmax。 基于由边界v获得的数据u=vmax-1的词Wu在顺序反转单元(REV)中存储为nx(x=1,...,Y)。 顺序反转单元最终反转数据的顺序并产生输出nx(x=1,...,Y)。
发明人: NOJIRI TADAO | ASADA HIROSHIGE | TERAURA NOBUYUKI

标题: Parameter estimation apparatus
摘要: An output parameter estimation apparatus for estimating an output parameter from an input data set that is composed of a plurality of input parameters and that is obtained whenever sampling time series input data. In this output parameter estimation apparatus, a fuzzy inference rule is used to calculate a fitness degree of the input data set in one of a plurality of fields included in a space that is formed using at least one input parameter. According to the calculated fitness degree, introduction routes through which the input data set is to be inputted into a neural network are selected. The neural network is set in a connection condition corresponding to the field to which the input data set belongs, the connection condition having been determined in advance as a result of learning process. With this connection condition, the neural network estimates the output parameter from the input data set inputted through the selected introduction routes.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种输出参数估计装置,用于从输入数据集估计输出参数,该输入数据集由多个输入参数组成并且每次采样时序输入数据时获得。 在该输出参数估计装置中,使用模糊推理规则来计算输入数据集在包括在使用至少一个输入参数形成的空间中的多个字段之一中的适合度。 根据计算出的适应度,选择输入数据集输入神经网络的引入路径。 神经网络被设置在与输入数据集所属的领域相对应的连接条件中,连接条件已经作为学习处理的结果预先确定。 在这个连接条件下,神经网络从通过选择的引入路径输入的输入数据集估计输出参数。
[标]当前申请(专利权)人: 松下电器产业株式会社

标题: 信號源特性化系統
摘要: 一種源特性化系統(8)，其始自諸源(S1-Sn)之主信號 X(t)之線性迴旋式混合體E(t)，而確定信號F(t)，此信號構成至少一個主信號X(t)特性變量之概值。此變量可屬一平均能量，一頻譜密度，一自我相關函數。預處理器(20)將各混合體之信號E(t)，在其施加至源分離器(10)之前，即預先加以處理。該所測得之變量可做為諸源運作上之逆反應。參考：圖１用途：發送及／或接收電性，聲音或電磁信號裝置之控制。
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种源特性化系统(8),其始自诸源(S1-Sn)之主信号X(t)之线性回旋式混合体E(t),而确定信号F(t),此信号构成至少一个 主信号X(t)特性变量之概值。 此变量可属一平均能量,一频谱密度,一自我相关函数。 预处理器(20)将各混合体之信号E(t),在其施加至源分离器(10)之前,即预先加以处理。 该所测得之变量可做为诸源运作上之逆反应。 参考:图1用途:发送及/或接收电性,声音或电磁信号装置之控制。
[标]当前申请(专利权)人: 皇家飞利浦电子股份有限公司
当前第一申请(专利权)人: 皇家飛利浦電子股份有限公司

标题: Object recognition system for a robot
摘要: A method and a system for recognizing the location of a cylindrical shaft is provided for use in positioning an end effector of an industrial robot which handles said shaft. In the method and system, a multilevel gray image of the cylindrical shaft which is generated by a change coupled device (CCD) image sensor is first differentiated, and the absolute values of picture elements constituting the differentiated gray image are then binarized on the basis of a threshold value so as to extract an accentuated pattern image which is inherent to the shape of the cylindrical shaft. The accentuated pattern image thus extracted is then collated with a reference accentuated pattern image (template) so as to generate a normal curve signal which has its peak point at a position where the axis of said cylindrical shaft is located. The normal curve data is then binarized on the basis of another predetermined threshold value to generate a single strip image. The center of the single strip image is calculated to determine the location of the cylindrical shaft.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 提供了一种用于识别圆柱形轴的位置的方法和系统,用于定位处理所述轴的工业机器人的末端执行器。 在该方法和系统中,首先对由变化耦合器件(CCD)图像传感器生成的圆柱轴的多级灰度图像进行微分,然后将构成微分后的灰度图像的像素的绝对值基于下式进行二值化处理。 阈值以提取圆柱轴形状固有的强调图案图像。 然后将如此提取的强调图案图像与参考强调图案图像(模板)进行对照,以生成其峰值点在所述圆柱轴的轴线所在的位置处的正曲线信号。 然后基于另一个预定阈值对正态曲线数据进行二值化以生成单个条带图像。 计算单条图像的中心以确定圆柱轴的位置。
发明人: SUGITA, KAZUHIKO | HOTTA, SHIGEO | MATSUDA, OSAMU | YAMAKAWA, YOICHI
发明人地址: Anjyo, JP | Nagoya, JP | Kariya, JP

标题: Speech recognition system and method for properly recognizing a compound word composed of a plurality of words
摘要: A speech recognition system and method having an increased recognition accuracy for a compound word composed of a first word and a second word. Standard information corresponding to each of the registered words is stored. The standard information includes predetermined feature information and time information with respect to each of the registered words. The time information represents a continuous time length for pronouncing each of the registered words at a normal speed. Feature information extracted from an input word is compared with the standard information to obtain a similarity between the feature information and the standard information corresponding to one of the registered words. A determination time is set to determine a result of recognition when the compound word is input and when a first degree of similarity is obtained from the first word at a first time and a maximum degree of similarity is obtained from one of the second word and the compound word at a second time. The determination time is set to a time prior to the second time, by the continuous time length which corresponds to the one of the second word and the compound word having the maximum degree of similarity.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种语音识别系统和方法,对由第一词和第二词组成的复合词具有提高的识别准确度。 对应于每个注册词的标准信息被存储。 标准信息包括关于每个登记词的预定特征信息和时间信息。 时间信息表示用于以正常速度发音每个注册单词的连续时间长度。 将从输入词中提取的特征信息与标准信息进行比较,以获得特征信息与对应于其中一个注册词的标准信息之间的相似度。 当输入复合词时,在第一时间从第一词获得第一相似度并且从第二词和第二词中的一个获得最大相似度时,设置确定时间来确定识别结果。 第二次复合词。 确定时间被设置为比第二时间早于与第二词和具有最大相似度的复合词之一相对应的连续时间长度的时间。

标题: 紙幣辨識裝置
摘要: 本發明係關於紙幣辨識裝置，該裝置包括一個光源以便投射一道刺激在光一張紙幣的表面上，一具光電倍增器以便回應於使用該刺激光之照射而以光電方式探測自紙幣之表面所發射之光並產生所探測之資料相當於所探測之光的數量，一具ＲＯＭ以便儲存參考資料及一具ＣＰＵ用來比較經由光電倍增器所產生之所探測資料與經儲存入ＲＯＭ中之參考資料並辨識紙幣。
摘要(译)(简体中文): 本发明系关于纸币辨识装置,该装置包括一个光源以便投射一道刺激在光一张纸币的表面上,一具光电倍增器以便回应于使用该刺激光之照射而以光电方式探测自纸币之表面所发射 之光并产生所探测之资料相当于所探测之光的数量,一具ROM以便储存参考资料及一具CPU用来比较经由光电倍增器所产生之所探测资料与经储存入ROM中之参考资料 并辨识纸币。

标题: 可攜式玩具,可攜式資訊終端機,娛樂系統及記錄媒體
摘要: 一種插入娛樂裝置之可攜式資訊終端機，其作動猶如具有生命般，而可以與使用者交談。可攜式資訊終端機包括一顯示單元（１３０）及圍繞該顯示單元的外殼（２００）。顯示單元（１３０）及該外殼（２００）分別表示頭部及身體。顯示單元（１３０）的功能至少可作為表現臉部表情形態（２０６）之機構。顯示單元（１３０）包括一顯示幕，用以顯示影像處理器所產生之影像資料的影像。影像處理器具有臉部表情顯示控制器，用以讀取由臉部表情選擇器所選取之多個臉部表情資訊的其中之一，並顯示一動態的影像，此影像係依據混成技術從現在的臉部表情變換至讀取之表情資訊的臉部表情。
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种插入娱乐装置之可携式资讯终端机,其作动犹如具有生命般,而可以与使用者交谈。 可携式资讯终端机包括一显示单元(130)及围绕该显示单元的外壳(200)。 显示单元(130)及该外壳(200)分别表示头部及身体。 显示单元(130)的功能至少可作为表现脸部表情形态(206)之机构。 显示单元(130)包括一显示幕,用以显示影像处理器所产生之影像资料的影像。 影像处理器具有脸部表情显示控制器,用以读取由脸部表情选择器所选取之多个脸部表情资讯的其中之一,并显示一动态的影像,此影像系依据混成技术从现在 的脸部表情变换至读取之表情资讯的脸部表情。

标题: Image signal processing apparatus for use in color image reproduction
摘要: A color multi-function type copying machine is disclosed which includes an image input unit for optically sensing an input image and generating an image signal. A function memory stores an ink color used in a color frame to be written in the input image in order to designate its partial image region and a specific image edit function assigned to the ink color and desired to be executed by an operator so that the ink color and the specific image edit function can be rewritten. When a closed loop-like color frame of a selected color is written in the input image, a color frame region detecting unit detects a shape and a color of the color frame. In response to the detection result, the memory is accessed to determine an image edit function corresponding to a first selected ink color of the detected color frame. A color edit unit executes one or a plurality of image signal processing corresponding to the determined image edit function for the input image signal. The edited image signal is supplied to a color printing unit via a signal processing unit and is reproduced therein.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 公开了一种彩色多功能型复印机,其包括用于光学感测输入图像并产生图像信号的图像输入单元。 功能存储器存储在要写入输入图像的颜色帧中使用的墨水颜色,以指定其部分图像区域,以及分配给墨水颜色并希望由操作员执行的特定图像编辑功能,从而使墨水 颜色和特定的图像编辑功能可以重写。 当在输入图像中写入所选颜色的闭环状彩色框时,彩色框区域检测单元检测彩色框的形状和颜色。 响应于检测结果,访问存储器以确定对应于检测到的颜色帧的第一选择墨水颜色的图像编辑功能。 颜色编辑单元对输入图像信号执行对应于所确定的图像编辑功能的一个或多个图像信号处理。 经编辑的图像信号经由信号处理单元提供给彩色打印单元并在其中再现。

标题: A transcoder
摘要: A transcoder for the conversion of video signals between a first and a second coding scheme employing motion compensation comprises a decoder (28) for decoding a received data stream encoded according to a first coding scheme and an encoder (30) for encoding a data stream from the decoder into a data stream according to a second coding scheme. The decoder (28) extracts motion vectors from the received data stream and passes them (42) to the data stream of the encoder, so avoiding the recalculation of the motion vectors. Drift compensation means (52-64; 70-78) may be provided to compensate for any resulting drift after a picture frame.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种用于在采用运动补偿的第一和第二编码方案之间转换视频信号的代码转换器包括用于解码根据第一编码方案编码的接收数据流的解码器(28)和用于对来自的数据流进行编码的编码器(30)。 解码器根据第二编码方案转换成数据流。 解码器(28)从接收的数据流中提取运动矢量并将它们(42)传递给编码器的数据流,从而避免重新计算运动矢量。 可以提供漂移补偿装置(52-64;70-78)来补偿图片帧之后的任何产生的漂移。
发明人: NILSSON MICHAEL ERLING | MORRISON DAVID GEOFFREY | GHANBARI MOHAMMED

标题: Camera provided with a voice recognition device
摘要: In a camera, apparatus and methods for recording or storing voiced in messages in message memory associated with an exposed image frame for reproduction as an annotation with prints made from the exposed image frames. The camera includes a voice recognition system for voice recognition of words spoken by the user before the words are stored in message memory. Fixed and adjustable vocabularies are provided for use in the voice recognition. The adjustable vocabulary may be loaded into the camera by a vocabulary memory card or through an interface with a docking station of a personal computer or vending machine so that an adjustable vocabulary of words of interest to the camera user or related to a scene or event of photographic interest may be employed in the voice recognition. The messages may be recorded on magnetic film layers or stored in camera on-board memory or in detachable message memory modules to be forwarded with the exposed film strip to a photofinisher for read out and printing on the prints. The messages may be stored or recorded by the user in real time with each exposure or at an earlier or later time.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 在照相机、设备和方法中,用于记录或存储与曝光图像帧相关联的消息存储器中的语音消息,用于再现作为注释,其中印刷品由曝光图像帧制成。 该相机包括一个语音识别系统,用于在用户说出的单词被存储在消息存储器中之前对其进行语音识别。 提供了固定和可调整的词汇表以用于语音识别。 可调节词汇可以通过词汇存储卡或通过与个人计算机或自动售货机的扩展坞的接口加载到摄像机中,从而摄像机用户感兴趣或与场景或事件相关的可调节词汇 在语音识别中可以使用照片兴趣。 信息可以记录在磁性胶片层上或存储在相机机载存储器或可拆卸信息存储器模块中,以便与曝光的胶卷一起转发给照相洗印厂,以便读出并打印在照片上。 消息可以由用户在每次曝光时实时存储或记录,或者在更早或更晚的时间存储或记录。
发明人: BERNARDI, BRYAN DAVID, C/O EASTMAN KODAK COMPANY | MCINTYRE, DALE FREDERICK, EASTMAN KODAK COMPANY | DUNSMORE, CLAY ALLEN, C/O EASTMAN KODAK COMPANY | WOLCOTT, DANA WHITNEY, C/O EASTMAN KODAK COMPANY

标题: Method of recognizing a screw hole and screwing method based on the recognition
摘要: Deviation between an upper portion and a lower portion of a screw hole is recognized. This is accomplished by imaging holes in respective objects to obtain a contrast image. The position of the hole in the upper object and the lower object is detected. The deviation between the positions is calculated. Screws are tightened sequentially beginning with the hole having the smallest deviation. The rotation angle of the object to be tightened is determined. From this rotation angle, the deviation of other holes is calculated.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 识别出螺纹孔的上部和下部之间的偏差。 这是通过对各个对象中的孔进行成像以获得对比图像来实现的。 检测上层物体和下层物体的孔的位置。 计算位置之间的偏差。 从偏差最小的孔开始依次拧紧螺钉。 确定要拧紧的物体的旋转角度。 从这个旋转角度,计算其他孔的偏差。

标题: 資料讀取系統、裝置及集中管理型卡拉OK伴唱裝置
摘要:
本發明之目的，係擬獲得一種個別地以公同之集中管理裝置來控制複數部之資料供給裝置之同時，可縮短所需要之電纜之總延長線長之資料讀取系統。
為此，如圖２所示，集中管理裝置１４係將讀取有關資訊與指定複數部之資料供給裝置１８之個個用之指定資訊一齊輸出於電纜２２。個個資料供給裝置１８，則經由電纜２２所供給之指定資訊若為表示本身之資訊時，就予以處理該讀取有關（相關）資訊，而在表示其他資料供給裝罝之資訊時，就不予以處理。讀取有關資訊成為僅於所指定之資料供給裝置方予以處理，因而，能以公同（公用）電纜２２來連接集中管理裝置１４和複數部之資料供給裝置為一齊。故可縮短所需要之電纜總延長線，而可圖謀降低成本。
摘要(译)(简体中文):
本发明之目的,系拟获得一种个别地以公同之集中管理装置来控制复数部之资料供给装置之同时,可缩短所需要之电缆之总延长线长之资料读取系统。 
 为此,如图2所示,集中管理装置14系将读取有关资讯与指定复数部之资料供给装置18之个个用之指定资讯一齐输出于电缆22。 个个资料供给装置18,则经由电缆22所供给之指定资讯若为表示本身之资讯时,就予以处理该读取有关(相关)资讯,而在表示其他资料供给装罝之资讯时,就不 予以处理。 读取有关资讯成为仅于所指定之资料供给装置方予以处理,因而,能以公同(公用)电缆22来连接集中管理装置14和复数部之资料供给装置为一齐。 故可缩短所需要之电缆总延长线,而可图谋降低成本。

标题: 局所異常の排除による動きベクトルフィールド生成装置およびその方法
摘要:
【目的】 動きベクトルフィールドの生成において、従来の技術で問題とされていたオクルージョンや不連続な動きによる動きベクトルフィールドの評価への影響をなくし、かつ動きベクトルフィールド生成時の演算オーバーヘッドを減じる。
【構成】 現在の画像フレームの画像成分と他の画像フレームの対応する画像成分との動きを示す動きベクトルフィールドを生成する装置であって、それぞれの動きベクトル値の初期値を生成する初期化手段と、現在の目標動きベクトルに対するエネルギー関数値を生成する手段であって、ある近傍動きベクトルと目標動きベクトルとの差が閾値よりも大きい場合にはこの近傍動きベクトルを排除するエネルギー関数値生成手段と、各動きベクトル値を修正することによって現在の画像のエネルギー関数を最小化するエネルギー最小化手段とを備えている動きベクトルフィールド生成装置。
摘要(译)(简体中文):
本发明的一个目的是消除在现有技术中一直存在问题的遮挡和不连续运动对运动矢量场的评估的影响,并减少运动矢量场生成期间的计算开销。 
 一种用于生成指示当前图像帧的图像分量与另一图像帧的对应图像分量之间的运动的运动矢量场的装置,包括用于为每个运动矢量值生成初始值的初始化装置和用于产生初始值的能量函数值生成装置。为当前目标运动向量生成能量函数值,能量函数值生成装置用于在相邻运动向量与目标运动向量之间的差值大于阈值时排除相邻运动向量。能量最小化装置用于最小化通过修改每个运动矢量值来获得当前图像的能量函数。

标题: 属性判定方法
摘要:
【目的】 正答率が高く、信頼性の高い属性判定を行う。
【構成】 入力画像に含まれる入力パターンの複数の特徴データと標準パターンから求めた特徴データのメンバシップ関数とを比較し、この入力パターンの各特徴データに対する各メンバシップ関数の出力値を得ることを全ての特徴データに対して行って全ての特徴データに対する出力値の総合値を求め、これを判定すべき多数の各標準パターンに対して行い、最も総合点の高い標準パターンを判別することにより入力パターンに最も類似度の高い標準パターンを判定する。
摘要(译)(简体中文):
[目的] 以高正确率进行高可靠的属性判断。 
 将输入图像中包含的输入图案的多个特征数据与从标准图案获得的特征数据的隶属函数进行比较,获得该输入图案的每个特征数据的每个隶属函数的输出值。在所有特征数据上得到所有特征数据的输出值的总和,对大量待判断的标准模式中的每一个进行此操作,确定总分最高的标准模式。确定与输入模式相似度最高的。

标题: Optisches Mustererkennungsgerät
发明人: IWAKI TADAO,JP | MITSUOKA YASUYUKI,JP | YOSHIKAWA TOMOHIRO,JP

标题: DISPOSITIF DE COMMUNICATION ENTRE UN RESEAU NEURONAL ET UN SYSTEME UTILISATEUR PAR L'INTERMEDIAIRE D'UN BUS
摘要: Ce dispositif comporte pour chaque neurone [1 (1, 1) à 1 (3, 3) ] de de la matrice, un convertisseur activité/ fréquence [2 (1, 1) à 2 (3, 3) ] destiné à fournir des impulsions d'activité. Ces impulsions sont codées dans des codeurs (4a, 4b) puis appliquées au bus de communication.Selon l'invention, des moyens d'arbitrage comprennent, pour chaque convertisseur, un circuit [18 (1, 1) à 18 (3, 3) ] de de commande d'inhibition et des moyens de blocage (14, 15, 16, 17) connectés en commun à tous les convertisseurs pour leur transmettre une commande de blocage temporaire.Chaque circuit de commande [18 (1, 1) à 18 (3, 3) ] est agencé pour détecter la présence d'une impulsion à la sortie de son convertisseur associé et pour, pendant la présence d'une telle impulsion, activer les moyens de blocage pour qu'ils transmettent aux autres convertisseurs, ladite commande de blocage temporaire de leur fonctionnement.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 该设备包括一个由神经元 (2(i,j)) 组成的活动/频率转换器,旨在在其输出处提供频率代表该神经元活动的脉冲。 与神经元矩阵相关的转换器的输出连接到编码器 (4),通过该编码器,脉冲在神经元被赋予它们自己的二进制代码,从而导致产生。 编码器 (4) 连接到总线 (5),将代码传输到用户系统 (6)。 该系统还包括一个仲裁器,它确定由神经元产生的不同代码在总线 (5) 上的连续顺序。

标题: Method for controlling a telecommunication service and a terminal
摘要: Prior to a call, a command vocabulary (13) and control signals (14) corresponding to the command words are stored in the terminal. A phone number is dialed (21) and the call is connected. Speech from the user is received (24) in the terminal. A command word in the user's speech (26) is recognized (25) in the terminal. A control signal corresponding to the command word is read (27) in the terminal, and the control signal read is sent (28) from the terminal to the system in order to control the telecommunication service. The control signal is formed e.g. of a dual tone multifrequency (DTMF) code sequence.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 在呼叫之前,命令词汇表(13)和对应于命令字的控制信号(14)存储在终端中。 拨打电话号码 (21) 并接通电话。 在终端中接收(24)来自用户的语音。 用户语音 (26) 中的命令词在终端中被识别 (25)。 在终端中读取(27)对应于命令字的控制信号,并且将读取的控制信号从终端发送(28)到系统以控制电信服务。 控制信号例如形成 双音多频 (DTMF) 代码序列。
法律状态/事件: 期限届满 | 质押 | 权利转移

标题: Method of recognizing a fingerprint
摘要: PCT No. PCT/DE87/00134 Sec. 371 Date Nov. 27, 1987 Sec. 102(e) Date Nov. 27, 1987 PCT Filed Mar. 26, 1987 PCT Pub. No. WO87/05790 PCT Pub. Date Oct. 8, 1987.A method of detecting fingerprints by sensing scanning with ultrasonic waves. For comparison, an acoustic hologram of the characteristics of the respective finger is disposed in an identification card. The hologram is compared in a recognition device with an ultrasonic interference pattern which is obtained by reflection of ultrasonic waves at an interface formed between the surface of the finger and a planar application or support surface.
摘要(译)(简体中文): PCT 编号 PCT/DE87/00134 秒。  371 日期 1987 年 11 月 27 日 102(e) 日期 1987 年 11 月 27 日 PCT 1987 年 3 月 26 日提交 PCT Pub. 编号 WO87/05790 PCT 公开。 日期 1987 年 10 月 8 日。一种通过超声波感应扫描检测指纹的方法。 为了比较,将各个手指的特征的声学全息图设置在识别卡中。 全息图在识别装置中与超声波干涉图案进行比较,超声波干涉图案是通过在手指表面与平面应用或支撑表面之间形成的界面处的超声波反射而获得的。
法律状态/事件: 期限届满 | 权利转移

标题: Information retrieval
摘要: An information retrieval system adapted for an electronic dictionary comprises, an input device actuated for entering an entry word, a memory circuit adapted for storing a word equivalent to the entry word and the number of a track related to the word, a video disk for recording information related to the word, the information being random accessed, and an access circuit responsive to the number of the track specified by the memory circuit for accessing the video disk to access the information from the video disk.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种适用于电子词典的信息检索系统,包括:输入装置,用于输入词条;存储电路,用于存储与词条等效的词和与该词相关的磁道编号;用于记录的视盘 与字有关的信息,该信息是随机存取的,以及一个存取电路,该存取电路响应由存储器电路指定的磁道号来存取该视盘以存取来自视盘的信息。

标题: Knowledge and model based adaptive signal processor
摘要: A knowledge and model based adaptive signal processor for ensuring optimum performance in automated object recognition (AOR) systems. The invention does not require ground-truth information but uses predictive performance models for parameter adaption and updates for the AOR. The performance models are representations of continuous surfaces that interpolate and extrapolate for data and scenarios not previously tested. The present invention increases probability of detection and decreases false detection alarm rates of AOR systems.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 基于知识和模型的自适应信号处理器,用于确保自动对象识别 (AOR) 系统的最佳性能。 本发明不需要地面实况信息,而是使用预测性能模型来进行AOR的参数适应和更新。 性能模型是对先前未测试的数据和场景进行插值和外推的连续表面的表示。 本发明增加了检测概率并降低了AOR系统的误检测报警率。
发明人: NASR, HATEM N. | SADJADI, FIROOZ A. | BAZAKOS, MICHAEL E. | AMEHDI, HOSSIEN
发明人地址: Edina, MN | St. Anthony, MN | Bloomington, MN

标题: System zur maschinellen Übersetzung HINTERGRUND DER ERFINDUNG(1) Gebiet der Erfindung
摘要(译)(简体中文): 机器翻译系统能够借助于特定的词典（6）自动且正确地分析具有第一语言的插入注释的句子。该词典包括第一词典（6c，6e），根据第二词典（6c，6e）提取和分析插入的评论；第二词典（6d），根据第二词典（6d）分析句子中除插入评论之外的其他部分。对插入的评论的分析和对其他部分的分析相结合以获得对整个句子的分析。根据对被组合的句子的分析，产生第二语言的翻译句子。此外，翻译后的插入评论以可区分的方式显示。即，用于显示插入的注释的符号被添加到翻译的插入的注释。显示翻译后的句子，以便将插入的注释和符号包括在内。
发明人: AMANO SHIN-YA | AOYAMA CHIAKI | MIIKE SEIJI 554 TOSHIBAHIYOSHI-RYO | NOGAMI HIROYASU B-214 TOSHIBAISOGODAIROKU-RYO | TAKEDA KIMIHITO

标题: 生体識別装置
摘要:
【課題】 指紋照合時に、指紋画像入力対象物が生体であるか否かを確実に認識できるようにする。
【解決手段】 指紋照合者は、指紋照合時、指1をスライドさせることにより、指紋入力を行う。その際、指1と生体電位導出部3-1,3-2 及び生体電位接地部5とが接触するようにする。指1をスライドすると、筋電位の変動が生じ、それに対応した電気信号が生体電位導出部3-1,3-2 及び生体電位接地部5から導出され、生体信号増幅部6に送られる。生体信号増幅部6は、生体電位接地部5の電位を接地電位として生体電位導出部3-1,3-2 から導出される電気信号の差分を増幅して出力する。指1をスライドさせた場合には、生体特有の信号となるが、不正者が指1の代わりにレプリカをスライドさせた場合には、変動のない信号となるので、その違いにより、生体信号識別部8は、生体か否かを識別する。
摘要(译)(简体中文):
[问题] 在指纹核对时可靠地识别指纹图像输入对象是否是活体。 
 解决方案:指纹核对器通过在指纹核对期间滑动手指 1 来执行指纹输入。 此时,手指1与生物电势引出部3-1和3-2以及生物电势接地部5接触。 当手指1滑动时,肌电位发生波动,生物电位导出单元3-1、3-2和生物电位接地单元5导出相应的电信号,送至生物信号放大单元6。 生物信号放大器6使用生物电势接地单元5的电势作为地电势来放大来自生物电势引出单元3-1和3-2的电信号之间的差,并且输出放大的差。 当手指1滑动时,获得活体特有的信号,但当欺诈者滑动复制品而不是手指1时,信号没有波动。单元8识别对象是否是活体.
发明人地址: 東京都港区芝五丁目7番1号  日本電気株式会社内

标题: SPRACHSYNTHESE
摘要: A speech synthesis system comprises a phonological converter (10), a word parser (11), a syllable parser (12), temporal and parametric interpreters (13, 14), a file (15) and a synthesizer (16). The word parser (11) and syllable parser (10) receive an input text which includes words in a defined word class. The word parser (11) parses each word to determine whether it belongs to the defined class of words. The parser (11) includes a knowledge base containing the individual morphemes utilized in the defined word class, each morpheme being a root or an affix, the binding properties of each root and each affix, the binding properties for each affix also defining the binding properties of the combination of the affix and another affix or another root, and a set of rules defining the manner in which the roots and affixes may be combined to form words. The syllable parser (10) determines the phonological features of the constituents of each syllable of the input text. The metrical parser (12) determines the stress pattern of the syllables of each word. The temporal and parametric interpreters (13, 14) interpret the phonological features together with the stress pattern to produce a series of sets of parametric values for driving the synthesizer (16). The synthesizer (16) produces a speech waveform. If desired, the parameter values may be stored in the file (15) for later use.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种语音合成系统,包括音位转换器(10)、单词解析器(11)、音节解析器(12)、时间和参数解释器(13、14)、文件(15)和合成器(16)。 词解析器(11)和音节解析器(10)接收包括定义词类中的词的输入文本。 词解析器(11)解析每个词以确定它是否属于定义的词类。 解析器(11)包括包含在定义的词类中使用的各个词素的知识库,每个词素是词根或词缀,每个词根和每个词缀的绑定属性,每个词缀的绑定属性还定义绑定属性 词缀和另一个词缀或另一个词根的组合,以及定义词根和词缀可以组合成词的方式的一组规则。 音节解析器(10)确定输入文本的每个音节的成分的语音特征。 韵律解析器(12)确定每个单词的音节的重读模式。 时间和参数解释器 (13, 14) 将语音特征与重音模式一起解释,以产生一系列参数值集,用于驱动合成器 (16)。 合成器(16)产生语音波形。 如果需要,可以将参数值存储在文件 (15) 中以供以后使用。

标题: Speech pattern recognition system
Neuron unit for processing digital information
摘要: A neuron unit includes first shift registers for storing first weighting coefficients; second shift registers for storing second weighting coefficients; a first gate circuit for obtaining first logical products of first binary input signals and the first weighting coefficients; a second gate circuit for obtaining second logical products of second binary input signals and the second weighting coefficients; a third gate circuit for obtaining a logical sum of the first logical products, and for outputting a first binary response signal corresponding to the logical sum; a fourth gate circuit for obtaining a logical sum of the second logical products, and for outputting a second binary response signal corresponding to the logical sum; a signal generator for outputting a binary signal; and an output circuit for outputting a binary output signal, the first binary response signal being used as the binary output signal when values of the first and second binary response signals differ from each other, and the binary signal output from the signal generator being used as the binary output signal when values of the first and second binary response signals are equal to each other.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 神经元单元包括用于存储第一加权系数的第一移位寄存器; 第二移位寄存器,用于存储第二加权系数; 第一门电路,用于获得第一二进制输入信号和第一加权系数的第一逻辑乘积; 第二门电路,用于获得第二二进制输入信号与第二加权系数的第二逻辑积; 第三门电路,用于获得第一逻辑积的逻辑和,并输出对应于逻辑和的第一二进制响应信号; 第四门电路,用于获得第二逻辑积的逻辑和,并输出对应于逻辑和的第二二进制响应信号; 用于输出二进制信号的信号发生器; 以及用于输出二进制输出信号的输出电路,当第一和第二二进制响应信号的值彼此不同时,第一二进制响应信号被用作二进制输出信号,并且从信号发生器输出的二进制信号被用作 当第一和第二二进制响应信号的值彼此相等时的二进制输出信号。

标题: Method and system for providing a probe array chip design database
摘要: Systems and method for organizing information relating to the design of polymer probe array chips including oligonucleotide array chips. A database model is provided which organizes information interrelating probes on a chip, genomic items investigated by the chip, and sequence information relating to the design of the chip. The model is readily translatable into database languages such as SQL. The database model scales to permit storage of information about large numbers of chips having complex designs.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 用于组织与包括寡核苷酸阵列芯片的聚合物探针阵列芯片的设计有关的信息的系统和方法。 提供了一个数据库模型,该模型组织了与芯片上的探针、芯片研究的基因组项目以及与芯片设计有关的序列信息相关的信息。 该模型很容易翻译成数据库语言,例如 SQL。 数据库模型可扩展以允许存储有关具有复杂设计的大量芯片的信息。
发明人: BALABAN, DAVID J. | HUBBELL, EARL A. | MITTMANN, MICHAEL P. | CHEUNG, GLORIA | DAI, JOSIE
发明人地址: San Rafael, CA | Los Angeles, CA | Palo Alto, CA | Cupertino, CA | San Jose, CA

标题: Control of nucleic acid amplification procedures including the polymerase chain reaction (PCR)
摘要: A system for optimising the cycling conditions used to control a polymerase chain reaction assigns membership values for denaturation, annealing and extension events in order to determine the relative contribution of each event during the reaction, and using genetic algorithms to determine the optimum times required to complete each event.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 用于优化用于控制聚合酶链式反应的循环条件的系统为变性、退火和延伸事件分配成员值,以确定每个事件在反应过程中的相对贡献,并使用遗传算法确定完成所需的最佳时间 每个事件。
发明人: CLARKSON, JOHN MICHAEL | COBB, BENJAMIN DAVID

标题: Speech information compression trasmission method
Data base locking
摘要: A data base system in which records are locked out during record changing by using a dynamically generated directed acyclic graph of the records. The edges of the graph, stored in the records themselves, point toward a "root" record representing multiply-shared information. An application to the assignment of telephone facilities to telephone subscribers is also described. A transaction list is maintained to identify locked out records previously locked out during the same transaction.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种数据库系统,其中通过使用动态生成的记录的有向无环图在记录更改期间锁定记录。 存储在记录本身中的图的边缘指向表示多重共享信息的“根”记录。 还描述了将电话设施分配给电话用户的应用。 维护交易列表以识别先前在同一交易期间被锁定的锁定记录。
[标]当前申请(专利权)人: 日本東京都港區芝自金三光町273
发明人: GOLDSTEIN ALAN JAY | NUSSER TERRY RAY
法律状态/事件: 未缴年费 | 许可 | 权利转移

标题: Method and apparatus for parallel processing in a database system
摘要: The present invention implements parallel processing in a Database Management System. The present invention provides the ability to locate transaction and recovery information at one location and eliminates the need for read locks and two-phased commits. The present invention provides the ability to dynamically partition row sources for parallel processing. Parallelism is based on the ability to parallelize a row source, the partitioning requirements of consecutive row sources and the entire row source tree, and any specification in the structured query language (SQL) statement. A Query Coordinator (802) assumes control of the processing of an entire query and can execute serial row sources (804, 806). Additional threads of control, Query Servers, execute parallel operators. Parallel operators are called data flow operators (DFOs).; A DFO is represented as SQL statements and can be executed concurrently by multiple processes, or query slaves. A central scheduling mechanism, a data flow scheduler, controls a parallelized portion of an execution plan, and can become invisible for serial execution. Table queues are used to partition and transport rows between sets of processes. Node linkages provide the ability to divide the plan into independent lists that can each be executed by a set of query slaves. The present invention maintains a bit vector that is used by a subsequent producer to determine whether any rows need to be produced to its consumers. The present invention uses states and a count of the slaves that have reached these states to perform its scheduling tasks.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 本发明在数据库管理系统中实现并行处理。 本发明提供了在一个位置定位事务和恢复信息的能力并且消除了对读锁和两阶段提交的需要。 本发明提供动态划分行源以进行并行处理的能力。 并行性基于并行化行源的能力、连续行源和整个行源树的分区要求以及结构化查询语言 (SQL) 语句中的任何规范。 查询协调器(802)承担对整个查询处理的控制,并且可以执行串行行源(804、806)。 附加的控制线程查询服务器执行并行运算符。 并行算子称为数据流算子(DFO)。  DFO 表示为 SQL 语句,可以由多个进程或查询从属并发执行。 中央调度机制,即数据流调度器,控制执行计划的并行化部分,并且对于串行执行可能变得不可见。 表队列用于在进程集之间划分和传输行。 节点链接提供了将计划划分为独立列表的能力,每个列表都可以由一组查询从属执行。 本发明维护一个位向量,供后续生产者使用以确定是否需要向其消费者生产任何行。 本发明使用状态和已达到这些状态的从属设备的计数来执行其调度任务。
法律状态/事件: 期限届满 | 权利转移

标题: Apparatus and process for the detection and counting of rarely occurring mammalian cells
摘要: Apparatus and process capable of rapid detection and counting of rarely occuring mammalian cells in blood and other tissues which have been labeled with a fluorescent dye. The process includes: scanning a solid support on which a specimen potentially containing fluorescent cells has been deposited, with an incident beam from a laser, forming a laser spot on the solid support, the laser spot being substantially greater than the cells to be detected, the laser spot size being between 15 and 30 mu m; and simultaneously: detecting the resultant fluorescent light at least at one wavelength; establishing a set of correlated-features by a line-to-line correlation of individual features; comparing the correlated-features on each pair of adjacent lines in time synchrony, at least at two different wavelengths lambda 1 and lambda 2; making a size discrimination of retained events and selecting those having a size corresponding to the type of cells searched; determining if, for retained events after size discrimination, the events energy profile in three dimensions is within predetermined Gaussian shape criteria; and counting the remaining events to determine and to count exclusively the fluorescent cells present on the solid support.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 能够快速检测和计数血液和其他组织中已用荧光染料标记的罕见哺乳动物细胞的设备和方法。 该过程包括:用来自激光器的入射光束扫描其上已沉积可能含有荧光细胞的样本的固体支持物,在固体支持物上形成激光点,该激光点显着大于待检测的细胞, 激光光斑尺寸在15-30微米之间; 并且同时: 检测产生的至少一种波长的荧光; 通过各个特征的线对线相关性建立一组相关特征; 至少在两个不同的波长 lambda 1 和 lambda 2 上,在时间同步上比较每对相邻线上的相关特征; 对保留事件进行大小区分,并选择大小与搜索到的单元格类型相对应的事件; 确定对于尺寸区分后的保留事件,三个维度的事件能量分布是否在预定的高斯形状标准内; 并对剩余的事件进行计数以确定和仅计数存在于固体支持物上的荧光细胞。
发明人: DROCOURT, JEAN-LOUIS | GUILLET, JEAN-GERARD | GRONER, WARREN
发明人地址: Yerres, FR | Vanves, FR | Great-Neck, NY

标题: Method and system for isolating data and information collection components from other components in a distributed environment
摘要: s7 . A method and system for isolating data and information collection components (124, 126 and 128) from other components (172, 174, 176 and 178 [not shown in Figure 1]) of an application program (106) in a distributed environment comprises the steps and components to first define data points according to location, structure, and access mechanism for the application program (106). The method and system group a plurality of data points (128) into logical collections and overlay on the group data points (128) a logic component (102) for deriving information from the data points. Additionally, the method and system include directing the grouped data points through the logic component (102) to other components of the application program. Grouped data points may be communicated synchronously to an associated workstation (104) or asynchronously to a background task associated with the application program.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 七。 一种用于在分布式环境中将数据和信息收集组件(124、126和128)与应用程序(106)的其他组件(172、174、176和178[图1中未示出])隔离的方法和系统,包括: 首先根据应用程序的位置、结构和访问机制定义数据点的步骤和组件(106)。 该方法和系统将多个数据点(128)分组为逻辑集合,并在组数据点(128)上覆盖用于从数据点导出信息的逻辑组件(102)。 此外,该方法和系统包括通过逻辑组件(102)将分组数据点引导到应用程序的其他组件。 分组数据点可以同步地传送到相关联的工作站(104)或异步地传送到与应用程序相关联的后台任务。
发明人: POOLE, RICHARD L. | LIMERICK, SYDNEY R. | OUELLETTE, PAMELA M. | JONES, MIKE D. | LIMERICK, STAN
发明人地址: 3114 Pamela Place,Garland, TX 75044,US | 6704 Ishuala Trail,Plano, TX 75023,US | 108 Violet Drive,Allen, TX 75002,US | 3321 Virginia,Plano, TX 75093,US | 601 Ashby Place,Allen, TX 75002,US

标题: 循環コンテクストアドレス指定可能メモリ
摘要: A memory system for storing and retrieving data sequences of symbols in response to a query sequence. Each of the data sequences and the query sequence is made up of three types of symbols, constants, delimiters, and variables. A data sequence is retrieved in response to a query sequence if the two sequences can be made identical by replacing each variable in each sequence by constants or combinations of constants and delimiters, said combinations beginning and ending with a delimiter. The data sequences are stored in a circulating memory store in which each symbol periodically passes by a number of Tap points at which it is available for reading. Each of the Tap points contains a processor which is capable of comparing the stored data sequences with the query sequence. A unique sub-system is provided for entering new data sequences into the circulating memory store without interrupting the operation of the data retrieval functions. This data entry technique automatically collects fragmented storage areas which were to small to store the new data sequence and combines these into a larger space into which the new data sequence is inserted.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种用于响应于查询序列来存储和检索符号数据序列的存储器系统。 每个数据序列和查询序列均由三种类型的符号、常量、分隔符和变量组成。 如果通过用常量或常量和定界符的组合替换每个序列中的每个变量可以使两个序列相同,则响应于查询序列来检索数据序列,所述组合以定界符开始和结束。 数据序列存储在循环存储器中,其中每个符号周期性地经过多个可供读取的Tap点。 每个Tap点都包含一个处理器,该处理器能够将存储的数据序列与查询序列进行比较。 提供了一个独特的子系统,用于将新的数据序列输入到循环存储器中,而不中断数据检索功能的操作。 该数据输入技术自动收集对于存储新数据序列而言太小的碎片存储区域,并将这些区域组合成更大的空间,以将新数据序列插入其中。

标题: 表面形状認識用センサ回路
摘要:
【課題】 表面形状認識用センサ回路の検出精度を向上させる。
【解決手段】 第1の信号発生手段20による信号のレベルを増幅して出力手段40に出力する増幅手段30を備える。
摘要(译)(简体中文):
本发明的目的在于提高表面形状识别传感器电路的检测精度。 
 解决方案:提供放大装置 30,用于放大由第一信号生成装置 20 生成的信号电平,并将其输出到输出装置 40。

标题: Character input method and apparatus
摘要: The present invention relates to a character input apparatus and method which pairs the title of a heading to the region where a character is inputted and determines the character group which can be inputted into the region corresponding to the heading as input candidate characters. When a character is inputted in the region, the heading in that region is discriminated and the characters are recognized referring to the input candidate character group corresponding to the title of the heading.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 本发明涉及一种字符输入设备和方法,其将标题的标题与输入字符的区域配对,并将可输入到与标题对应的区域中的字符组确定为输入候选字符。 当在区域中输入字符时,识别该区域中的标题,并参考对应于标题标题的输入候选字符组识别字符。
发明人: MATSUBAYASHI, KAZUHIRO, C/O CANON KABUSHIKI KAISHA | TANIISHI, SHINNOSUKE, C/O CANON KABUSHIKI KAISHA | TATSUMI, EISAKU, C/O CANON KABUSHIKI KAISHA | MORI, SHIGEKI, C/O CANON KABUSHIKI KAISHA | TANAKA, ATSUSHI, C/O CANON KABUSHIKI KAISHA

标题: Image processing segmentation apparatus
摘要: A segmentation apparatus utilized in an image processing system for recognizing a pattern in an image inputted thereto includes a separate circuit for outputting logical values of m by n pixels separated from the inputted image, an encode circuit for storing in advance therein codes to be determined according to the content of an inputted pattern and for outputting a code indicating that which set of pixels is identical to the objective pixel by using as an input pattern the logical value outputted from the separate circuit, and a select circuit for selecting a label of the objective label, from the label data of neighborhood pixels already determined and the new label data assigned, in accordance with the output from the encode circuit.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 在图像处理系统中使用的用于识别输入到其中的图像中的图案的分割装置包括用于输出从输入图像分离的m×n像素的逻辑值的单独电路、用于在其中预先存储要根据其确定的代码的编码电路 输入图案的内容,并通过使用从单独电路输出的逻辑值作为输入图案,以及用于选择目标的标签的选择电路,输出指示哪一组像素与目标像素相同的代码 根据编码电路的输出,从已经确定的邻域像素的标签数据和分配的新标签数据中获得标签。

标题: コントローラの群制御システム
摘要: PURPOSE:To operate plural fuzzy controllers in cooperation with one another by changing parameters of the other fuzzy controllers in accordance with the change of the operation state of one fuzzy controller. CONSTITUTION:Plural fuzzy controllers 10 are provided to control a control object 20. The controlled variable obtained in the control object is inputted to each fuzzy controller 10, and the fuzzy controller uses a membership function concerning the controlled variable to execute the fuzzy inference, and a manipulated variable indicated by the inference result is given to the control object 20. Plural fuzzy controllers 20 are connected to a host computer 21 by a communication line. Operation states of fuzzy controllers 10 are monitored to change parameters of the other fuzzy controllers 10 in accordance with the change of the operation state of one fuzzy controller 10. Thus, plural fuzzy controllers 10 are used to perform the control in cooperation with one another.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 目的:根据一个模糊控制器运行状态的变化,通过改变其他模糊控制器的参数,使多个模糊控制器相互配合运行。 组成:提供多个模糊控制器 10 来控制控制对象 20。在控制对象中获得的受控变量被输入到每个模糊控制器 10,模糊控制器使用与受控变量有关的隶属函数来执行模糊推理,以及 由推断结果指示的操作变量被提供给控制对象20。多个模糊控制器20通过通信线路连接到主计算机21。 监控模糊控制器10的操作状态,以根据一个模糊控制器10的操作状态的变化来改变其他模糊控制器10的参数。因此,多个模糊控制器10用于相互协作地执行控制。
发明人地址: 京都府京都市右京区花園土堂町10番地  立石電機株式会社内

标题: Auto-scaling controller and method of use therefor
摘要: An auto-scalling controler and method for use therefor is provided. Control inputs and control coefficients are multiplied by scaling values in multiplying means (211 and 213). The scaling values are then tuned in a tuner (190) using a descent-based optimization method in order to optimize system performance.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 提供了一种自动缩放控制器及其使用方法。 控制输入​​和控制系数在乘法装置(211和213)中乘以缩放值。 然后使用基于下降的优化方法在调谐器(190)中调整缩放值以优化系统性能。

标题: Personal access control system using speech and face recognition
摘要: A method and an apparatus are disclosed for identifying an individual through a combination of both speech and face recognition. The voice signature of an interrogated person uttering a key word into a microphone is compared in a pattern matcher with the previously stored voice signature of a known person uttering the same key word to obtain a first similarity score. At the same time, when a key event in the utterance of the key word by the interrogated person occurs, a momentary image of that person's mouth region onto which a grid pattern has been projected is optically recorded and compared with the previusly stored corresponding momentary image of the same known person to obtain a second similarity score. The two similarity scores are analyzed to verify that the identity of the interrogated person is that of the known person.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 公开了一种用于通过语音和面部识别的组合来识别个体的方法和装置。 在模式匹配器中,将对着麦克风说出关键字的被询问人的语音签名与之前存储的说出相同关键字的已知人的语音签名进行比较,以获得第一相似度分数。 同时,当被询问人说出关键词的关键事件发生时,该人嘴部区域投影有网格图案的瞬时图像被光学记录下来,并与先前存储的相应瞬时图像进行比较 相同的已知人,以获得第二个相似性分数。 对这两个相似度分数进行分析,以验证被询问人的身份是否为已知人的身份。

标题: METHODE UND GERÄT ZUR STRICHCODEAUSWERTUNG
摘要: A method and apparatus for on-line evaluation of bar code symbol quality is disclosed in which bar code decoding and evaluation functions are integrated within a single unit. The integration of the bar code decoding and evaluation functions results in significantly more conclusive analysis of the quality of the bar code symbols as the analysis methodology and decoding process utilize a common scanning device. Thus, the ambiguities associated with hardware differences between the decoding apparatus and stand alone bar code verifiers in evaluating the quality of the bar code symbols associated with conventional evaluation techniques are eliminated.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 公开了一种用于在线评估条形码符号质量的方法和设备,其中条形码解码和评估功能集成在单个单元中。 条形码解码和评估功能的集成导致对条形码符号质量的更明确的分析,因为分析方法和解码过程使用通用扫描设备。 因此,消除了与解码设备和独立条形码验证器在评估与传统评估技术相关联的条形码符号的质量时的硬件差异相关联的模糊性。
发明人: ALAN, RICHARD C/O EASTMAN KODAK CO. REINNAGEL, ROCHESTER | LUCAS, PETER C/O EASTMAN KODAK CO. CURTIS, ROCHESTER

标题: Schaltungsanordnung zur selbstätigen Änderung der Einstellung von Tonwiedergabegeräten, insbesondere Rundfunkempfängern
摘要: Es wird eine Schaltungsanordnung zur selbsttätigen Änderung der Einstellung von Tonwiedergabegeräten, insbesondere Rundfunkempfängern, bei einem Wechsel zwischen Sprache und Musikwiedergabe beschrieben. Solche Schaltungsanordnungen können sowohl zur automatischen Verstellungder Tonblende als auch zum Aufsuchen von Sendern mit momentanem Sprach- bzw. Musikprogramm dienen. Es werden in einer Schaltstufe währendeiner vorgegebenen ersten Zeitdauer die Zahl der Pausen gezählt, deren Dauer eine zweite vorgegebene kürzere Zeitdauer übersteigt. Die Schaltstufelöst immer dann ein Schaltsignal aus, wenn während der ersten Zeitdauer keine Pause der zweiten Zeitdauer gezählt ist.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 描述了一种用于在语音和音乐回放之间改变时自动改变音频回放设备,特别是无线电接收器的设置的电路布置。 这样的电路布置既可以用于音调控制的自动调整,也可以用于搜索具有当前语言或音乐节目的电台。 在切换阶段,在预定的第一时间段期间对暂停的次数进行计数,该时间段的持续时间超过第二预定的较短的时间段。 当在第一时间段内没有计数到第二时间段的暂停时,切换级总是触发切换信号。

标题: パターン認識装置
摘要: PURPOSE:To execute the recognition having high accuracy by executing a similarity - posterior probability conversion, based on a parameter which is derived easily by learning of the vocabulary contents. CONSTITUTION:A similarity - posterior probability converting part is constituted of a conversion arithmetic part 21 and a conversion parameter storage part 22. The conversion parameter storage part 22 is a table in which various parameters have been stored at every category, and these parameter sets are all obtained by learning. In this state, at the time of recognizing a pattern, a similarity value is converted to a desired posterior probability by reading out a necessary parameter set from the conversion parameter storage part 22 in accordance with the obtained similarity, and executing an operation by the conversion arithmetic part 21. In such a way, a posterior probability converting means having high accuracy can be constituted by a small data quantity, and the recognition accuracy can be improved.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 目的:通过执行相似性 - 后验概率转换,基于通过学习词汇内容容易导出的参数,执行具有高精度的识别。 组成:相似度 - 后验概率转换部分由转换运算部分 21 和转换参数存储部分 22 组成。转换参数存储部分 22 是一个表格,其中各种参数已存储在每个类别中,这些参数集是 都是通过学习获得的。 在这种状态下,在识别模式时,通过根据获得的相似度从转换参数存储部分22中读出必要的参数集,并通过转换执行操作,将相似度值转换为期望的后验概率 运算部分21、这样,可以用少量的数据构成精度高的后验概率转换装置,提高识别精度。
发明人地址: 神奈川県川崎市幸区小向東芝町1番地  株式会社東芝総合研究所内

标题: Cerebral biopotential analysis system and method
摘要: EEG leads are connected to a patient's head (14) by a set of surface electrodes which transmit signals over a patient cable (16) to a 19-channel EEG data acquisition system (12). Data acquisition system (12) filters, amplifies and digitizes the EEG waveforms and sends the digitized data to the microcomputer (18) via high speed synchronous serial line (26). Microcomputer (18) processes the serial data stream to generate computed data arrays. These arrays are then used in conjunction with predetermined reference arrays derived from clinical studies to produce diagnostic indices. These indices are displayed on graphics display (20). Printed output of the diagnostic index is available on the hard copy output device (22) which is connected to the microcomputer (18). Interaction between the operator and the system is provided by means of a keyboard (24) and a pointing device (28) with feedback provided by graphics display (20).
摘要(译)(简体中文): EEG 引线通过一组表面电极连接到患者头部 (14),这些表面电极通过患者电缆 (16) 将信号传输到 19 通道 EEG 数据采集系统 (12)。 数据采集​​系统(12)对EEG波形进行滤波、放大和数字化,并通过高速同步串行线(26)将数字化数据发送给微机(18)。 微型计算机 (18) 处理串行数据流以生成计算数据阵列。 然后将这些阵列与源自临床研究的预定参考阵列结合使用以产生诊断指数。 这些索引显示在图形显示器 (20) 上。 诊断索引的打印输出可在连接到微型计算机 (18) 的硬拷贝输出设备 (22) 上获得。 操作员和系统之间的交互通过键盘(24)和指示设备(28)提供,图形显示器(20)提供反馈。
[标]当前申请(专利权)人: 艾斯柏克特医疗系统股份有限公司
发明人: NASSIB G. CHAMOUN | CHAMOUN, NASSIB G.

标题: Device for the correlation between optical beams
摘要: A device for the correlation between optical beams having spatially modulated intensities has an active glass window, which on one side is illuminated at the same time by a reading and a pumping beam through one or a plurality of semitransparent mirrors. The reading beam has radiations with a wavelength equal to that of a transition between an intermediate and fundamental energy level. The pump beam has radiations with a wavelength corresponding to the energy of the highest power level of the material forming the active glass, obtaining on the other side of the window a light beam representing the correlation betwen the pumping and reading beams.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种用于在具有空间调制强度的光束之间进行相关的装置具有一个有源玻璃窗,该玻璃窗的一侧同时被通过一个或多个半透明镜的读数和泵浦光束照亮。 读取光束具有波长等于中间能级和基本能级之间的跃迁波长的辐射。 泵浦光束具有波长对应于形成活性玻璃的材料的最高功率水平的能量的辐射,在窗口的另一侧获得代表泵浦光束和读取光束之间的相关性的光束。
[标]当前申请(专利权)人: 意大利电信实验股份公司
当前第一申请(专利权)人: CSELT CENTRO STUDI E LABORATORI TELECOMUNICAZIONI S.P.A.

标题: Databases
摘要: A computer database for storing information in tuple form wherein each tuple comprises fields with corresponding fields in the tuples constituting a column, generates for each data domain a domain dictionary which matches each distinct data value in that domain with a corresponding distinct token, and stores each domain dictionary. A tokenised store for each data field column is created. All of the tokens for a domain are initially of the same size being substantially the minimum size necessary to provide the required plurality of distinct tokens for initialize size of that domain. When further tuples are received for storage for each field of the tuple, the data value is compared in the corresponding domain dictionary. If no match is found, a new token within the existing token size is generated and added to the domain dictionary, but if all tokens within the existing token size are utilised a new token is generated having a size which is at least 1-bit wider than previously, such broadened token being entered into a new tokenised store for that column.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种用于以元组形式存储信息的计算机数据库,其中每个元组包括字段,元组中的相应字段构成一列,为每个数据域生成一个域字典,该字典将该域中的每个不同数据值与相应的不同令牌匹配,并存储每个 域词典。 为每个数据字段列创建一个标记化存储。 域的所有令牌最初具有相同的大小,基本上是提供所需的多个不同令牌以初始化该域的大小所需的最小大小。 当接收到用于存储元组的每个字段的更多元组时,在相应的域字典中比较数据值。 如果未找到匹配项,则生成现有标记大小内的新标记并将其添加到域字典中,但如果使用现有标记大小内的所有标记,则生成大小至少宽 1 位的新标记 与以前相比,这种扩大的令牌被输入到该列的新令牌化存储中。
发明人: MCGREGOR, DOUGLAS ROBERT | COCKSHOTT, WILLIAM PAUL | WILSON, JOHN NUGENT

标题: 画像ファイリング装置
摘要: PURPOSE:To prevent a wasteful data base from being constructed by deciding whether the construction of the data base is to be permitted or not according to the classification of an optical disk. CONSTITUTION:The classification of the optical disk 67 loaded in a drive means 63 is discriminated, and when picture data and additional data corresponding to the picture data are recorded in the optical disk 67, it is decided that the construction of the data base to a magnetic disk 65 based on the additional data is either to be permitted or to be prevented according to the classification. Accordingly, at the time of necessity, the data base is constructed automatically, and simultaneously, at the time of the recording of the picture data for which the data base need not be constructed, the data base is not constructed. Thus, troublesomeness for an operator to input whether the data base is to be constructed or not for every picture data and a mistake, etc., following the troublesomeness can be removed, and in addition, it can be prevented that the wasteful data base is constructed and recording space is occupied wastefully.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 目的:根据光盘的分类决定是否允许建立数据库,防止建立浪费的数据库。 组成:光盘 67 的分类加载在驱动装置 63 中,当图片数据和与图片数据相对应的附加数据被记录在光盘 67 中时,决定数据库的构建为 根据分类允许或阻止基于附加数据的磁盘65。 因此,在需要时自动构建数据库,同时,在记录不需要构建数据库的图像数据时,不构建数据库。 因此,可以消除操作员输入是否为每个图像数据构建数据库的麻烦以及随之而来的错误等,此外,还可以防止浪费数据库。 构造和记录空间被浪费地占用。

标题: Verfahren zum Erfassen einer Vigilanz einer Person
摘要: The psychological state detector illuminates the face of subject (1) using an infrared LED (2) whose emission (11) is deflected (12) by a semi-transparent mirror (8). The reflection (13) from an eyeball passes through the mirror to a CCD imaging camera (3) connected to an image memory (10). The size of the pupil is deduced by an extn. circuit (21), and a drowsiness detector (40) performs a check on the movements of the eyelids. A buzzer (9) is sounded when the pupil has remained invisible for 5 seconds or longer.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 心理状态检测器使用红外 LED (2) 照亮对象 (1) 的面部,其发射 (11) 被半透明镜 (8) 偏转 (12)。 来自眼球的反射光 (13) 通过镜子到达连接到图像存储器 (10) 的 CCD 成像相机 (3)。 瞳孔的大小由 extn 推导出来。 电路(21)和困倦检测器(40)对眼睑的运动进行检查。 当瞳孔保持不可见 5 秒或更长时间时,蜂鸣器 (9) 会响起。
发明人: SHIMOTANI, MITSUO, AMAGASAKI | NISHIDA, MINORU, AMAGASAKI | OKADA, AKIRA, AMAGASAKI | SATAKE, TOSHIHIDE, AMAGASAKI | WASHINO, SHOICHI, AMAGASAKI | OKAWA, FUTOSHI, AMAGASAKI | TERASHITA, HIROMI, AMAGASAKI

标题: Verfahren zur Ermittlung der Ursache eines anormalen Ereignisses in einem Unterstützungssystem für den Betrieb einer Anlage
摘要(译)(简体中文): 通过缩小MYCIN方法，从通过MYCIN方法引用的因素中寻找原因的准确性得以提高。 关于如果多个因素中的特定因素10C是异常事件100C的原因而不可能发生的派生事件，则负派生事件12C和1MC会否定其他因素的这些派生事件，而在其他情况下，因素10C不会发生 将原因作为因素10C的派生事件添加到故障树图中。  <图像>
发明人: TANAKA SATOSHI C/O TAKASAGO MACH. W. ARAI-CHO TAKASAGO-SHI HYOGO-KEN JP

标题: Target identification apparatus
摘要: Apparatus including discrimination circuitry for reliably identifying a target illuminated by a pulsed laser beam is disclosed. Laser energy received from objects within a field of view is imaged on one or more elements of an optical detector which produces electrical signals indicative of the direction of arrival of the laser energy. Signals from the detector are selectively passed to a display device by means of self-adaptive gating circuitry which blocks signals occuring during intervals when valid signals are not expected. Means for discriminating as to optical frequency, and for utilizing only the last returned reflection of each transmitted laser pulse is also disclosed for further increasing reliability.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 公开了一种包括识别电路的装置,用于可靠地识别由脉冲激光束照射的目标。 从视野内的物体接收的激光能量在光学检测器的一个或多个元件上成像,该光学检测器产生指示激光能量到达方向的电信号。 来自检测器的信号通过自适应选通电路选择性地传递到显示设备,该选通电路在不期望有效信号的间隔期间阻止出现的信号。 还公开了用于区分光学频率以及仅利用每个发射激光脉冲的最后返回反射以进一步提高可靠性的装置。

标题: Verfahren zur schnellen Sprecheradaption in einem Spracherkenner für großen Wortschatz
摘要: Die Erfindung betrifft ein Verfahren für die schnelle Sprecheradaption, das auf der Transformation von Merkmalsvektoren zweier Sprecher, des neuen, zu adaptierenden und des Referenzsprechers beruht. Dabei wird das Konzept der Merkmalsvektor-Transformation auf die Modellierung beim HMM-Erkenner übertragen, d. h. anstelle der Merkmalsvektoren des Referenzsprechers werden z. B. mehrdimensionale Normalverteilungen transformiert. Dadurch läßt sich nahezu die Erkennungsrate eines sprecherabhängigen Spracherkenners erreichen.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 适应新的未知说话人的语音识别薄荷醇使用词子单元的统计建模(隐马尔可夫模型识别)。 该方法是通过对新说话人和参考说话人的特征向量进行变换来实现的。 使用多维分布函数代替参考说话人的量化特征向量。 新说话人和参考说话人的特征向量被变换到一个共同的特征空间。 为了计算必要的变换矩阵,新说话人在训练阶段重复一些预先确定的工作。 用途/优点 - 通过电话进行语音识别,例如 用于车辆中的自动识别系统等。 快速识别大词汇量。

标题: 음성검지장치 및 음성제어시스템
摘要:
입력되는 음성의 주파수, 크기, 길이 등, 음성의 종류를 제한하므로써, 간이한 구성으로 낮은 코스트의 음성검지장치 및 이것을 포함하는 음성제어시스템을 제공한다.
    
본 발명에 관계되는 음성검지장치는, 입력된 음성의 주파수를 검지하고, 설정된 검지 음성주파수범위내의 주파수인지 아닌지를 식별하여, 그 식별 결과를 출력하는 음성주파수검지부와, 입력된 음성의 에너지레벨을 검지하고, 설정된 검지음성 에너지레벨 역치를 초과하고 있는지 아닌지의 비교를 행하고, 그 비교결과를 출력하는 입력 신호 레벨검지부와, 상기 식별결과 및 비교결과에 의거하여, 음성검지조건에 적합한 음성이 입력되었는지 아닌지를 판단하고, 그 판단결과에 따라서 제 1의 스테이터스신호를 출력하는 음성입력 판단부와, 제 1의 스테이터스신호의 계속시간을 측정하고, 설정된 계속시간역치의 범위내인지 아닌지의 비교를 행하고, 그 비교결과에 따라서 제 2의 스테이터스신호를 출력하는 음성계속시간 측정부를 구비한 것이다. 본 발명에 관계되는 음성제어시스템은, 음성을 입력하기 위한 마이크로폰과, 상기  - 1 -
 
본 발명에 관계되는 음성검지장치와, 제 1의 스테이터스 신호 및 제 2의 스테이터스 신호의 어느 한편 또는 양편에 따라서 제어명령을 출력할 지 안할 지를 결정하는 제어수단과, 제어명령에 따른 동작을 행하는 제어대상을 구비한 것이다.
    
색인어
음성검지장치, 로패스 필터, 하이패스 필터, 바이커드(biquadratic) 필터
摘要(译)(简体中文):
通过限制语音类型,例如输入语音的频率、音量和长度,提供了一种配置简单的低成本语音检测装置和包括该装置的语音控制系统。

 根据本发明的语音检测设备,用于根据第一状态信号和第二状态信号中的任一个或两者来确定是否输出控制命令的控制装置,以及用于根据控制命令执行操作的控制It配备了一个目标。

标题: Noise suppression system and method
摘要: A system and method for noise suppression in a speech processing system is presented. A gain estimator determines the gain, and thus the level of noise suppression, for each frame of the input signal. If no speech is present in the frame, then the gain is set at a predetermined minimum. If speech is present in the frame, then a gain factor is determined for each channel of a predefined set of frequency channels. For each channel, the gain factor is a function of the SNR of speech in the channel. The channel SNRs are generated by a SNR estimator based on channel energy estimates provided by an energy estimator and channel noise energy estimates provided by a noise energy estimator. The noise energy estimator updates its estimates during frames in which no speech is present, as determined by a speech detector.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 提出了一种用于语音处理系统中的噪声抑制的系统和方法。 增益估计器确定输入信号的每一帧的增益,从而确定噪声抑制水平。 如果帧中不存在语音,则将增益设置为预定最小值。 如果帧中存在语音,则为预定义的一组频道中的每个频道确定增益因子。 对于每个通道,增益因子是通道中语音 SNR 的函数。 信道SNR由SNR估计器基于由能量估计器提供的信道能量估计和由噪声能量估计器提供的信道噪声能量估计来生成。 噪声能量估计器在语音检测器确定的不存在语音的帧期间更新其估计。

标题: Image data compression apparatus capable of reducing false color
摘要: An image data compression apparatus capable of reducing false color in image data to a minimum when image compression or decompression is performed, including a preliminary image compressing portion for compressing image data in a sampling region set in a specific position on an image plane for obtaining preliminary compressed image data; a data size evaluation value calculating portion for calculating a data size evaluation value from a data length of said preliminary compressed image data; a compression ration determining portion for determining compression ratios of the image data to color and luminance data in accordance with the data size evaluation value such that a data size of compressed image when image compression is performed for the entire image plane of the image data equals to a prescribed desired data size and such that the compression ratio of the image data to the color data equals to or exceeds the compression ratio of the image data to the luminance data; and an image compressing portion for performing image compression for the entire image plane of the image data in accordance with the compression ratios of the image data to the color and luminance data. Also included are a method of compressing image data and a digital camera using the image compression apparatus.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种能够在执行图像压缩或解压缩时将图像数据中的伪色减少到最小的图像数据压缩装置,包括初步图像压缩部分,用于压缩设置在图像平面上特定位置的采样区域中的图像数据,以获得初步图像数据。 压缩图像数据; 数据量评估值计算部分,用于根据所述初步压缩图像数据的数据长度计算数据量评估值; 压缩比确定部分,用于根据数据大小评估值确定图像数据对颜色和亮度数据的压缩比,使得当对图像数据的整个图像平面执行图像压缩时压缩图像的数据大小等于 规定的期望数据大小,使得图像数据对颜色数据的压缩比等于或超过图像数据对亮度数据的压缩比; 以及图像压缩部分,用于根据图像数据对颜色和亮度数据的压缩比对图像数据的整个图像平面执行图像压缩。 还包括一种压缩图像数据的方法和使用该图像压缩装置的数码相机。

标题: Method and apparatus for supplementing significant portions of a document selected without document image decoding with retrieved information
摘要: A method and apparatus for applying morphological image criteria that identify image units in an undecoded document image having significant information content, and for retrieving related data that supplements the document either from elsewhere within the document or a source external to the document. The retrieved data can result from character code recognition or template matching of the identified significant image units, or the retrieved data can result directly from an analysis of the morphological image characteristics of the identified significant image units. A reading machine can allow a user to browse and select documents or segments thereof, and to obtain interactive retrieval of documents and supplemental data.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种方法和装置,用于应用识别未解码文档图像中具有重要信息内容的图像单元的形态学图像标准,以及用于从文档内的其他地方或文档外部的源检索补充文档的相关数据。 检索数据可以是识别出的重要图像单元的字符编码识别或模板匹配的结果,也可以是直接分析识别出的重要图像单元的图像形态特征的结果。 阅读机可以让用户浏览和选择文件或其中的片段,并获得文件和补充数据的交互式检索。
发明人: WITHGOTT, M. MARGARET | NEWMAN, WILLIAM | BAGLEY, STEVEN C. | HUTTENLOCHER, DANIEL P. | KAPLAN, RONALD M. | CASS, TODD A. | HALVORSEN, PER-KRISTIAN | BROWN, JOHN SEELY | KAY, MARTIN
发明人地址: Los Altos, CA | Cambridge, GB | Palo Alto, CA | Ithaca, NY | Cambridge, MA | San Francisco, CA | Menlo Park, CA

标题: 분류회로(Sorting Gircuit)
摘要: The sorting circuit arranges input data occording to their values with high speed by adapting neural network concept. The circuit comprises shift registers for converting serial M number of N-bit data into parallel, comparators generating excitation state when input data is larger than reference data, a binary counter for providing sequentially level varying reference data to the comparators, a binary bit divider for transmitting base state through output terminals having prorities less than the number of excitation state input, and registers for storing counter value when the states of output terminals of binary bit divider vary.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 排序电路采用神经网络概念,根据输入数据的值高速排列输入数据。 该电路包括用于将串行M个N位数据转换为并行数据的移位寄存器,当输入数据大于参考数据时产生激励状态的比较器,一个二进制计数器,用于向比较器提供顺序电平变化的参考数据,一个二进制位除法器,用于 通过优先级小于激励态输入个数的输出端传递基态,并在二进制位分频器的输出端状态变化时存储计数器值的寄存器。

标题: Medical image filing apparatus
摘要: In a medical image filing apparatus having a store unit, a keyboard, a retrieval device, a display unit and a CPU, case images of various diseases are stored in the store unit together with clinical images, and case indexes corresponding to respective case images and clinical indexes corresponding to respective clinical images are also stored in the store unit. Therefore, the retrieval operation of the case images as well as the clinical images can be effected in an easy and swift manner, and thus it is possible to effect an accurate diagnosis for a patient.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 在具有存储单元、键盘、检索装置、显示单元和CPU的医学图像归档装置中,各种疾病的病例图像与临床图像以及与各个病例图像相对应的病例索引一起存储在存储单元中,以及 对应于各个临床图像的临床指标也存储在存储单元中。 因此,病例图像和临床图像的检索操作可以以简单且迅速的方式进行,从而可以对患者进行准确的诊断。
[标]当前申请(专利权)人: 奥林柏斯光学工业株式会社

标题: Semantic object modeling system for creating relational database schemas
摘要: A computer system is operated to create a relational database schema from a semantic object model. In response to user input, a semantic object data model including semantic objects each of which represents an item about which data is stored in the tables of the relational database is created. Attributes representing data stored in the relational database for the item represented by a semantic object are created in response to user input and associated with one or more of the semantic objects of the model. The attributes include simple value attributes that represent a data entry in a single column of the relational database, group attributes having one or more member attributes that represent a logical collection of attributes, and object link attributes that represent relationships between the semantic objects in the semantic object model. The semantic objects and the associated attributes are transformed into the relational database tables.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 操作计算机系统以根据语义对象模型创建关系数据库模式。 响应于用户输入,创建包括语义对象的语义对象数据模型,每个语义对象表示关于其数据存储在关系数据库的表中的项目。 表示存储在关系数据库中的由语义对象表示的项目的数据的属性是响应于用户输入而创建的并且与模型的一个或多个语义对象相关联。 属性包括表示关系数据库的单个列中的数据条目的简单值属性、具有一个或多个表示属性逻辑集合的成员属性的组属性,以及表示语义中语义对象之间关系的对象链接属性。 对象模型。 语义对象和相关属性被转换成关系数据库表。
发明人: EGGEBROTEN, LEE I | KAWAI, KENJU | KROENKE, DAVID M | OLDS, CHRISTOPHER C

标题: Spatial light modulator and neural network
摘要: A neural network system comprising input, intermediate and output layers interconnected through synapses, respectively is disclosed. Each layer is comprised of a plurality of spatial light modulator units each of which is comprised of a photoconductive layer sandwiched between electrodes and a light modulation layer electrically connected to the photoconductive layer of which the light transmittance varies according to a voltage applied thereto, wherein electric currents induced by light bundles incident to the photoconductive layer are summed to cause a change in the voltage to be applied to the light modulation layer according to which the light transmittance is varied dependently thereon.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 公开了一种神经网络系统,包括分别通过突触互连的输入层、中间层和输出层。 每层由多个空间光调制器单元组成,每个空间光调制器单元由夹在电极之间的光导层和电连接到光调制层的光调制层组成,光调制层的透光率根据施加到其上的电压而变化,其中电 由入射到光电导层的光束所感应的电流相加,以引起施加到光调制层的电压的变化,根据该电压的变化,透光率依赖于其而变化。
[标]当前申请(专利权)人: 松下电器产业株式会社

标题: Einrichtung zur Bestimmung des Reifendrucks
摘要: For indicating tire inflation, an essentially two-dimensional array of sensors is used to determine the distribution of contact forces over the footprint of a pneumatic tire. A neural network may be employed to classify the patterns of force sensed in this manner, and to closely estimate the actual tire inflation pressure. <IMAGE>
摘要(译)(简体中文): 为了指示轮胎充气,使用基本上二维的传感器阵列来确定接触力在充气轮胎的印迹上的分布。 可以采用神经网络来对以这种方式感测到的力的模式进行分类,并且仔细地估计实际轮胎充气压力。
当前第一申请(专利权)人: EXXON RESEARCH AND ENGINEERING CO., FLORHAM PARK

标题: ハイパーリンクをビデオに統合するための方法及び装置
摘要: ハイパービデオは、2つの別個の部分、即ち、ビデオ·データを含む第1部分及びビデオ·データと関連したハイパーリンク情報を含み、一般に第1部分よりもずっと小さい第2部分をエンコードされる。第1及び第2部分は別々のファイルに記憶されることが望ましい。ハイパーリンク情報のエンコードは、ビデオのキー·フレームだけをエンコードすること及び単純な幾何学的形状のホット·リンク領域をエンコードすることによって効果的に行われることが望ましい。ハイパービデオ·プレーヤは、キー·フレーム相互間のフレームにおけるホット·リンク領域を、それらフレームを間に挟むキー·フレーム内のホット·リンク領域を補間することによって決定する。
摘要(译)(简体中文): 超视频被编码成两个独立的部分,第一部分包含视频数据,第二部分包含与视频数据相关联的超链接信息并且通常比第一部分小得多。 第一部分和第二部分最好存储在单独的文件中。 超链接信息的编码优选地通过仅对视频的关键帧进行编码并且通过对简单几何形状的热链接区域进行编码来有效地完成。 超视频播放器通过在夹着这些帧的关键帧中插入热链接区域来确定关键帧之间的帧中的热链接区域。

标题: Coded record and method of and system for interpreting the record
摘要: A machine-readable record or label includes alternating areas of different reflectivity providing a binary coded data record. The record is made by selecting the widths of the areas such that an increase in the relative widths of any two consecutive areas of different characteristics represents a binary "1" and a decrease in the relative widths of any two consecutive areas represents a binary "0". Thus, each area in the part of the code is used in the establishment of the values of two different binary bits. A method of and a system for reading or interpreting the record or label includes a pair of light reader controlled registers in which are alternately stored the widths of consecutive areas. A comparator coupled to the registers determines whether each newly stored width is greater than or less than the width of the previously stored area. In accordance with this determination, the comparator stores a "1" or a "0" in a shift register, the contents of which are transferred out as each complete character is received.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 机器可读记录或标签包括提供二进制编码数据记录的不同反射率的交替区域。 通过选择区域的宽度进行记录,使得任何两个不同特征的连续区域的相对宽度增加表示二进制“1”,任何两个连续区域的相对宽度减小表示二进制“0”  ”。 因此,代码部分中的每个区域都用于建立两个不同二进制位的值。 一种用于读取或解释记录或标签的方法和系统包括一对光读取器控制的寄存器,其中交替地存储连续区域的宽度。 耦合到寄存器的比较器确定每个新存储的宽度是大于还是小于先前存储的区域的宽度。 根据该确定,比较器将“1”或“0”存储在移位寄存器中,其内容在接收到每个完整字符时被转出。

标题: СПОСОБ ФОРМИРОВАНИЯ И РЕГУЛЯРНОЙ ДОСТАВКИ ПОЛЬЗОВАТЕЛЯМ ИНФОРМАЦИОННЫХ ИЗДАНИЙ И СИСТЕМА ДЛЯ ОСУЩЕСТВЛЕНИЯ СПОСОБА
摘要: Изобретение относится к области информационного обслуживания с использованием компьютерных сетей. Технический результат заключается в повышении избирательности и уровня персонализации информационных изданий, обеспечения непрерывной адаптации предоставляемых материалов к изменяющимся потребностям пользователей, расширения круга потенциальных распространителей издания и повышения оперативности его доставки; оптимизации сетевой инфраструктуры, обеспечивающей возможность формирования практически неограниченного множества тематических изданий при сохранении единого центра, осуществляющего поиск, отбор и систематизацию материалов. Подготовка персонализированного информационного издания осуществляется на основании обработки данных в востребованных ранее материалах и анализе полученных откликов об их качестве и соответствии области интересов. Основную роль в подготовке и распространении персонализированного информационного издания играет издатель, который выбирает информационные материалы из доступных источников и помещает их в очередной выпуск издания. Каждый выпуск готовится персонально для пользователя или группы пользователей, подписавшихся на информационное издание, исходя из области их интересов и предпочтений. Распространение издания может осуществляться непосредственно издателем через собственный информационный сервер и через сеть независимых распространителей, получивших от издателя права на регистрацию пользователей и распространение издания через свои серверы. 5 с. и 74 з.п.ф-лы, 1 ил.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 领域:使用计算机网络的信息服务。 实质:方法的技术目标在于提高信息出版物的选择性和个性化水平,根据用户的不同要求不间断地改编所提供的材料,扩大潜在分销商的圈子并提高出版物交付的及时性,优化 网络基础设施确保形成几乎无限的出版主题集合的可能性,同时保留单一中心进行材料的搜索、选择和系统化。 个性化信息发布的准备是在处理之前要求保护的材料中的数据以及分析其质量响应和与兴趣领域的对应关系的基础上进行的。 出版商从可访问的资源中选择信息材料并将其插入到适当的出版物中,在个性化信息出版物的准备和分发中起着关键作用。 出版物可以由出版商通过他自己的信息服务器直接分发,也可以通过独立分销商的网络进行分发,这些独立分销商通过他们的服务器从出版商那里获得用户注册和分发出版物的权利。 效果:提高信息发布的选择性和个性化水平。  79 厘升,1 图纸

标题: Method and apparatus for natural language processing
摘要: A natural language including Japanese, Korean, Chinese, etc., is suitably processed when an undefined word which is not registered in a dictionary appears in an input character train. When the undefined word appears, semantic analysis means (6) decides a semantic concept of the undefined word by using a case dictionary (12), and further by using a vocabulary hierarchy dictionary (13) which registers vocabularies in a hierarchy structure, the semantic analysis means (6) extracts a group of vocabularies (synonyms) corresponding to a lower concept of the semantic concept of the undefined word. The natural language processing can be achieved practically and efficiently with the dictionaries of a limited storage capacity.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 当输入字符串中出现未登记在字典中的未定义词时,适当地处理包括日语、韩语、中文等在内的自然语言。 当出现未定义词时,语义分析装置(6)通过使用案例词典(12),并且进一步通过使用将词汇登记在层次结构中的词汇层次词典(13)来确定未定义词的语义概念,语义 分析装置(6)提取与未定义词的语义概念的较低概念相对应的一组词汇(同义词)。 自然语言处理可以在存储容量有限的字典中切实有效地实现。

标题: ZEICHENERKENNUNGSSYSTEMBESTIMMUNG VON ABGETASTETEN UND "ECHTZEIT"-HANDGESCHRIEBENEN ZEICHEN
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种手写字符识别系统，包括：文档扫描仪，用于生成包含手写字符的先前创建的文档的扫描图像;以及笔和数字化平板，用于由用户实时输入手写字符。手写字符识别系统包括从文档扫描仪连接的图像处理器，用于接收先前创建的文档的扫描图像并生成一个或多个有序簇阵列。有序簇阵列包含空间有序的骨架图像弧坐标阵列，其表示并对应于手写字符的笔划，其中空间顺序表示创建笔划的笔划的诱导时间有序序列。模仿字符笔画创建顺序的手写字符。从时间顺序感应处理器连接低级识别处理器，用于接收有序集群阵列并生成顺序字符阵列，其中顺序字符阵列包含每个有序集群阵列的字符列表，并且其中每个字符列表包含至少一个字符标识表示对应的有序簇阵列的可能解释。可以从低级识别处理器连接语言后处理器，用于接收顺序字符阵列并生成表示对手写字符的最可能解释的输出字符串。文件。
法律状态/事件: 未缴年费 | 权利转移

标题: Speech signal processing apparatus for detecting a speech signal from a noisy speech signal
摘要: There is disclosed a signal detection apparatus for detecting a noise-suppressed speech signal. In the signal detection apparatus, a band division process including a Fourier transformation is performed for an inputted speech signal, thereby outputting spectrum signals of plural channels. A cepstrum analysis process is performed for the spectrum signals, and a peak of the obtained cepstrum is detected in response to the cepstrum analysis result. Thereafter, a speech signal interval of the inputted noisy speech signal is detected in response to the detected peak, and a noise is predicted in the speech signal in response to the detected speech signal interval. Then, the predicted noise is canceled in the spectrum signals thereby outputting noise-suppressed spectrum signals. Finally, the noise-suppressed spectrum signals are combined and are inverse Fourier-transformed, thereby outputting a noise-suppressed speech signal.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 公开了一种用于检测噪声抑制语音信号的信号检测装置。 在信号检测装置中,对输入的语音信号进行包括傅里叶变换的频带分割处理,从而输出多个声道的频谱信号。 对频谱信号进行倒谱分析处理,根据倒谱分析结果检测得到的倒谱峰值。 此后,响应于检测到的峰值检测输入的带噪语音信号的语音信号区间,并响应于检测到的语音信号区间预测语音信号中的噪声。 然后,在频谱信号中消除预测噪声,从而输出噪声抑制频谱信号。 最后,将噪声抑制后的频谱信号合并,并进行傅里叶逆变换,从而输出噪声抑制后的语音信号。
[标]当前申请(专利权)人: 松下电器产业株式会社

标题: Speech recognition system
摘要: A speech recognition system includes an acoustic analyzer which produces a time sequence of acoustic parameters from an input speech signal in an utterance boundary thereof, and estimates a trajectory in a parameter space from the time sequence of acoustic parameters. The trajectory is re-sampled in the parameter space at predetermined constant intervals sequentially each time the acoustic parameters are produced by the acoustic analyzing means, thereby producing an input utterance pattern. The input utterance pattern is matched with reference speech patterns to recognize the input speech signal. The speech recognition system also has an utterance boundary detector for detecting the utterance boundary of the input speech signal. The trajectory is re-sampled while the utterance boundary is being detected by the utterance boundary detector.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种语音识别系统包括声学分析器,该声学分析器根据输入语音信号在其话语边界中产生声学参数的时间序列,并根据声学参数的时间序列估计参数空间中的轨迹。 每当声学分析装置产生声学参数时,轨迹以预定恒定间隔顺序地在参数空间中重新采样,从而产生输入话语模式。 输入话语模式与参考语音模式匹配以识别输入语音信号。 语音识别系统还具有用于检测输入语音信号的话语边界的话语边界检测器。 当话语边界检测器正在检测话语边界时,轨迹被重新采样。
发明人: TANAKA, MIYUKI | WATARI, MASAO | KATO, YASUHIKO

标题: Automotive occupant sensor system and method of operation by sensor fusion
摘要: A system for sensing the presence, position and type classification of an occupant in a passenger seat of a vehicle, as well as for sensing the presence of a rear-facing child seat therein, for use in controlling a related air bag activator control system to enable, disable or control inflation rate or amount of inflation of an air bag. The sensor system employs sensor fusion, a process of combining information provided by two or more sensors (24, 26), each of which "sees" the world in a unique sense. In a preferred embodiment, infrared sensor inputs (78) and ultrasonic sensor inputs (79) are combined in a microprocessor by a sensor fusion algorithm (80) to produce an occupancy state output signal (85) to the air bag controller.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种用于感测车辆乘客座椅上的乘员的存在、位置和类型分类以及用于感测其中是否存在后向儿童座椅的系统,用于控制相关的安全气囊启动器控制系统以 启用、禁用或控制气囊的充气速率或充气量。 传感器系统采用传感器融合,将两个或多个传感器(24、26)提供的信息组合在一起的过程,每个传感器都以独特的方式“看到”世界。 在优选实施例中,红外传感器输入(78)和超声波传感器输入(79)通过传感器融合算法(80)在微处理器中组合以产生占用状态输出信号(85)到安全气囊控制器。

标题: СПОСОБ ФОРМИРОВАНИЯ НЕЧЕТКОГО УПРАВЛЯЮЩЕГО ВОЗДЕЙСТВИЯ, УСТРОЙСТВО ДЛЯ ЕГО РЕАЛИЗАЦИИ, СПОСОБ УПРАВЛЕНИЯ И СИСТЕМА ДЛЯ ЕГО РЕАЛИЗАЦИИ (ВАРИАНТЫ)
摘要: Предлагаемая группа изобретений относится к системам с адаптивным нечетким управлением и может быть использована при автоматическом контроле и регулировании температуры, скорости и пр., в которых управляющие правила могут быть заменены в течение выполнения нечеткой оценки. Приведено описание конструктивного выполнения вариантов устройства для формирования нечеткого управляющего воздействия с использованием блока нечеткой логики, а также системы управления, использующей блок нечеткой логики для оценки выходного параметра объекта управления. 7 с. и 2 з.п.ф-лы, 16 ил.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 领域:控制温度、速度等的自动控制系统。 实质内容:发明说明书包含描述带有模糊逻辑单元的模糊控制装置的设计的权利要求,以及使用模糊逻辑单元评估受控对象的输出参数的控制系统。 效果:在模糊评估评估期间改变决策规则的可能性。  9 厘升,16 图纸

标题: Apparatus and method for processing data corresponding to labels
摘要: A data processing apparatus comprises input, file update, display and print processing units which are independently operated and linked to each other. Arbitrary word labels can independently be set in each processing unit. Each processing unit performs only an operation defined by the word labels. The data pro­cessed by one processing unit can be used as a source data based on which the succeeding linked processing unit performs another processing operation.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种数据处理装置,包括输入、文件更新、显示和打印处理单元,这些处理单元独立运行并且相互连接。 每个处理单元可以独立设置任意词标签。 每个处理单元只执行由单词标签定义的操作。 一个处理单元处理后的数据可以作为源数据,后续联动的处理单元根据该源数据进行另一处理操作。

标题: Verfahren zur ausführung definierter aktionen wenn der namensraum eines speichermediums in den namensraum eines anderen speichermediums eingefügt wird
摘要: The present invention allows arbitrary actions to be performed when grafting the namespace of one device into the namespace of the same or another device. Grafting of the namespace of one device into the namespace of the same or another device creates a logical namespace (92) that can be presented to the user to allow the user to access information in a logically consistent manner. Active mount points are created by adding an active mount point attribute to a file or directory. When an I/O request processed by an I/O system encounters an active mount point, it turns control for processing the active mount point over to an active mount point driver (96). The active mount point driver (96) assumes responsibility for processing the I/O request. In processing the I/O request, the active mount point driver (96) decides what action should be taken to further processing of the I/O request. To further process of the I/O request, the active mount point driver (96) may utilize information from a variety of sources (106) as well as make requests to other processes (108), drivers (100), systems, subsystems, devices (102), and so forth. Such actions may include those normally associated with an I/O request such as retrieving and mounting appropriate media as well as actions not normally associated with an I/O request.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 本发明允许在将一个设备的命名空间移植到相同或另一设备的命名空间时执行任意动作。 将一个设备的名称空间移植到同一设备或另一个设备的名称空间中会创建一个逻辑名称空间 (92),该名称空间可以呈现给用户以允许用户以逻辑上一致的方式访问信息。 活动挂载点是通过将活动挂载点属性添加到文件或目录来创建的。 当 I/O 系统处理的 I/O 请求遇到活动安装点时,它将处理活动安装点的控制权转交给活动安装点驱动程序 (96)。 活动安装点驱动程序 (96) 承担处理 I/O 请求的责任。 在处理 I/O 请求时,活动安装点驱动程序 (96) 决定应该采取什么行动来进一步处理 I/O 请求。 为了进一步处理 I/O 请求,活动安装点驱动程序 (96) 可以利用来自各种来源 (106) 的信息以及向其他进程 (108)、驱动程序 (100)、系统、子系统、 设备 (102),等等。 这样的动作可以包括那些通常与 I/O 请求相关联的动作,例如检索和安装适当的媒体以及通常不与 I/O 请求相关联的动作。
发明人: MOMOH, OSHOMA | CABRERA, LUIS, FELIPE | KIMURA, GARY, D.
