标题: System, method, and computer program product for synchronizing content between a server and a client based on state information
摘要: Described herein are systems, methods, computer program products, and combinations and sub-combinations thereof, for enabling web content (as well as other objects) to be loaded on mobile devices (as well as other types of devices), and for users of mobile devices to operate with such web content on their mobile devices in an interactive manner while in an off-line mode.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 本文描述了系统、方法、计算机程序产品及其组合和子组合,用于使网络内容(以及其他对象)能够加载到移动设备(以及其他类型的设备)上,以及用于 移动设备在离线模式下以交互方式在其移动设备上操作此类 Web 内容。

标题: Pattern recognition devices
摘要: An input arrangement for the decision mechanism of a pattern recognition device includes a cathode ray tube arranged to execute a raster of successive scanning sweeps over an area which may include a pattern having an edge. Apparatus is provided for detecting an edge during one scanning sweep and for producing signals indicative of the position co-ordinates of the detected edge. A region of the area adjacent to the detected edge is searched during at least one subsequent sweep to detect an extension of the edge and apparatus is provided for producing further signals indicative of the position coordinates of any such extension. Analyzing means are provided to analyze said signals and to produce input signals respectively representing the position, length, orientation and curvature of a subsequentially circular arc indicative of said edge. Means are provided for applying said input signals to said decision mechanism.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种用于模式识别装置的判定机构的输入装置包括阴极射线管,该阴极射线管被布置为在可能包括具有边缘的模式的区域上执行连续扫描的光栅。 提供一种用于在一次扫描扫描期间检测边缘并用于产生指示所检测边缘的位置坐标的信号的装置。 在至少一次后续扫描期间搜索与检测到的边缘相邻的区域的区域以检测边缘的延伸并且提供用于产生指示任何这种延伸的位置坐标的进一步信号的装置。 提供分析装置以分析所述信号并产生输入信号,所述输入信号分别表示指示所述边缘的后续圆弧的位置、长度、方向和曲率。 提供用于将所述输入信号应用于所述决策机制的装置。

标题: Maskable bilevel correlator
摘要: A method and apparatus for correlating two signals representing a live image and a reference image are disclosed. The reference signal is processed to provide a polarity bit and mask bit for each pixel position in the reference image. The processed video signal is stored in a memory 20 and used in a convolver and summer section 18 in which the polarity bits between the reference and live images are gated by gate 17 and are used in generating a correlation output from summer 23. However, the polarity bits do not affect the correlation output if the logical output from gate 19 is of a given state which occurs if the associated mask bits indicate that the gradient value at the particular pixel position does not exceed certain minimum threshold values.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 公开了一种用于关联表示实时图像和参考图像的两个信号的方法和装置。 处理参考信号以为参考图像中的每个像素位置提供极性位和屏蔽位。 处理后的视频信号存储在存储器 20 中,并用于卷积器和加法器部分 18,其中参考图像和实时图像之间的极性位由门 17 选通,并用于生成加法器 23 的相关输出。然而, 如果来自门19的逻辑输出是给定状态,则极性位不影响相关输出,如果相关掩码位指示特定像素位置处的梯度值不超过特定最小阈值,则发生这种情况。

标题: UN PROCEDIMIENTO PARA LA PREPARACION DE BENCILPIRIMIDINAS.
摘要: Un procedimiento para la preparación de bencipirimidinas de la fórmula general **(Fórmula)** en donde R1 y R2 representan, cada uno, un grupo de C1-6-alquilo, R3 representa un grupo de C1-3 y R4 representa el grupo de metileno o un grupo de C2-4-alquilideno, y de sus sales de adición de ácido fisiológicamente compatibles.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种制备通式**(式)**的苄嘧啶的方法 其中r 1 和r 2 各自代表c 1-6 烷基,r 3 代表c 1-3 基团并且r 4 代表以下基团 亚甲基或一组c2-4-亚烷基,以及它们生理相容的酸加成盐。

标题: Method and system for analyzing a two phase flow
摘要: A method of and system for analyzing a two-phase flow in a conduit in which acoustic energy is transmitted through a conduit and into the flow therein; return echoes are detected, one or more flow indicator quantities are computed from the return echoes; and the mass flow rate and/or the flow quality is determined from the computed flow indicator quantities.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种用于分析管道中的两相流的方法和系统,其中声能通过管道传输并进入其中的流; 检测回波,根据回波计算一个或多个流量指标量; 并且质量流量和/或流量质量由计算的流量指标量确定。

标题: Arrangement and method for inspection of surface quality
摘要: The invention relates to a method for automatic inspection of the surface 20 of a moving object, in which a region on the object's surface is illuminated from at least two different illumination directions 13-15. The object's illuminated surface region is imaged with a camera to provide image information for analysis. The light sources in the different illumination directions 13-15 are pulsed to illuminate the object's surface region at different times, the pulsing frequency being >1 kHz The object's illuminated surface region is imaged as lines with a line scan camera 21 in sync with the above pulsing. The invention also relates to an arrangement for inspecting the surface 20 of a moving object, the arrangement comprising at least two light sources 10-12 in at least two different illumination directions 13-15 for illuminating the surface region of the object under inspection; a camera for imaging the object's surface region; and an image analyzer for analyzing the image information acquired from the object's surface 20 by imaging. The light sources 10-12 illuminate the object's surface 20 from the different illumination directions 13-15 at different times, and the camera is a line scan camera 21. The arrangement further comprises a timing controller 18 for synchronous pulsing of the light sources 10-12 and the at least one line scan camera 21, the pulsing frequency of the light sources 10-12 being >1 kHz.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 本发明涉及一种用于自动检查移动物体的表面20的方法,其中从至少两个不同的照射方向13-15照射物体表面上的区域。 物体的照明表面区域用相机成像,以提供用于分析的图像信息。 不同照明方向 13-15 上的光源在不同时间以脉冲方式照亮物体的表面区域,脉冲频率大于 1 kHz 使用与上述同步的线扫描相机 21 将物体的照明表面区域成像为线 脉动。 本发明还涉及一种用于检查移动物体的表面20的装置,该装置包括在至少两个不同的照射方向13-15上的至少两个光源10-12,用于照射被检查物体的表面区域; 用于对物体表面区域进行成像的照相机; 图像分析器,用于分析通过成像从物体表面20获取的图像信息。 光源10-12在不同的时间从不同的照明方向13-15照亮物体表面20,并且相机是线扫描相机21。该装置还包括用于光源10-10-的同步脉冲的时序控制器18。 在图12和至少一个线扫描相机21中,光源10-12的脉冲频率>1kHz。

标题: Distributed searching system and searching apparatus for use in the distributed searching system
摘要: A distributed search system that includes a plurality of agents connected on a network that includes an information resource provider. The information resource provider registers information corresponding to information resources to his nearest agent. The agent stores that information in its storage device and transfers it to the neighboring agents as advertisement information. The transferred advertisement information includes cost information. The agents which receive the advertisement information store it in their storage devices and transfer the advertisement information to the neighboring agents repeatedly, in a range determined on the basis of the cost information. The cost information may be included in a search request of an information resource searcher making a search request to search the stored advertisement information. The information resource searcher sends the search request including the cost information to agents in a range of transmission corresponding to the cost information included in the search request.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种分布式搜索系统,包括连接在网络上的多个代理,该网络包括信息资源提供者。 信息资源提供者将与信息资源对应的信息注册到他最近的代理。 代理将该信息存储在其存储设备中,并将其作为广告信息传输给相邻代理。 传送的广告信息包括费用信息。 接收到广告信息的代理将其存储在它们的存储设备中,并在基于成本信息确定的范围内将广告信息重复传送给相邻代理。 成本信息可以包括在信息资源搜索者的搜索请求中,该信息资源搜索者发出搜索请求以搜索所存储的广告信息。 信息资源搜索器向与搜索请求中包含的费用信息对应的传输范围内的代理发送包含费用信息的搜索请求。

标题: Floating gate MOS transistor charge injection circuit and computation devices incorporating it
摘要: The charge injection circuit of this invention comprises at least one pair of floating gate MOS transistors having source and drain terminals which are coupled together and to an injection node, and at least one corresponding pair of generators of substantially step-like voltage signals having an initial value and a final value, and having outputs respectively coupled to the control terminals of said transistors. The signal generators are such that the initial value of a first of the signals is substantially the equal of the final value of a second of the signals, and that the final value of the first signal is substantially the equal of the initial value of the second signal.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 本发明的电荷注入电路包括至少一对具有耦合在一起的源极和漏极并连接到注入节点的浮栅MOS晶体管,以及至少一对相应的具有初始阶跃电压信号的发生器。 值和最终值,并具有分别耦合到所述晶体管的控制端的输出。 信号发生器使得第一个信号的初始值基本上等于第二个信号的最终值,并且第一信号的最终值基本上等于第二个信号的初始值。 信号。

标题: System for extracting attached text
摘要: A method for identifying and extracting text data from a table-cell frame. The method includes the steps of tracing connected components of a document image, tracing white contours within a connected component, defining a frame outline based on the white contours, identifying unattached character data inside the frame outline, and defining an initial rectangular area inside the frame outline. The method further includes detecting black pixels in a horizontal or vertical direction from the initial rectangular area in order to create an extended character area, locating boundary pixels lying inside the extended character area for each white contour, identifying black pixels positioned between boundary pixels lying inside the extended character area, combining black pixels positioned between boundary pixels lying inside the extended character area so as to form at least one connected component, recognizing the at least one connected component as a text component if it is not recognized as a vertical line, as a horizontal line, as part of a broken line, or as part of the frame, and defining a character node of a hierarchical tree structure corresponding to the extended character area and containing both the at least one connected component and any identified unattached connected components.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种从表格单元框架中识别和提取文本数据的方法。 该方法包括以下步骤:追踪文档图像的连通分量、追踪连通分量内的白色轮廓、基于白色轮廓定义框架轮廓、识别框架轮廓内未附加的字符数据、以及定义框架内的初始矩形区域。 大纲。 该方法还包括从初始矩形区域检测水平或垂直方向上的黑色像素以便创建扩展字符区域,为每个白色轮廓定位位于扩展字符区域内的边界像素,识别位于位于内部的边界像素之间的黑色像素 扩展字符区域,将位于扩展字符区域内的边界像素之间的黑色像素组合成至少一个连通分量,如果该至少一个连通分量未被识别为垂直线,则将该至少一个连通分量识别为文本分量,如 一条水平线,作为虚线的一部分,或作为框架的一部分,并定义与扩展字符区域相对应的分层树结构的字符节点,并包含至少一个连通分量和任何已识别的未连接连通分量。

标题: Human interleukin-4 muteins
摘要: Recombinant biologically active human IL-4 (rhIL-4) mutant analog proteins in which N-linked glycosylation sites have been inactivated.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 具有生物活性的重组人 IL-4 (rhIL-4) 突变类似物蛋白,其中 N 连接的糖基化位点已失活。
发明人: MICHAEL C. DEELEY | DAVID J. COSMAN | DIRK M. ANDERSON | VIRGINIA L. PRICE | KENNETH H. GRABSTEIN | ANDERSON, DIRK M. | COSMAN, DAVID J. | DEELEY, MICHAEL C. | GRABSTEIN, KENNETH H. | PRICE, VIRGINIA L.

标题: System and method for scheduling broadcast of and access to video programs and other data using customer profiles
摘要: A system and method for scheduling the receipt of desired movies and other forms of data from a network which simultaneously distributes many sources of such data to many customers, as in a cable television system. Customer profiles are developed for the recipient describing how important certain characteristics of the broadcast video program, movie or other data are to each customer. From these profiles, an "agreement matrix" is calculated by comparing the recipient's profiles to the actual profiles of the characteristics of the available video programs, movies, or other data. The agreement matrix thus characterizes the attractiveness of each video program, movie, or other data to each prospective customer. "Virtual" channels are generated from the agreement matrix to produce a series of video or data programming which will provide the greatest satisfaction to each customer. Feedback paths are also provided so that the customer's profiles and/or the profiles of the video programs or other data may be modified to reflect actual usage. Kiosks are also developed which assist customers in the selection of videos, music, books, and the like in accordance with the customer's objective profiles.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种用于调度从网络接收所需电影和其他形式的数据的系统和方法,该网络同时向许多客户分发这种数据的许多源,如在有线电视系统中。 为接收者开发客户档案,描述广播视频节目、电影或其他数据的某些特征对每个客户的重要性。 从这些配置文件中,通过将接收者的配置文件与可用视频节目、电影或其他数据的特征的实际配置文件进行比较,计算出一个“协议矩阵”。 因此,协议矩阵表征了每个视频节目、电影或其他数据对每个潜在客户的吸引力。  “虚拟”频道由协议矩阵生成,以制作一系列视频或数据节目,为每位客户提供最大的满意度。 还提供了反馈路径,以便可以修改客户的简档和/或视频节目的简档或其他数据以反映实际使用情况。 还开发了根据客户的客观概况帮助客户选择视频、音乐、书籍等的信息亭。
发明人: HERZ, FREDERICK | UNGAR, LYLE | ZHANG, JIAN | WACHOB, DAVID | SALGANICOFF, MARCOS
发明人地址: Davis, WV | Philadelphia, PA | Cherry Hill, NJ | Elkins Park, PA
法律状态/事件: 未缴年费 | 诉讼 | 权利转移

标题: Method and apparatus for detecting mark from image data
摘要: An apparatus for detecting from first image data mark image data corresponding to a mark and having a first length in a first direction and a second length in a second direction perpendicular to the first direction in unit of pixels. The apparatus includes a differentiating processor, an adding processor and a controller. The differentiating processor executes differential operations for the first image data in response to first and second differential operation commands from the controller to obtain second and third image data and executes the differential operations for fourth image data in response to third and fourth differential operation commands from the controller to obtain fifth and sixth image data. The adding processor adds the second and third image data shifted by 1/2 the first length in opposite directions in response to the addition command from the controller to obtain the fourth image data and adds the fifth and sixth image data shifted by 1/2 the second length in opposite directions in response to the addition command from the controller to obtain seventh image data. The controller detects a center position of the mark from the seventh image data.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种用于从第一图像数据中检测标记图像数据的设备,该图像数据对应于标记并且以像素为单位在第一方向上具有第一长度并且在垂直于第一方向的第二方向上具有第二长度。 该装置包括微分处理器、加法处理器和控制器。 微分处理器响应于来自控制器的第一和第二微分运*令对第一图像数据执行微分运算以获得第二和第三图像数据,并且响应于来自控制器的第三和第四微分运*令对第四图像数据执行微分运算。 控制器获取第五和第六图像数据。 加法处理器响应于来自控制器的相加指令,将第二和第三图像数据以相反方向相加,得到第四图像数据,并将移动了第一长度1/2长度的第五和第六图像数据相加。 响应于来自控制器的相加命令,沿相反方向的第二长度以获得第七图像数据。 控制器从第七图像数据检测标记的中心位置。

标题: Förfarande och anordning för bitmönsterdetektering
摘要: A device and a method for attaining a fault tolerant and quick bit pattern detection in a bit stream (310) transmitted from an information transmitter to an information receiver. The device and the method creates a table (340) whose addresses are made up of candidate bit patterns. Positions in the table whose addresses correspond to the bit patterns sought for, including corruptions of these bit patterns, contain information related to the bit pattern sought for (342) and information about how corrupted the candidate bit patterns are (344).
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种用于在从信息发送器发送到信息接收器的比特流(310)中实现容错和快速比特模式检测的设备和方法。 该设备和方法创建一个表(340),其地址由候选位模式组成。 地址对应于所寻找的位模式的表中的位置,包括这些位模式的损坏,包含与所寻找的位模式相关的信息(342)和关于候选位模式的损坏程度的信息(344)。

标题: Objective measurement and graph theory modeling of web sites
摘要: A machine implemented method of objectively determining attributes of a Web site is disclosed. A Web site located on a network of computers is spidered to determine all objects and hyperlinks associated with the Web site and an index is constructed to represent the Web site. The Web site is then analyze to discern scenes, similar to page views, and links that connect the scenes. Information is then collected of the relationships of the scenes that reflects human factors, such as wait times and hyperlink location. This relationship information is quantified and associated with the hyperlinks and scenes. A model is then constructed of the scenes and hyperlinks and the quantified relationship information is applied to the model. An objective effectiveness of the Web site is then calculated by mathematical treatment of the model. A preferred model is a graph theory model having vertices and edges.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 公开了一种客观确定网站属性的机器实现方法。 位于计算机网络上的网站被蜘蛛网化以确定与该网站相关联的所有对象和超链接,并构建一个索引来表示该网站。 然后分析网站以识别场景,例如页面浏览量,以及连接场景的链接。 然后收集反映人为因素的场景关系信息,例如等待时间和超链接位置。 这种关系信息被量化并与超链接和场景相关联。 然后构建场景和超链接的模型,并将量化的关系信息应用于模型。 然后通过模型的数学处理计算网站的客观有效性。 优选模型是具有顶点和边的图论模型。
发明人: TILT, CHRISTOPHER E. | WILLIAMSON, ALISTAIR C.

标题: File system primitive providing native file system support for remote storage
摘要: In order to decrease the overall cost of storing large amounts of data, systems have been developed that use a hierarchy of storage devices from fast local disks to archival off-line storage. Such storage devices may be managed in a hierarchy where data that is accessed only infrequently can be moved to archival storage. The present invention relies on a tight integration of a hierarchical storage manager into the I/O system so that remotely stored attributes can be identified and tracked internally to the I/O system just like any other attributes. Implementations of the present invention may rely on a layered driver model where lower level drivers detect the existence of files with remotely stored attributes and then transfer control for processing I/O requests involving files with remotely stored attributes to higher level drivers. The higher level drivers then assume control to finish processing the I/O request.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 为了降低存储大量数据的总成本,已经开发了使用从快速本地磁盘到归档离线存储的存储设备层次结构的系统。 这样的存储设备可以分层管理,其中仅不经常访问的数据可以移动到档案存储。 本发明依赖于将分层存储管理器紧密集成到I/O系统中,从而可以在I/O系统内部识别和跟踪远程存储的属性,就像任何其他属性一样。 本发明的实现可以依赖于分层驱动模型,其中较低级别驱动检测具有远程存储属性的文件的存在,然后将用于处理涉及具有远程存储属性的文件的I/O请求的控制转移到较高级别驱动。 然后更高级别的驱动程序承担控制以完成处理 I/O 请求。

标题: Stylus input capacitive touchpad sensor
摘要: A capacitive touch pad comprises a substrate material, such as a PC board type laminate material, having a plurality of first parallel conductive traces running in a first (X) direction disposed on a first face thereof, and a plurality of second parallel conductive traces running in a second (Y) direction, usually orthogonal to the first direction, disposed on an opposed second face thereof. A layer of pressure-conductive material is disposed over one of the faces of the substrate. A protective layer with a conductive coating on its back surface is disposed over the top surface of the pressure-conductive material to protect it. In an alternate embodiment, a capacitive touch sensor comprises a rigid substrate material having a conducting material disposed on one face thereof. A layer of pressure-conductive material is disposed over the conductive material on the substrate. A flexible material, having a plurality of first parallel conductive traces running in a first (X) direction disposed on a first face thereof, and a plurality of second parallel conductive traces running in a second (Y) direction disposed on an opposed second face thereof is disposed over the layer of pressure-conductive material. A protective layer is disposed over the top surface of the pressure conductive material to protect it. In yet another embodiment, an air gap is used in place of the layer of pressure-conductive material and the upper layers are supported by a frame at the periphery of the touchpad.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 电容式触摸板包括基板材料,例如PC板型层压材料,具有布置在其第一面上的沿第一(X)方向延伸的多个第一平行导电迹线,以及延伸的多个第二平行导电迹线 在通常与第一方向正交的第二(Y)方向上,设置在其相对的第二面上。 一层压力传导材料设置在衬底的一个面上。 在其背面具有导电涂层的保护层设置在压力传导材料的顶表面上以保护它。 在替代实施例中,电容式触摸传感器包括刚性基板材料,该刚性基板材料具有设置在其一个面上的导电材料。 一层压力传导材料设置在衬底上的传导材料上。 一种柔性材料,具有布置在其第一表面上的沿第一(X)方向延伸的多个第一平行导电迹线,以及布置在其相对的第二表面上的沿第二(Y)方向延伸的多个第二平行导电迹线 设置在压力传导材料层上。 保护层设置在压力传导材料的顶表面上以保护它。 在又一个实施例中,使用气隙代替压力传导材料层,并且上层由触摸板外围的框架支撑。
发明人: ALLEN, TIMOTHY P. | SCHEDIWY, RICHARD R. | FAGGIN, FEDERICO
发明人地址: Los Gatos, CA | Union City, CA | Los Altos Hills, CA

标题: System and method for computer directory updating and presentation based on frequency of access
摘要: A computer system 200 having a hierarchical file directory system in which a user's patterns of use are analyzed when the user calls a file access routine such that the system tracks 904 which directories and files are accessed most frequently by the user when in a particular application 906. Upon the user accessing a particular application, the system then presents the user with a list of files or directories 908, 910 in order of most likely use from the particular application.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 具有分层文件目录系统的计算机系统200,其中当用户调用文件访问例程时分析用户的使用模式,使得系统跟踪904在特定应用906中用户最频繁地访问哪些目录和文件906  .在用户访问特定应用程序时,系统然后按照最有可能从特定应用程序使用的顺序向用户呈现文件或目录列表908、910。

标题: Molecular electro-optical transistor and switch
摘要: ABSTRACT Observable changes in the electrical and optical characteristics of individual molecules adsorbed on a conductor or semi-conductor caused by the electrical and/or optical excitation or de-excitation of electrons within such molecules can be used as signals which in turn can be used to carry information and such observable information carrying changes or signals can be switched, amplified, and modulated by varying the optical as well as the electrical inputs to such molecules. in the invention electro- optical molecules are adsorbed on a substrate. The natural characteristic of such a molecule is altered by ionization or electron transfer; more specifically an electron is excited to an excited state. Electron transfer, trapping, or excitation/state change, or molecule ionization is effected and controlled as a function of (1) electric potential across an adsorbed molecule or a layer or layers of such molecules and/or (2) wavelength(s)/frequency(ies) and intensity(ies) of the incident illumination thereof. Such electron transfer, trapping, or state change causes a change in the natural or non-perturbed optical response of the adsorbed molecule. The optical response can be detected using Raman spectroscopy, preferably surface enhanced Raman spectroscopy. Such detection or analysis provides a spatial distribution of the Raman lines, each having a particular intensity or magnitude level, thus providing multioutput and multilevel operation of the device. Analysis of the frequency or spatial distribution as well as the intensity of such output signal(s) or information identifies where such electron is trapped or transferred in the adsorbed molecule. Operation is at high speed, e.g. on the order of 10-13 to 10-15 second, and is functional at conventional room ambient temperatures.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 抽象 吸附在导体或半导体上的单个分子的电学和光学特性的可观察到的变化是由这些分子内电子的电学和/或光学激发或去激发引起的,可用作信号,这些信号又可用于 携带信息和携带变化或信号的此类可观察信息可以通过改变对此类分子的光学和电输入进行切换、放大和调制。 在本发明中,电光分子被吸附在基板上。 这种分子的自然特性会因电离或电子转移而改变; 更具体地说,电子被激发到激发态。 电子转移、俘获或激发/状态改变,或分子电离作为(1)跨吸附分子或此类分子的一层或多层的电势和/或(2)波长/ 其入射照明的频率和强度。 这种电子转移、俘获或状态变化导致吸附分子的自然或非扰动光学响应发生变化。 可以使用拉曼光谱,优选表面增强拉曼光谱来检测光学响应。 这种检测或分析提供了拉曼线的空间分布,每个拉曼线具有特定的强度或幅度水平,从而提供设备的多输出和多级操作。 对此类输出信号或信息的频率或空间分布以及强度的分析确定了此类电子在吸附分子中被捕获或转移的位置。 高速运行,例如 大约 10-13 到 10-15 秒,并且在常规室温环境下正常工作。
[标]当前申请(专利权)人: H S G VENTURE A JOINT VENTURE PARTNERSHIP
当前第一申请(专利权)人: H.S.G. VENTURE, A JOINT VENTURE PARTNERSHIP

标题: Continuous speech recognition apparatus
摘要: A conventional speech recognition network finite-state automaton, which follows regular grammar rules, is improved by adding subnetworks tapped into the original network at call and return points, whereby context-free grammar rules may be used, with avoidance of infinite loop response of a recurrent expression. A continuous speech recognition apparatus includes a standard pattern memory for storing standard patterns, a distance calculating section for calculating distances between frames of an input speech pattern and the standard patterns, an accumulation value calculating section for calculating accumulation values of the distances on matching paths which cause frames of the speech pattern and the standard patterns to correspond to each other, an accumulation value memory for storing the accumulation values, a return point memory for storing an address of a return point of a subnetwork in correspondence with the same address as that of the accumulation value memory, a call processing section for writing a minimum value of the accumulation values at a plurality of call points for the subnetwork as an initial value of the accumulation value for the subnetwork in the accumulation value memory and writing an address of a return point corresponding to the call point yielding the minimum value in the return point memory as an initial value, and a return processing section for writing an accumulation value at a terminal point of the subnetwork in the accumulation value memory addressed by the return point address stored in the return point memory at the terminal point of the subnetwork.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 遵循常规语法规则的传统语音识别网络有限状态自动机通过在调用点和返回点处添加接入原始网络的子网络得到改进,从而可以使用上下文无关语法规则,避免无限循环响应 循环表达。 连续语音识别装置包括用于存储标准模式的标准模式存储器、用于计算输入语音模式的帧与标准模式之间的距离的距离计算部分、用于计算匹配路径上的距离的累加值的累加值计算部分。 使语音模式的帧与标准模式相互对应, 累加值存储器用于存储累加值, 返回点存储器用于存储与子网的返回点地址对应的相同地址 累加值存储器,调用处理部分,用于将子网络的多个调用点处的累加值的最小值作为子网络累加值的初始值写入累加值存储器中,并写入返回地址 对应于产生最小值的调用点的点 返回点存储器作为初始值,以及返回处理部分,用于将子网络终点处的累加值写入累加值存储器中,该累加值存储器由存储在子网络终点处的返回点存储器中的返回点地址寻址 .

标题: Compact high speed hashed array for dictionary storage and lookup
摘要: An improved method for storing and rapidly accessing a dictionary file of encoded data for use in verifying the correct spelling of input words. Dictionary words are numerically encoded and hashed into magnitude and unique angle pairs. The hashed pairs are sorted and the magnitudes are mapped into a pointer bit vector containing a binary representation for each possible magnitude value and a binary representation for each actual magnitude value. The pointer bit vector is coordinated with the angle values which are stored as is. The spelling of input words is checked by hashing the input word and using the magnitude as an access to the pointer bit vector which yields pointers to all angles having the same magnitude as the input word. These angles are compared to the angle calculated for the input word and an indicator produced to show the result of the comparison and thereby whether the input word is correctly spelled.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种改进的方法,用于存储和快速访问编码数据的字典文件,用于验证输入单词的正确拼写。 字典单词被数字编码并散列成大小和独特的角度对。 对散列对进行排序,并将幅度映射到指针位向量中,该向量包含每个可能幅度值的二进制表示和每个实际幅度值的二进制表示。 指针位向量与按原样存储的角度值协调。 输入字的拼写检查是通过散列输入字并使用幅度作为对指针位向量的访问来进行的,指针位向量产生指向与输入字具有相同幅度的所有角度的指针。 将这些角度与为输入词计算的角度进行比较,并生成一个指示符来显示比较结果,从而显示输入词是否拼写正确。
当前第一申请(专利权)人: INTERNATIONAL BUSINESS MACHINES CORPORATION, A CORP. OF NY.

标题: Automated design analysis system for generating circuit schematics from high magnification images of an integrated circuit
摘要: A method of analyzing at least a portion of an integrated circuit (IC) comprised of the steps of automatically: (a) scanning at least a portion of a layer of an integrated circuit using high magnification to provide first digital signals representing pixel amplitudes, (b) extracting features of interest from the first digital signals to provide second digital signals representing values of groups of pixels defining the features of interest, (c) modifying the second digital signals representing adjacent features of interest from step (b) so as to mosaic the features of interest and providing third signals representing a seamless representation of the layer, (d) repeating steps (a), (b) and (c) for other layers of the integrated circuit, whereby plural third signals representing plural ones of the layers are provided, (e) registering the plural third signals relative to each other so as to represent vertical alignment of the layers by determining features of interest representative of IC mutual interconnection locations between layers, and using the locations as control points for the registering, and establishing an integrated circuit layout database therefrom, (f) generating a netlist from data signals defining the cells, and (g) generating a schematic diagram of a circuit contained in the integrated circuit from the netlist.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种分析集成电路 (IC) 至少一部分的方法,包括以下步骤: (a) 使用高放大率扫描集成电路层的至少一部分以提供表示像素幅度的第一数字信号, (  b) 从第一数字信号中提取感兴趣的特征,以提供表示定义感兴趣特征的像素组的值的第二数字信号, (c) 修改来自步骤 (b) 的表示相邻感兴趣特征的第二数字信号,以便拼接 感兴趣的特征并提供代表层的无缝表示的第三信号,(d) 对集成电路的其他层重复步骤 (a)、(b) 和 (c),由此多个第三信号代表多个层 提供,(e)相对于彼此配准多个第三信号,以便通过确定代表IC的感兴趣特征来表示层的垂直对齐 层间相互互连的位置,并以这些位置为控制点进行注册,并由此建立集成电路布局数据库,(f)从定义单元的数据信号生成网表,以及(g)生成电路示意图 包含在来自网表的集成电路中。

标题: Bewegungsvektorerfassungsgerät
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种运动矢量检测装置，包括：延迟电路，用于接收第一图像数据和用于输出图像数据的特定检测范围;块比较电路，用于接收具有与第一图像数据的特定差异的第二图像数据和来自第一图像数据的图像数据。延迟电路和用于检测来自延迟电路的图像数据和用于每个P×Q像素块的第二图像数据之间的差异的确定电路，以及用于确定来自块比较电路的输出信号的图像的匹配程度的确定电路。延迟电路包括：扫描转换电路，用于将来自传统水平扫描的输入图像数据转换为块内的扫描;以及多个移位寄存器，用于接收具有一帧延迟的第一图像数据。移位寄存器被安排成使得第二块P×Q像素比移位寄存器的特定参考抽头早，第二块与i图像元素水平地偏离，J像素从第一块垂直偏移设置，并且当第一块不偏离第二块时，选择具有等于第二块的每个图像元素与参考抽头之间的差的延迟的抽头，获得第二图像数据从所选的水龙头。 <IMAGE>

标题: Method and mechanism for associating properties with objects and instances
摘要: A method and system for associating properties in a computer system is described. An aspect relates to a mechanism for dynamically determining the value of a property for an instance or object, which can override the property defined for the class or object type. Another aspect relates to a mechanism for dynamically changing at run-time the set of properties associated with system structures, such as classes, object types, instances, or objects. Yet another aspect relates to a mechanism that can associate or disassociate an entire set of properties at the same time, rather than having to separately associate or disassociate each property within a set of properties. A further aspect relates to a mechanism for allowing particular instances or objects to explicitly not inherit properties of its familial class or object type.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 描述了一种用于在计算机系统中关联属性的方法和系统。 方面涉及用于动态确定实例或对象的属性值的机制,该机制可以覆盖为类或对象类型定义的属性。 另一方面涉及一种机制,用于在运行时动态改变与系统结构相关联的属性集,例如类、对象类型、实例或对象。 又一个方面涉及一种机制,该机制可以同时关联或取消关联整个属性集,而不是必须分别关联或取消关联一组属性中的每个属性。 另一方面涉及允许特定实例或对象明确不继承其家族类或对象类型的属性的机制。
发明人: AGARWAL, NIPUN | KRISHNAMURTHY, VISWANATHAN | SRINIVASAN, JAGANNATHAN
发明人地址: San Mateo, CA | Fremont, CA | New Hampshire, CT

标题: Data processing apparatus for electronic reading systems
摘要: 1520368 Character reading system ELETTRONICA SAN GIORGIO ELSAG SPA 3 Nov 1976 [3 Nov 1975] 45796/76 Heading G4R [Also in Division H4] Signals I(x, y) representing the radiant intensity or brightness of a reading area A1 at points P(x, y) are produced e.g. using an optical system and a line of photo diodes. The signals are fed to an analogue processor where the signals are integrated and supplied both to a peak detector and an analogue to digital converter. The signal from the peak detector represents the reference voltage and is proportional to the maximum illumination around the scanned point. The converter produces a digital signal representing the contrast at point P(x, y), S(x, y) = where I(x, y) is the brightness at point P(x, y) and I B is the brightness of the surrounding region. The contrast is emphasized using a field function which performs an adaptive filtering operation. The function #(#, h) at point P1(x+#, y+h) is defined as:- where K1, K3 are constants, K2 depends on background noise, mes A1 is the size of reading area A1 and mes A12 is the size of the area A2 enclosing the points in zones A2 around the reading area A1 and localized at the four vertices of the zone A1 which have A field response R(x, y) at point P(x, y) is calculated over areas A1, A2, A3 R(x, y) = ##S(x, y) #(x+#, y+h)d# dh+K 4 where K 4 is a constant. Since the converter output u(x, y) is proportional to the contrast #(x, y) = K1S(x, y). Since the photocells are sampled so that discrete values are obtained the integrations are formed by summing and the field response becomes, after the defined values of #(#, h) are substituted. Only signals for which v(x, y)#K2 are used and these signals are counted to derive the size of area A12. The values of R(x, y) are examined and binary values of the signals are obtained using the criteria

标题: Optical displacement detecting unit
摘要: PURPOSE:To chain the picture taken in before accurately based on the displacement, by determining the display cement between the picture taken in at present and that taken in just before, when the picture is taken in with the two dimentional pick up unit.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 目的:通过确定当前拍摄的照片与之前拍摄的照片之间的显示胶粘剂,在使用二维拾取单元拍摄照片时,根据位移准确地链接之前拍摄的照片。

标题: Algorithmische Maschine zur automatisierten Analyse von N-dimensionalen Untergruppen
摘要(译)(简体中文): 本发明提供了一种借助于分层吸引算法引擎的多参数数据分析方法。该方法采用通过构建群体层次来分析数据，其中群体不是相互排斥的，从而提供重要的分析工具。分层吸引子算法引擎的使用为用户提供了更大的灵活性，因为可以单独检查重叠群体。 <IMAGE>

标题: Probabilistic inference gate
摘要: The present system performs linear transformations on input probabilities and produces outputs which indicate the likelihood of one or more events. The transformation performed is a product of linear transforms such as Po=[AjPj+Bj]x[AkPk+Bk] where Pj and Pk are input probabilities, Po is an output event probability and Aj, Bj, Ak and Bk are transformation constants. The system includes a basic processing unit or computational unit which performs a probabilistic gate operation to convert two input probability signals into one output probability signal where the output probability is equal to the product of linear transformations of the input probabilities. By appropriate selection of transformation constants logical and probabilistic gates performing the functions of AND, NAND, OR, NOR, XOR, NOT, IMPLIES and NOT IMPLIES can be created. The basic unit can include three multipliers and two adders if a discrete component hardwired version is needed for speed or a single multiplier/adder, associated storage and multiplex circuits can be used to accomplish the functions of the hardwired version for economy. This basic unit can also be provided as a software implementation, can be implemented as a hardwired decision tree element implementation or implemented as a universal probabilistic processor and provided with a bus communication structure to create expert systems or neural networks suitable for specific tasks. The basic units can be combined to produce a virtual basic building block which has more virtual processors than physical processors to improve processor utilization. The building blocks can be combined into an array to produce either a high speed expert system or a high speed neural network.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 本系统对输入概率执行线性变换并产生指示一个或多个事件的可能性的输出。 执行的变换是线性变换的乘积,例如 Po=[AjPj+Bj]x[AkPk+Bk] 其中 Pj 和 Pk 是输入概率,Po 是输出事件概率,Aj、Bj、Ak 和 Bk 是变换常数。 该系统包括一个基本处理单元或计算单元,它执行概率门操作以将两个输入概率信号转换为一个输出概率信号,其中输出概率等于输入概率的线性变换的乘积。  By appropriate selection of transformation constants logical and probabilistic gates performing the functions of AND, NAND, OR, NOR, XOR, NOT, IMPLIES and NOT IMPLIES can be created. 如果需要分立元件硬接线版本以提高速度或单个乘法器/加法器,则基本单元可以包括三个乘法器和两个加法器,相关的存储和多路复用电路可用于完成硬接线版本的功能以经济。 该基本单元也可以作为软件实现来提供,可以作为硬连线决策树元素实现来实现,或者作为通用概率处理器来实现,并提供总线通信结构以创建适合特定任务的专家系统或神经网络。 可以将这些基本单元组合成一个虚拟基本构建块,它具有比物理处理器更多的虚拟处理器,以提高处理器利用率。 这些构建块可以组合成一个阵列,以产生高速专家系统或高速神经网络。

标题: Method and apparatus for determining the endpoints of a speech utterance
摘要(译)(简体中文): 话音被提供给控制电路，该控制电路包括多个带通滤波器和耦合到滤波器的最大值检测器。 滤波器的输出的最大值被馈送到端点检测器，其中使用最大值和至少一个阈值来定位或确定端点。

标题: Method of and apparatus for creating a multi-media footnote
摘要: A multi-media footnote control links a reference and a video. During the viewing of a video by an author/editor thereof, a footnote may be added to properly credit another source and to aid in study of the subject presented on the video. At the appropriate place in the video, the author/editor stops the video and displays a create footnote window. The author will then enter the appropriate data into the window. The footnote data will then be automatically passed to the video in the predetermined position. The footnote will be displayed in a footnote area during the running of the video. If a user/author of the video wishes to review the footnoted reference, the video may be stopped and by indicating the footnote such as with a mouse, the reference will be displayed in a separate window.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 多媒体脚注控件链接参考和视频。 在作者/编辑者观看视频期间,可以添加脚注以适当地注明另一个来源并帮助研究视频上呈现的主题。 在视频的适当位置,作者/编辑停止视频并显示创建脚注窗口。 然后作者将在窗口中输入适当的数据。 然后脚注数据将自动传递到预定位置的视频。 视频运行期间,脚注将显示在脚注区域。 如果视频的用户/作者希望查看带脚注的参考,则可以停止视频并且通过例如用鼠标指示脚注,参考将显示在单独的窗口中。

发明人地址: Flower Mound, TX | Richardson, TX | Highland Village, TX | Mesquite, TX

标题: Method and apparatus for recognizing smears
摘要: After a slide glass having blood smeared thereon has been mounted on a movable stage of a microscope, the stage is moved to position a view field of the microscope to the center of the slide glass. Then, the stage is moved in one direction along the length of the slide glass. The view field of the microscope moves as the stage is moved so that red blood corpuscle densities on the smear are measured sequentially along the length of the slide glass. Based on the measurement a computer determines an optimum test area on the smear for the recognition of white blood corpuscles and the stage is moved to a start position of the optimum test area by an instruction from the computer. Thereafter, a normal stage scan operation for detecting the white blood corpuscles is carried out and the detected white blood corpuscles are automatically classified.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 在其上涂有血液的载玻片已经安装在显微镜的可移动载物台上之后,移动载物台以将显微镜的视野定位到载玻片的中心。 然后,载物台沿载玻片的长度在一个方向上移动。 显微镜的视野随着载物台的移动而移动,以便沿着载玻片的长度顺序测量涂片上的红血球密度。 根据测量结果,计算机在涂片上确定用于识别白细胞的最佳测试区域,并根据计算机的指令将载物台移动到最佳测试区域的起始位置。 之后,进行白细胞检测的正常阶段扫描操作,对检测到的白细胞进行自动分类。

标题: Methods of and systems for generating sets of digital signals representative of handwritten characters
摘要: 1463888 Character recognition systems STANFORD RESEARCH INSTITUTE 9 July 1974 [31 Jan 1974] 30402/74 Heading G4R A system for recognizing a hand-written character employs a pen which provides a succession of signals indicative of the successive directions of motion of the pen in writing the character. Certain of the direction signals are ignored since certain sequences of directions are not permitted. Each of the remaining signals of the succession is used in turn as part of the address of a location in a memory. The other part of the address is obtained from the location addressed previously, the presently addressed location providing part of the address of the next location, and so on in the manner of a decision tree until a final location is addressed, the final location containing a signal representing the character. The pen disclosed (Fig. 12, not shown), has an angularly movable stylus whose instantaneous angular direction is indicative of the instantaneous direction of movement of the pen and is detected by four quadrantally arranged photocells. The photocell outputs are combined to resolve the angular direction into X and Y components which are used to provide U (up), D (down), L (left) and R (right) signals. If the photocell outputs cannot be clearly resolved to a U, D, L, or R signal, e.g. when the pen is moved diagonally it is assumed that the last clear signal persists. In addition a signal (.) is given indicating that the pen is not pressing on the writing surface. The signals U, D, L, R and . are each represented as a 3-bit word called a branch address. A read-only memory provides an initial node address from an initial location. A node address is a 7-bit word which defines part of the address of the next location to be addressed. Thus the initial node address together with the first branch address define the address of the root node location of a logic tree. For example if the first branch address is U, which it will be only if the character written is A, P, V, or 1, the logic tree which has a root node U will be selected, Fig. 7. The root node location contains a node address defining, in the case of Fig. 7, three possible locations, one of which is selected by the next branch address. For example, if the next branch address is D the centre branch is selected, and so on, successive memory locations being addressed until a final location is reached, the final location providing a character-representing signal to an output device. If a direction signal sequence begins UL the decision tree chooses the left hand branch. This has the effect of disregarding the initial U and starting the sequence at L by passing to the decision tree having a root node L. The disregarded U represents a flourish at the start of formation of a character. The initial R of a sequence beginning RU is similarly disregarded. Certain characters cannot be reliably recognized until either it has been ascertained by a timing unit that no further character follows or the next character is begun. For example, in the case of the centre branch of Fig. 7 numeral 1 cannot be distinguished from character A until it is determined that UD. is not followed by R. This will be so only if the next pen movements (if any) relate to the following character, since no character begins with this sequence.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 1463888 Character recognition systems STANFORD RESEARCH INSTITUTE 9 July 1974 [31 Jan 1974] 30402/74 Heading G4R 识别手写字符的系统使用笔,该笔提供一系列信号,指示笔在书写时的连续运动方向 性格。 某些方向信号被忽略,因为某些方向序列是不允许的。 序列中的每个剩余信号依次用作存储器中某个位置的地址的一部分。 地址的另一部分是从先前寻址的位置获得的,当前寻址的位置提供下一个位置的部分地址,以决策树的方式依此类推,直到寻址到最终位置,最终位置包含一个 表示字符的信号。 所公开的笔(图12,未示出)具有角度可移动的笔,其瞬时角度方向指示笔的瞬时运动方向并且由四个象限布置的光电管检测。 组合光电管输出以将角度方向分解为 X 和 Y 分量,用于提供 U(上)、D(下)、L(左)和 R(右)信号。 如果光电管输出无法清楚地解析为 U、D、L 或 R 信号,例如 当笔沿对角线移动时,假设最后的清除信号持续存在。 此外,还会给出一个信号 (.),表示笔没有压在书写表面上。 信号 U、D、L、R 和 。 每个都表示为称为分支地址的 3 位字。 只读存储器从初始位置提供初始节点地址。 节点地址是一个 7 位字,它定义了下一个要寻址的位置的部分地址。 因此,初始节点地址与第一个分支地址一起定义了逻辑树的根节点位置的地址。 例如第一个分支地址为U,只有写入的字符为A、P、V或1时才会出现,则选择根节点为U的逻辑树,图7。根节点位置 包含一个节点地址,在图 7 的情况下,定义了三个可能的位置,其中一个由下一个分支地址选择。 例如,如果下一个分支地址是 D,则选择中心分支,依此类推,寻址连续的存储器位置,直到到达最终位置,最终位置向输出设备提供字符表示信号。 如果方向信号序列从 UL 开始,则决策树会选择左侧分支。 这具有忽略初始 U 并通过传递到具有根节点 L 的决策树从 L 开始序列的效果。忽略的 U 表示字符形成开始时的蓬勃发展。 同样忽略以 RU 开头的序列的初始 R。 某些字符无法可靠地识别,直到计时单元确定没有其他字符跟随或下一个字符开始。 例如,在图7的中心分支的情况下,数字1不能与字符A区分开来,直到确定UD。 后面不跟 R。只有当下一个笔的移动(如果有的话)与后面的字符相关时才会如此,因为没有字符以此序列开头。

标题: Automatic handwriting recognition using both static and dynamic parameters
摘要: Methods and apparatus are disclosed for recognizing handwritten characters in response to an input signal from a handwriting transducer. A feature extraction and reduction procedure is disclosed that relies on static or shape information, wherein the temporal order in which points are captured by an electronic tablet may be disregarded. A method of the invention generates and processes the tablet data with three independent sets of feature vectors which encode the shape information of the input character information. These feature vectors include horizontal (x-axis) and vertical (y-axis) slices of a bit-mapped image of the input character data, and an additional feature vector to encode an absolute y-axis displacement from a baseline of the bit-mapped image. It is shown that the recognition errors that result from the spatial or static processing are quite different from those resulting from temporal or dynamic processing. Furthermore, it is shown that these differences complement one another. As a result, a combination of these two sources of feature vector information provides a substantial reduction in an overall recognition error rate. Methods to combine probability scores from dynamic and the static character models are also disclosed.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 公开了用于响应来自手写转换器的输入信号来识别手写字符的方法和设备。 公开了一种依赖于静态或形状信息的特征提取和缩减过程,其中可以忽略电子输入板捕获点的时间顺序。 本发明的一种方法生成并处理具有三个独立特征向量集的输入板数据,这些特征向量对输入字符信息的形状信息进行编码。 这些特征向量包括输入字符数据的位图图像的水平(x 轴)和垂直(y 轴)切片,以及一个附加特征向量,用于编码从位基线的绝对 y 轴位移。 映射的图像。 结果表明,空间或静态处理产生的识别错误与时间或动态处理产生的识别错误有很大不同。 此外,这表明这些差异是相辅相成的。 结果,这两种特征向量信息源的组合显着降低了总体识别错误率。 还公开了组合来自动态和静态字符模型的概率分数的方法。
发明人: BELLEGARDA, JEROME R. | NAHAMOO, DAVID | NATHAN, KRISHNA S.
发明人地址: Goldens Bridge, NY | White Plains, NY | New York, NY

标题: METODO Y DISPOSITIVO PARA LA EVALUACION AUTOMATICA DE GRANOS DE CEREALES Y OTROS PRODUCTOS GRANULARES.
摘要: EN EL CALCULO AUTOMATICO DE GRANOS DE CEREALES O PRODUCTOS GRANULARES SIMILARES MANIPULADOS A GRANEL, LOS GRANOS SE TRANSPORTAN SOBRE UN TRANSPORTADOR (15) DE CORREA VIBRATORIA. DEBIDO A LAS VIBRACIONES, LOS GRANOS SE EXTIENDEN Y SE COLOCAN EN RANURAS (14) EN LA CORREA, PARA ORIENTARSE EN LA MISMA DIRECCION PRINCIPALMENTE. UN VIDEOCAMARA (40) PRODUCE IMAGENES DIGITALES DE TODOS LOS GRANOS SOBRE LA CORREA. LOS GRANOS SE IDENTIFICAN EN LAS IMAGENES, Y PARA CADA GRANO SE PRODUCEN SEÑALES DE ENTRADA A UNA RED NEURAL, BASADA EN LOS VALORES DE ELEMENTOS DE IMAGENES PARA LOS ELEMENTOS DE IMAGENES QUE REPRESENTAN EL GRANO. A CONTINUACION LA RED NEURAL DETERMINA A QUE PERTENECE CADA GRANO ENTRE LAS CLASES PREDETERMINADAS DE UNA PLURALIDAD DE ELLAS.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 在散装处理的谷粒或类似颗粒产品的自动评估中,谷粒在振动带式输送机(15)上传送。 由于振动,谷粒散布并沉降在传送带的凹槽(14)中,从而基本上以相同的方向定向。 摄像机(40)产生传送带上所有谷粒的数字图像。 内核在图像中被识别,并且对于每个内核,输入信号根据代表内核的图片元素的图片元素值生成到神经网络。 然后神经网络确定每个内核属于多个预定类别中的哪一个。
发明人: OSTE, RICKARD | EGELBERG, PETER | PETERSON, CARSTEN | SODERLUND, PATRIK | SJOSTEDT, LENNART

标题: Communication device and method for endpointing speech utterances
摘要: A communication device capable of endpointing speech utterances includes a microprocessor (110) connected to communication interface circuitry (115), memory (120), audio circuitry (130), an optional keypad (140), a display (150), and a vibrator/buzzer (160). Audio circuitry (130) is connected to microphone (133) and speaker (135). Microprocessor (110) includes a speech/noise classifier and speech recognition technology. Microprocessor (110) analyzes a speech signal to determine speech waveform parameters within a speech acquisition window. Microprocessor (110) compares the speech waveform parameters to determine the start and end points of the speech utterance. Microprocessor (110) starts at a frame index based on the energy centroid of the speech utterance and analyzes the frames preceding and following the frame index to determine the endpoints. When a potential endpoint is identified, microprocessor (110) compares the cumulative energy to the total energy of the speech acquisition window to determine whether additional speech frames are present. Accordingly, gaps and pauses in the utterance will not result in an erroneous endpoint determination.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种能够终止语音发音的通信设备包括连接到通信接口电路(115)、存储器(120)、音频电路(130)、可选键盘(140)、显示器(150)和振动器的微处理器(110)  /蜂鸣器(160)。 音频电路(130)连接到麦克风(133)和扬声器(135)。 微处理器(110)包括语音/噪声分类器和语音识别技术。 微处理器(110)分析语音信号以确定语音采集窗口内的语音波形参数。 微处理器(110)比较语音波形参数以确定语音发声的起点和终点。 微处理器 (110) 从基于语音话语能量质心的帧索引开始,并分析帧索引之前和之后的帧以确定端点。 当潜在的端点被识别时,微处理器(110)将累积能量与语音采集窗口的总能量进行比较以确定是否存在额外的语音帧。 因此,话语中的间隙和停顿不会导致错误的端点确定。
[标]当前申请(专利权)人: 谷歌技术控股有限责任公司
法律状态/事件: 期限届满 | 权利转移

标题: Apparatus for the classification of a pattern for example on a banknote or a coin
摘要: For the classification of a pattern in particular on a banknote or a coin, a receiving system detects, by a measurement procedure, vectors of a test item, a pre-processing system transforms the measured vectors into local feature vectors ALCi(l) and a learning classification system carries out a plurality of testing operations. A first activity compares in a first testing operation each of the local feature vectors ALCi(l) to a vectorial reference value. It is only if the first testing operation takes place successfully that the first activity, by means of first estimates which are stored in a data base, links the local feature vectors ALC(l) to provided global line feature vectors AGIi. In a second testing operation a third activity compares the global line feature vectors AGIi to corresponding reference values and, if the second testing operation is successful, computes a single global surface vector AGF of which a fourth activity, in a third testing operation, compares its distance in accordance with Mahalanobis relative to an estimated surface vector to a reference value. The test item is reliably clasified if all three testing operations take place successfully.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 为了对特别是纸币或硬币上的图案进行分类,接收系统通过测量程序检测测试项目的向量,预处理系统将测量的向量转换为局部特征向量 ALCi(l) 和 学习分类系统进行多项测试操作。 第一活动在第一测试操作中将每个局部特征向量ALCi(l)与向量参考值进行比较。 只有当第一次测试操作成功发生时,第一次活动才通过存储在数据库中的第一次估计,将局部特征向量 ALC(l) 链接到提供的全局线特征向量 AGIi。 在第二个测试操作中,第三个活动将全局线特征向量 AGIi 与相应的参考值进行比较,如果第二个测试操作成功,则计算单个全局表面向量 AGF,第四个活动在第三个测试操作中将其比较 根据 Mahalanobis 相对于估计的表面矢量到参考值的距离。 如果所有三个测试操作都成功进行,则测试项目被可靠地分类。
法律状态/事件: 未缴年费 | 权利转移

标题: Data converting device for encoding and editing time series data and method thereof
摘要: A data converting device collects time series movement data by measuring a movement of a living thing, encodes the movement data, and stores the encoded data in a storage device. Next, the data converting device generates new encoded data by reading and editing the encoded data. The data converting device then restores the movement data from the encoded data, and reproduces the movement of a virtual character on a display device based on the restored data.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 数据转换装置通过测量生物的运动来收集时序运动数据,对运动数据进行编码,并将编码数据存储在存储装置中。 接下来,数据转换装置通过读取和编辑编码数据来生成新的编码数据。 然后,数据转换装置从编码数据恢复运动数据,并基于恢复的数据在显示装置上再现虚拟角色的运动。
发明人: MAEDA, YOSHIHARU | BURDET, ETIENNE | TAKAYAMA, KUNIHARU | HOSOGI, SHINYA

标题: Managing application programs in a computer network by using a database of application objects
摘要: A method and apparatus for management of application programs in a computer network are disclosed. A modified hierarchical database which includes application objects that represent applications and their execution environments is utilized. Administrator tools support the creation, deletion, and modification of application objects. Each application object includes the location of an executable code for a given application, an icon, a working directory name, drive mappings, printer port captures, command line parameters, and similar information. An application launcher queries the database and updates a list of available applications which is kept in the user's desktop. The launcher automatically launches specified applications when a user runs the launcher. The launcher also uses the information in the application object to setup resources needed by the application, to create a process that executes the application, and to clean up after the application terminates. Resource setup involves mapping drives and capturing printer ports as needed. The database, the launcher, and the administrator tools allow consistent tracking and use of information about application programs and their execution environments in the network.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 公开了一种用于在计算机网络中管理应用程序的方法和装置。 使用了一个修改过的分层数据库,它包括表示应用程序及其执行环境的应用程序对象。 管理员工具支持应用程序对象的创建、删除和修改。 每个应用程序对象包括给定应用程序的可执行代码的位置、图标、工作目录名称、驱动器映射、打印机端口捕获、命令行参数和类似信息。 应用程序启动器查询数据库并更新保存在用户桌面上的可用应用程序列表。 当用户运行启动器时,启动器会自动启动指定的应用程序。 启动器还使用应用程序对象中的信息来设置应用程序所需的资源,创建执行应用程序的进程,并在应用程序终止后进行清理。 资源设置包括根据需要映射驱动器和捕获打印机端口。 数据库、启动器和管理员工具允许一致地跟踪和使用关于应用程序及其在网络中的执行环境的信息。
发明人: SONDEREGGER, KELLY E. | HOPTON, KEVIN L. | BROOKS, MATTHEW G. | LAWRENCE, ANDY | JANIS, DAMON | DAYTON, LORI K. | OLDROYD, THOMAS B.
法律状态/事件: 期限届满 | 质押 | 复审 | 权利转移

标题: Profile extracting method and system
摘要: To identify the shape of an object on the basis of a two-dimensional image including the image of the object, an image of notice is extracted from the two-dimensioinal image as a part thereof and including the profile of the object, and on the basis of the image information of the extracted image of notice, the image division line, being the line of specific line kind defined by function, substantially matching with the profile of the object in the image of notice is assessed.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 为了基于包括对象图像的二维图像来识别对象的形状,从二维图像中提取注意图像作为其一部分并且包括对象的轮廓,并且在 根据提取的通知图像的图像信息,评估图像分割线,即由函数定义的特定线类的线,与通知图像中对象的轮廓基本匹配。

标题: Specifying indexes for relational databases
摘要: An index set for a databse is specified by analyzing a sample (718) of SQL statements applied to the database (701). Indexes (707) are identified that could assist in the execution of the analyzed statements and levels of improved operation are evaluated for each of said indexes. The evaluated levels are then processed (708) to specify an index set for inclusion on the database. The database may not include sufficient storage (702) for all of the specified indexes to be included, therefore the available storage space is allocated and indexes are selected on a prioritized basis.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 通过分析应用于数据库(701)的 SQL 语句的样本(718)来指定数据库的索引集。 标识索引 (707) 可以帮助执行所分析的语句,并针对每个所述索引评估改进操作的级别。 然后处理(708)评估的级别以指定用于包含在数据库中的索引集。 数据库可能不包括足够的存储空间 (702) 用于要包括的所有指定索引,因此分配可用存储空间并在优先级的基础上选择索引。

标题: Method and apparatus for diagnosing machines
摘要: A general purpose expert apparatus architecture for diagnosing faults in any one of a plurality of machines includes a machine information database (12) containing information on characteristics of various components of the machines to be diagnosed and a sensory input database (14) which contains vibration data taken at predetermined locations on each of the machines. The knowledge base (10) contains a plurality of general rules that are applicable to each of the plurality of machines. The generality of diagnosis is accomplished by focusing on components that make up the machine rather than individual machines as a whole. The apparatus architecture also permits diagnosis of machines based on other parameters such as amperage, torques, displacement and its derivatives, forces, pressures and temperatures. The apparatus includes an inference engine which links the rules in a backward chaining structure.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种用于诊断多台机器中的任何一台机器故障的通用专家设备架构,包括一个机器信息数据库(12),其中包含有关要诊断的机器的各种组件的特性信息,以及一个包含振动数据的传感输入数据库(14) 在每台机器上的预定位置拍摄。 知识库(10)包含适用于多台机器中的每台机器的多条通用规则。 诊断的普遍性是通过关注构成机器的组件而不是单个机器作为一个整体来实现的。 该设备架构还允许根据其他参数(例如安培数、扭矩、位移及其导数、力、压力和温度)对机器进行诊断。 该装置包括以反向链接结构链接规则的推理引擎。
发明人: BAJPAI, ATUL | MARCZEWSKI, RICHARD W. | MAREK, MELISSA M. | SHRIVASTAVA, ANIL B. | AMBLE, CHARLES S. | JOYCE, ROBERT H. | KISHORE, NANDA | OLLANIK, STEVEN J.
发明人地址: Warren, MI | Rochester, MI | Royal Oak, MI | Troy, MI | Prudenville, MI | San Jose, CA | Los Gatos, CA | Los Altos, CA

标题: Character processing apparatus for selectively modifying a font pattern
摘要: A character processing apparatus comprises: parameter memory means for storing type parameters; display means for displaying a list of a plurality of type vector fonts on the basis of the type parameters; selecting means for selecting a plurality of type vector fonts displayed by the display means; and converting means for converting each of the vector fonts existing in a designated interval in a vector font train which are input from input means and displayed by the display means into the type vector fonts selected by the selecting means, wherein the modified vector fonts which are frequently used and correspond to fundamental vector fonts are previously registered, and when modified vector font patterns are formed, the registered modified vector font patterns are displayed and selected, thereby enabling the parameters for the modified vector font patterns to be easily set.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种字符处理装置,包括:用于存储类型参数的参数存储装置; 显示装置,用于根据类型参数显示多个类型矢量字体的列表; 选择装置,用于选择由显示装置显示的多种类型矢量字体; 转换装置,用于将从输入装置输入并由显示装置显示的向量字体列中的指定间隔中存在的每个向量字体转换为由选择装置选择的类型向量字体,其中,修改后的向量字体是 预先注册常用的和基本矢量字体对应的,当修改矢量字体图案形成时,显示并选择注册的修改矢量字体图案,从而可以方便地设置修改矢量字体图案的参数。
发明人: SHIBUYA, YUKARI | SETO, KUNIO | HAMADA, MASAKI | SHIRASAKA, AKIFUMI
发明人地址: Kawasaki, JP | Inagi, JP | Tokyo, JP | Yokohama, JP

标题: Method and apparatus for facilitating real-time and asynchronous loading and temporally-overlapping of modular multimedia software tasks in a multimedia data processing system
摘要: A data processing system for executing multimedia applications which interface with multimedia devices that consume or produce at least one of real-time and asynchronous streamed data includes a CPU for execution of one or more multimedia applications and a DSP for processing data including streamed data. A plurality of modular multimedia software tasks may be called by the multimedia application for execution in the DSP. A plurality of data communication modules are provided for linking selected ones of the software tasks with selected others of the software tasks, and linking selected multimedia devices with selected ones of the software tasks. Each of the communications modules allows continuous, real-time and unidirectional communication of streamed data. The modularity of the processing system defines an open architecture for real-time processing which allows additional modular multimedia tasks to be added to the software tasks and selectively linked to at least one of (a) selected ones of the software tasks, and (b) selected ones of the multimedia devices. A DSP manager is resident in the CPU which dynamically monitors resource allocation to allow at least one software task to be loaded and executed while at least one other software task is being executed by the DSP without interference with execution.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种用于执行多媒体应用程序的数据处理系统,该多媒体应用程序与消耗或产生实时和异步流数据中的至少一个的多媒体设备接口,包括用于执行一个或多个多媒体应用程序的CPU和用于处理包括流数据的数据的DSP。 多媒体应用程序可以调用多个模块化多媒体软件任务以在DSP中执行。 提供多个数据通信模块,用于将选定的软件任务与选定的其他软件任务相链接,以及将选定的多媒体设备与选定的软件任务相链接。 每个通信模块都允许流数据的连续、实时和单向通信。 处理系统的模块化定义了一个用于实时处理的开放架构,它允许将额外的模块化多媒体任务添加到软件任务中,并有选择地链接到(a)选定的软件任务中的至少一个,以及(b) 选择的多媒体设备。  DSP 管理器驻留在 CPU 中,动态监控资源分配,以允许加载和执行至少一项软件任务,同时至少一项其他软件任务正在由 DSP 执行,而不会干扰执行。
[标]当前申请(专利权)人: 联想(新加坡)私人有限公司
发明人: ALLRAN, GARY G. | CARMON, DONALD E. | CHEN, FETCHI | EDUARTEZ, JOSE A. | KNOX, CHARLES R. | LAWTON, WILLIAM L. | MARSHALL, LLEWELLYN B. | MITCHELL, NATHAN A. | WARE, MALCOLM C. | WEEKS, RAYMOND W. | YOUNG, CHARLES R.
发明人地址: Boca Raton, FL | Durham, NC | Miami Beach, FL | Raleigh, NC | Cary, NC | Apex, NC
法律状态/事件: 未缴年费 | 权利转移

标题: Data processing method and apparatus
摘要: Data processing apparatus receives recognition data from a speech recognition engine and its corresponding dictated audio data. A display displays the recognised words or characters and the recognised words or characters are stored as a file together with the corresponding audio data. Link data is formed to link the position of the words or characters in the file and the position of the corresponding audio component in the audio data. The recognised words or characters can be processed without loosing the audio data. An audio message may be stored associated with a document. The apparatus may display to the operator recognised words or characters which have a likelihood indicator below a preset threshold.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 数据处理装置从语音识别引擎接收识别数据及其对应的口述音频数据。 显示器显示识别的单词或字符,并且识别的单词或字符与相应的音频数据一起存储为文件。 形成链接数据以链接文件中的单词或字符的位置和音频数据中相应音频分量的位置。 可以处理识别的单词或字符而不会丢失音频数据。 可以存储与文档相关联的音频消息。 该装置可以向操作员显示具有低于预设阈值的可能性指示符的识别的单词或字符。
发明人: JOHN, CHRISTOPHER, , MITCHELL | ALAN, JAMES, , HEARD | STEVE, NORMAN, , CORBETT | NICHOLAS, JOHN, , DANIEL
法律状态/事件: 未缴年费 | 权利转移

标题: Vehicle interior identification and monitoring system
摘要: Method and apparatus for controlling a system in the vehicle based on one or more occupying items in which a portion of the passenger compartment in which the item is situated is irradiated, and reflected radiation from surfaces of the occupying item are received and processed in order to create one or more electronic signals characteristic of the occupying item based on the received radiation, each signal containing a pattern representative and characteristic of the occupying item and being categorized by utilizing pattern recognition system for recognizing and thus identifying the class of the occupying item. The pattern recognition system processing each signal into a categorization thereof based on data corresponding to patterns of received radiation stored within the pattern recognition system and associated with possible classes of occupying items of the vehicle. Thereafter, another system in the vehicle is affected based on the categorization of the signal(s).
摘要(译)(简体中文): 用于基于一个或多个占用物品控制车辆中的系统的方法和设备,其中物品所在的乘客舱的一部分被照射,并且接收和处理来自占用物品的表面的反射辐射以便 基于接收到的辐射创建一个或多个具有占用物品特征的电子信号,每个信号包含代表占用物品的模式和特征,并通过利用模式识别系统进行分类,以识别占用物品的类别,从而识别占用物品的类别。 模式识别系统基于与存储在模式识别系统内的接收到的辐射模式相对应并且与车辆占用物品的可能类别相关联的数据将每个信号处理成其分类。 此后,车辆中的另一个系统基于信号的分类而受到影响。
发明人: BREED, DAVID S. | DUVALL, WILBUR E. | JOHNSON, WENDELL C.
发明人地址: Boonton Township, Morris County, NJ | Kimberling City, MO | San Diego, CA

标题: Method and system for audio access to information in a wide area computer network
摘要: Method and system for representing different types of information on a wide area network in a form suitable for access over an audio interface (12). Audio enabled pages (29) are created to link particular text data, which data can be from the World Wide Web (WWW). The audio enabled pages (29) can be retrieved by an audio web server (16, 18) for interpreting the pages into audio which is displayed at the audio interface (12). Audio input means are created to traverse the links of the audio enable pages (29). A user can use the keypad of the phone (12) or spoken commands to traverse the audio menus. In addition, dynamic audio input means can be created to selectively traverse a database of the WWW information.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 以适合通过音频接口 (12) 访问的形式在广域网上表示不同类型信息的方法和系统。 创建启用音频的页面 (29) 以链接特定的文本数据,该数据可以来自万维网 (WWW)。 启用音频的页面(29)可以由音频网络服务器(16、18)检索,用于将页面解释为显示在音频接口(12)处的音频。 创建音频输入装置以遍历音频启用页面 (29) 的链接。 用户可以使用电话 (12) 的键盘或口头命令来遍历音频菜单。 此外,可以创建动态音频输入装置以选择性地遍历WWW信息的数据库。
当前第一申请(专利权)人: RUTGERS, THE STATE UNIVERSITY OF NEW JERSEY

标题: Handwritten keyboardless entry computer system
摘要: A keyboardless entry computer system includes a transparent input screen that generates positional information when contacted by a stylus, and a display screen mounted physically below the input screen such that a character that is displayed can be seen below the input screen. The system includes a computer that has been programmed to compile the positional information into Strokes, to calculate Stroke characteristics, and then compare the Stroke characteristics with those stored in a database in order to recognize the symbol drawn by the stylus. Key features of the system are: (1) transparent position sensing subsystem; (2) underlying display on which to mimic drawing of sensed positions and to show characters or symbols; (3) means to convert sensed positions first into plotted Points and then into recognized characters or symbols; and (4) means to "learn" to associate sensed input positions with a character or symbol.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种无键盘输入计算机系统包括一个透明的输入屏幕,当被触控笔接触时产生位置信息,以及一个实际安装在输入屏幕下方的显示屏,以便在输入屏幕下方可以看到显示的字符。 该系统包括一台计算机,该计算机已被编程以将位置信息编译成笔画,以计算笔画特征,然后将笔画特征与存储在数据库中的那些特征进行比较,以识别手写笔绘制的符号。 该系统的主要特点是:(1)透明的位置传感子系统;  (2) 底层显示器,在其上模拟感应位置的绘制并显示字符或符号;  (3) 是指先将感测位置转换为标绘点,然后再转换为可识别的字符或符号;  (4) 意味着“学习”将感测到的输入位置与字符或符号相关联。
法律状态/事件: 期限届满 | 质押 | 权利转移

标题: Programmable options for volume mount on a computing system
摘要: Programmable options for a mount command are checked for compatibility with file system types when attaching a media file system (36) to a existing file system in a computing system. The options are programmed into a mount entry (10) in a configuration file (22). The configuration file is used to generate the mount command (34). The mount entry defines file system types for the media file system and programmable options to control operation of the computing system with the media file system. The file system types, the programmable options and the compatibility of the programmable options with the file system types are all verified.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 当将媒体文件系统(36)附加到计算系统中的现有文件系统时,检查安装命令的可编程选项与文件系统类型的兼容性。 这些选项被编程到配置文件 (22) 中的安装条目 (10) 中。 配置文件用于生成挂载命令(34)。 安装条目定义媒体文件系统的文件系统类型和可编程选项以控制具有媒体文件系统的计算系统的操作。 文件系统类型、可编程选项以及可编程选项与文件系统类型的兼容性都经过验证。

标题: Wavesource image visualization method using a partial division fast fourier transform
摘要: The reconstruction region of a hologram reconstructed image is segmented. A fast Fourier transform (FFT) is carried out after multiplying the hologram measurement data V(R) by a weighting function. A fast Fourier transform (FFT) is carried out after multiplying the antenna sensitivity inverse matrix A-1(R'a,b) for each segment by inverse propagation function r'a,bexp(j2 pi r'a,b/ lambda ) to find B-1a,b(s, t), and then multiplying this by a weighting function. After the two FFT outputs are multiplied by each other, inverse fast Fourier transform (IFFT) is carried out. Compensation is performed for the weighting function and the output is made the segment reconstructed image. In addition, radio hologram observation is carried out at two scan surfaces, a horizontal polarization antenna and a vertical polarization antenna are placed at each scan surface, and the voltage vector distribution received by the antennas is stored. The sizes of the error of the reception antenna sensitivity matrix of the vertical polarization reception antenna and the error of the reception antenna sensitivity matrix of the horizontal polarization reception antenna are found, and the received voltage vectors and reception antenna sensitivity inverse matrices are selectively used to find and visualize the three wavesource current vector components.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 全息图重建图像的重建区域被分割。 在将全息测量数据V(R)乘以加权函数之后执行快速傅里叶变换(FFT)。 在将每个段的天线灵敏度逆矩阵 A-1(Ra,b) 乘以逆传播函数 ra,bexp(j2 pi ra,b/ lambda ) 后,执行快速傅里叶变换 (FFT) 找到 B-1a,b(s,t),然后将其乘以加权函数。 在两个 FFT 输出相乘后,执行快速傅里叶逆变换 (IFFT)。 对加权函数进行补偿,输出分段重构图像。 另外,在两个扫描面进行射电全息观测,在每个扫描面上放置水平极化天线和垂直极化天线,并存储天线接收到的电压矢量分布。 求出垂直极化接收天线的接收天线灵敏度矩阵和水平极化接收天线的接收天线灵敏度矩阵的误差大小,并有选择地利用接收电压矢量和接收天线灵敏度逆矩阵 找到并可视化三个波源电流矢量分量。
[标]当前申请(专利权)人: 爱德万测试股份有限公司

标题: Operating system and data base using table access method with dynamic binding
摘要: A system for program development and execution consisting of a high level programming language based on a four part rule organization, consisting of a rule definition, a list of conditions, a list of actions which are taken upon satisfaction of a corresponding condition, and a list of exception handlers. The high level language is translated into an internal representation which controls a virtual stack machine. The virtual stack machine performs dynamic binding of rules and data to the current rule. Data access events are supplied through a table access method which provides an interface to the variety of sources of data coupled to the system. These sources of data include screens, import/export mechanisms, a foreign database system, such as IMS, and a local database system known as the table data store. The table data store organizes data in an object oriented, relational system, where each table is ordered on a primary key. Also, the table access method performs selection and ordering operations on the tables accessible through the table access method, implements and triggers invalidation routines upon data access events, in a recursive relationship with the virtual stack machine, and provides a common view of data stored across the heterogeneous data stores coupled through servers to the table access method. The ordered tables are subdividable by additional parameters associated with table names.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种程序开发和执行系统,由基于四部分规则组织的高级编程语言组成,包括规则定义、条件列表、满足相应条件时采取的操作列表,以及列表 异常处理程序。 高级语言被翻译成控制虚拟堆栈机的内部表示。 虚拟堆栈机执行规则和数据到当前规则的动态绑定。 数据访问事件是通过表访问方法提供的,该方法为耦合到系统的各种数据源提供了接口。 这些数据源包括屏幕、导入/导出机制、外部数据库系统(如 IMS)和称为表数据存储的本地数据库系统。 表数据存储在面向对象的关系系统中组织数据,其中每个表都按主键排序。 此外,表访问方法对可通过表访问方法访问的表执行选择和排序操作,在数据访问事件时实现并触发无效例程,与虚拟堆栈机呈递归关系,并提供跨存储数据的通用视图 异构数据存储通过服务器耦合到表访问方法。 有序表可由与表名关联的附加参数细分。
法律状态/事件: 期限届满 | 权利转移

标题: 文書ブラウズ支援方法及びシステム
摘要:
【課題】文書作成者以外の人が作成した関連情報をコンピュータネットワーク上の閲覧対象の文書に付与できるような環境を実現する文書ブラウズ支援システムを提供する。
【解決手段】文書中の表現パタンとそれに対応する出力情報を得るための該出力情報に関連する関連情報を記述したデータを入力し、このデータ中の表現パタンを参照してコンピュータネットワーク上の文書中の表現パタンを検出し、入力されたデータ中の関連情報を基に、検出された表現パタンに対応する出力情報をコンピュータネットワーク上の文書から生成して出力する。
摘要(译)(简体中文):
一种文档浏览支持系统,用于实现一种环境,在该环境中,由文档创建者以外的人创建的相关信息可以添加到要在计算机网络上浏览的文档中。 
 为了获得文档中的表达模式并输出与其对应的信息,输入描述与输出信息相关的相关信息的数据,并参考数据中的表达模式来读取计算机网络上的文档。检测文档,根据输入数据中的相关信息,从计算机网络上的文档生成与检测到的表达模式对应的输出信息并输出。
发明人: 平川 秀樹 | 木村 和広
发明人地址: 神奈川県川崎市幸区小向東芝町1番地  株式会社東芝研究開発センター内

标题: 英文字型認識裝置
摘要:
本發明目的在提供一種對複合字形（Multi-font）可予以正確辨識之文字認識裝置。
本裝置之構成，首先，特徵抽出部經由文字的畫素來計算各種字形文字的特徵量。在學習階段，樣本群集部對各群集計算特徵量平均值與變異量。離散式決策樹生成部，以分類效益最佳的閥值來生成平衡性佳、重疊少的決策樹，並予以記憶之。該決策樹中各節點的資料包含特徵指標、閥值與離散式到達機率。在比對階段，可朔式決策樹追蹤部以欲辨識文字特徵量去掃視決策樹以檢出終端節點，從眾多候補群集中以識別法則得到比對結果。而對於精度差的結果，再以信心函數作回朔式追蹤，以獲得正確的比對結果。顯微鏡檢視部則是對於易混淆的文字，再作詳細檢查。
摘要(译)(简体中文):
本发明目的在提供一种对复合字形(Multi-font)可予以正确辨识之文字认识装置。 
 本装置之构成,首先,特征抽出部经由文字的画素来计算各种字形文字的特征量。 在学习阶段,样本群集部对各群集计算特征量平均值与变异量。 离散式决策树生成部,以分类效益最佳的阀值来生成平衡性佳、重叠少的决策树,并予以记忆之。 该决策树中各节点的资料包含特征指标、阀值与离散式到达机率。 在比对阶段,可朔式决策树追踪部以欲辨识文字特征量去扫视决策树以检出终端节点,从众多候补群集中以识别法则得到比对结果。 而对于精度差的结果,再以信心函数作回朔式追踪,以获得正确的比对结果。 显微镜检视部则是对于易混淆的文字,再作详细检查。
[标]当前申请(专利权)人: 松下电器产业株式会社
当前第一申请(专利权)人: 松下電器產業股份有限公司

标题: Method for optimizing matching network of semiconductor process apparatus
摘要: A method for optimizing matching network between an output impedance and an input impedance in a semiconductor process apparatus is disclosed. The method includes the steps of: providing a neural network capable of being trained through repeated learning; training the neural network from previously performed process conditions; setting up an initial value; comparing the initial value with a theoretically calculated value, to obtain error between the values; and repeating the training, setting, and comparing steps until the error becomes zero.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 公开了一种用于优化半导体工艺设备中的输出阻抗和输入阻抗之间的匹配网络的方法。 该方法包括以下步骤:提供可反复学习训练的神经网络; 从先前执行的过程条件训练神经网络; 设置初始值; 将初始值与理论计算值进行比较,得到数值之间的误差; 重复训练、设置和比较步骤,直到误差为零。
[标]当前申请(专利权)人: 爱思开海力士有限公司

标题: Message filtering techniques
摘要: Techniques for reducing the amount of junk e-mail received by a user of an e-mail system. A recipient description containing non-address information is added to an e-mail message. The user has an e-mail filter which has access to information which provides a model of the user. The e-mail filter uses the non-address information and the model information to determine whether the e-mail message should be provided to the user. The e-mail filter further has access to information which provides models of the user's correspondents. If the filter does not provide the message to the user, it uses the non-address information and the model information of the user's correspondents to determine who the message might be forwarded to. A sender of e-mail can also use the model information of the sender's correspondents together with the non-address information to determine who the message should be sent to. The techniques are used in a system for locating expertise.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 用于减少电子邮件系统用户收到的垃圾电子邮件数量的技术。 包含非地址信息的收件人描述被添加到电子邮件消息中。 用户有一个电子邮件过滤器,它可以访问提供用户模型的信息。 电子邮件过滤器使用非地址信息和型号信息来确定是否应将电子邮件消息提供给用户。 电子邮件过滤器还可以访问提供用户通信者模型的信息。 如果过滤器不向用户提供消息,它使用非地址信息和用户通讯员的型号信息来确定消息可能被转发给谁。 电子邮件的发件人还可以使用发件人的通讯人的型号信息和非地址信息来确定应该将邮件发送给谁。 这些技术用于定位专业知识的系统中。
发明人: CANALE, LEONARD M. | KAUTZ, HENRY A. | MILEWSKI, ALLEN E. | SELMAN, BART

标题: Method for measuring the fidelity of warped image layer approximations in a real-time graphics rendering pipeline
摘要: A layered graphics rendering pipeline measures image fidelity ("fiducials") to determine how accurately a transformed image layer approximates a rendering of a 3D object. The graphics rendering pipeline approximates the change in position or color of 3D object by transforming a rendering of the 3D object from a previous frame. The pipeline uses the fiducials to control rendering of factored scene elements to independent image layers. The pipeline then combines the layers to compute frames of animation. The types of fiducials include sampling, visibility, and photometric fiducials. The sampling fiducial measures the distortion of an image sample when warped to screen coordinates. The visibility fiducial measures the change in visibility of a scene element since a previous rendering of the scene element. The photometric fiducial measures either the change in lighting from the time of the previous rendering to the current time, or it measures the difference between warped color samples and actual color samples of the scene element for a current frame.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 分层图形渲染管道测量图像保真度(“基准”)以确定变换后的图像层与 3D 对象渲染的近似程度。 图形渲染管线通过从前一帧转换 3D 对象的渲染来近似 3D 对象的位置或颜色的变化。 管道使用基准来控制将分解的场景元素渲染到独立的图像层。 然后,管道将图层组合起来以计算动画帧。 基准的类型包括采样、可见性和光度基准。 采样基准测量图像样本在扭曲到屏幕坐标时的失真。 可见性基准测量场景元素自先前渲染场景元素以来的可见性变化。 光度基准测量从先前渲染时间到当前时间的照明变化,或者测量当前帧的场景元素的扭曲颜色样本和实际颜色样本之间的差异。

标题: データベース
摘要: PURPOSE: To perform flexible and high-speed data access by using a common structure for a table and sharing a sub routine among many data base routines. CONSTITUTION: A high level module group and a low level module group are provided and a data retrieval routine group is provided with a routine for directly accessing data by using a tuple identifier, the routine for accessing non-formatted data from an input area and an option for accessing a tuple in locked data tuples. A data updating routine group is provided with the option for omitting the updating of an index and the option for updating the data in a locked data table and the data table is provided with a column for storing the tuple identifier. Then an index hashing mechanism uses an index key value and performs high-speed and flexible searching. Thus, flexible searching and high-speed data access are made posibble.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 目的:通过使用表的通用结构并在许多数据库例程之间共享子例程来执行灵活和高速的数据访问。 组成:提供了一个高级模块组和一个低级模块组,并且为一个数据检索例程组提供了一个通过使用元组标识符直接访问数据的例程,用于从输入区域访问非格式化数据的例程和一个 用于访问锁定数据元组中的元组的选项。 数据更新例程组具有省略更新索引的选项和更新锁定数据表中的数据的选项,并且数据表具有用于存储元组标识符的列。 然后索引散列机制使用索引键值并执行高速灵活的搜索。 因此,灵活的搜索和高速数据访问成为可能。

标题: Finite state automaton text search apparatus having two-level memory structure
摘要: A finite state automaton (FSA) text search apparatus converts each of successively received binary code numbers, representing successive characters of a text to be searched, into two portions (C₁, C₂). Two portions (T, U) are extracted from a state number which is currently being obtained from a first table memory (106), with one portion being combined with one of the input character portions and the combination used to select one of a set of 1st displacement numbers from a second table memory (104), while a second portion of the current state number and the other portion of the input character number similarly select one of a set of 2nd displacement numbers from a third table memory (105), and the entire current state number selects one of a set of base numbers from a fourth table memory (103). The selected 1st and 2nd displacement numbers are combined with the selected base number, and the result used to select the next state number from the first table memory (106). The overall memory capacity required is thereby minimized, while achieving a high search speed.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 有限状态自动机(FSA)文本搜索设备将每个连续接收的二进制代码数字转换成两部分(C 1 ,C 2 ),这些二进制代码数字表示要搜索的文本的连续字符。 从当前正从第一表存储器(106)获得的状态编号中提取两个部分(T,U),其中一个部分与输入字符部分之一组合,并且该组合用于选择一组中的一个 来自第二表存储器(104)的第一位移编号,而当前状态编号的第二部分和输入字符编号的另一部分类似地从第三表存储器(105)中选择一组第二位移编号中的一个,并且 整个当前状态数从第四表存储器(103)中选择一组基数中的一个。 所选择的第一和第二位移数与所选择的基数组合,并且结果用于从第一表存储器(106)中选择下一个状态数。 因此,所需的总存储容量被最小化,同时实现了高搜索速度。

标题: Image reading apparatus
摘要: An improved image reading apparatus which is so arranged that, by providing marks shaded to a predetermined density or darkness for setting a required reading area on an image reading surface, the start mark and end mark are detected by a solid state image sensor for supplying image signals within the required reading range into memory unit based on results of the on detection so as to reduce the memory capacity of the memory unit.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种改进的图像读取装置,其设置为,通过在图像读取表面上设置所需的读取区域而设置阴影到预定浓度或暗度的标记,由用于提供图像的固态图像传感器检测开始标记和结束标记 根据开启检测的结果,将所需读取范围内的信号输入到存储单元中,以减少存储单元的存储容量。

标题: Mail sorting system with coding devices
摘要(译)(简体中文): 提供了一种邮件分拣系统，其包括多个邮件分拣机和编码设备。这些邮件分类器和编码设备由分发器选择性地耦合在一起，使得任何编码设备可以耦合到任何邮件分类器。当邮件分类器不能识别特定邮件的邮政编码时，未识别的地址图像被传送到编码设备之一，以便操作员可以输入正确的地址。分配控制器连接到分配器，用于根据邮件分类器和编码设备的当前邮件处理能力确定哪个编码设备应该接收未识别的地址图像，以便最大化邮件分拣系统的邮件处理能力。

标题: Transcoding audio data by a proxy computer on behalf of a client computer
摘要: A proxy server transcodes audio data on behalf of a client computer prior to transmitting the audio data to the client computer. In response to a request from the client computer, the proxy server obtains the audio data from a remote server. If the proxy server determines that transcoding is appropriate, the proxy server transcodes the audio data and transmits the transcoded audio data to the client computer. Transcoding can include changing the type of the audio file, compressing the audio data, reducing the number of audio channels, or reducing the data sampling rate. The proxy server determines the extent and type of transcoding based on file formats that the client computer can process, the size of the requested audio file, the memory capacity of the client computer, the bandwidth of the connection between the proxy server and the client computer, and the desired level of audio quality.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 在将音频数据传输到客户端计算机之前,代理服务器代表客户端计算机对音频数据进行转码。 响应来自客户端计算机的请求,代理服务器从远程服务器获取音频数据。 如果代理服务器确定转码是合适的,则代理服务器对音频数据进行转码并将转码后的音频数据传输到客户端计算机。 转码可以包括更改音频文件的类型、压缩音频数据、减少音频通道的数量或降低数据采样率。 代理服务器根据客户端计算机可以处理的文件格式、请求的音频文件的大小、客户端计算机的内存容量、代理服务器和客户端计算机之间的连接带宽来确定转码的范围和类型 ,以及所需的音频质量水平。
发明人: KRUEGER, MARK H. | LOGUE, JAY D.

标题: 適応辞書装置及び適応辞書方法
摘要:
【課題】 情報記憶媒体又は情報通信網から所定の情報を用いて使用者が必要か不要かを判定するために有効なキーワードが優先的に登録される適応辞書装置を提供することを目的とする。
【解決手段】 情報は情報データと一つ以上のキーワード(文字列)を含むものであり、前記情報データを提示する情報提示手段と、前記提示された情報データが必要か不要かを入力する入力手段と、前記入力手段からの入力を用いて前記提示された情報データにつけられたキーワードへのユーザの必要性を予測する値の割り振りを行う学習手段と、前記予測値を用いて有効なキーワードを優先的に登録する辞書更新手段とを備えたことを特徴とするもので、ユーザーの必要とする情報を取り出すために有効な辞書が適応的に構成される。
摘要(译)(简体中文):
本发明的一个目的是提供一种自适应词典设备,其中优先注册有效关键字以便用户通过使用来自信息存储介质或信息通信网络的预定信息来确定关键字是否是必要的。 
 解决方案:信息包括信息数据和一个或多个关键字(字符串),以及用于呈现信息数据的信息呈现装置和用于输入所呈现的信息数据是否必要的输入。用于分配预测用户需求的值的学习装置使用来自输入装置的输入分配给所呈现的信息数据的关键字;以及使用预测值的有效关键字选择。字典更新装置用于优先注册,并且有效字典被自适应地配置为检索用户所需的信息。

标题: Continuous two dimensional monitoring of thin webs of textile materials
摘要: An apparatus monitors a web of textile material which is also processed by a textile processing machine. The web is in motion relative to an imaging unit, and the imaging unit repetitively scans at least one strip across the web in a direction substantially perpendicular to the direction of relative motion of the web. A computer receives signals from the imaging unit and produces digital data corresponding thereto. The computer further analyzes the digital data to find entities of interest in the web and determines parameters of the found entities of interest. Preferably, the imaging unit and computer include distinguishing means for producing a plurality of optical images of the same portion of the web where each of the optical images are distinguished one from the others by the spectral content. In addition, the imaging unit and computer produce a plurality of time separated images, where each of the time separated images are produced during different lighting conditions on the web. In one embodiment, one image is produced while the front side of the web is illuminated, and another image is produced on the same portion of the web while the rear side of the web is illuminated.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种设备监控同样由纺织加工机器处理的纺织材料网。 卷筒纸相对于成像单元运动,并且成像单元在基本上垂直于卷筒纸相对运动方向的方向上重复扫描穿过卷筒纸的至少一个条带。 计算机从成像单元接收信号并产生与其对应的数字数据。 计算机进一步分析数字数据以在网络中找到感兴趣的实体并确定找到的感兴趣实体的参数。 优选地,成像单元和计算机包括用于产生卷材的相同部分的多个光学图像的区分装置,其中每个光学图像通过光谱内容与其他光学图像区分开来。 此外,成像单元和计算机产生多个时间分离的图像,其中每个时间分离的图像是在网上的不同照明条件期间产生的。 在一个实施例中,当幅材的正面被照亮时产生一个图像,并且在幅材的背面被照亮时在幅材的相同部分上产生另一个图像。

标题: Method and apparatus for reversible color conversion
摘要: A method and apparatus for performing color conversion on image data provided as a plurality of vectors representing a datum of the image. The present invention provides a forward transform that performs reversible color conversion on the plurality of vectors, such that the transform is reversible in integer arithmetic with predictable precision.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种用于对作为表示图像数据的多个矢量提供的图像数据执行颜色转换的方法和设备。 本发明提供了一种对多个向量执行可逆颜色转换的正向变换,使得该变换在具有可预测精度的整数运算中是可逆的。
