标题: Automatic interlingual translation system
摘要: Automatic interlingual translation system which comprises analysis of the sentences of a source-language text in order to impart to them the corresponding morphological, syntactical and semantic characteristics, carrying out a first transfer of the analysed text to an intermediate language, integrating, by means of a universal motor of conversion of the language, the previously transferred sentences in order to express them in an interlingua possessing all the morphological, syntactical and semantic features of the languages to be translated, carrying out a second transfer of the source-language sentences to sentences in a second intermediate language already possessing all the structural characteristics of the target language, converting the sentences of the target language in an interlingua into sentences in a target language with its specific vocabulary and, in order to conclude the translation, extracting the structural analyses of the sentences in the target language. The invention is applicable to the automatic translation of texts, to database management and to voice recognition.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 自动语际翻译系统,包括分析源语言文本的句子,以赋予它们相应的形态、句法和语义特征,将分析的文本首次转移到中间语言,通过集成 语言转换的通用动力,先前转移的句子为了在具有待翻译语言的所有形态、句法和语义特征的国际语中表达它们,执行源语言句子到句子的二次转移 在已经具备目标语言所有结构特征的第二中间语言中,将目标语言中的句子转换成具有特定词汇的目标语言句子,并提取翻译的结构分析 目标语言的句子。 本发明适用于文本的自动翻译、数据库管理和语音识别。
[标]当前申请(专利权)人: URIBE ECHEBARRIA DIAZ DE MENDIBIL GREGORIO

标题: 情報記憶装置および情報記憶方法
摘要: PURPOSE:To unnecessitate a work to input an identification code for a retrieval with a keyboard, etc., by generating and storing an image identification code or index image identification code necessary for retrieving storage information with an identification code generating means. CONSTITUTION:By a directory 3 to store retrieval information and an FAT (File Allocation Table) 4 to manage the arrangement of the information to a storage medium, the retrieval of an image information file group 5 is executed. Consequently, the image identification code or index image identification code necessary for the retrieval of the storage information is generated and stored with the identification code generating means. Thus, a trouble to input the identification code for the retrieval by the keyboard, etc., can be eliminated, and the storage action of the information can be easily and speedily executed.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 目的:通过使用识别码生成装置生成和存储检索存储信息所需的图像识别码或索引图像识别码,无需使用键盘等输入识别码进行检索。 组成:通过目录3来存储检索信息和FAT(文件分配表)4来管理信息到存储介质的排列,执行图像信息文件组5的检索。 因此,由识别码生成装置生成并存储检索存储信息所需的图像识别码或索引图像识别码。 因此,可以消除输入识别码以通过键盘等进行检索的麻烦,并且可以容易且快速地执行信息的存储动作。

标题: VERFAHREN ZUR ANNULLIERUNG EINER UNGÜLTIGEN AUSWAHL IN INTERAKTIVEN KONFIGURATIONSSYSTEMEN
摘要: An interactive computer configuration system is an aid for a sales person or a customer to make it easy to grasp and configure a huge configuration problem. The user interacts with the computer system and makes many choices successively, and a configuration engine checks each choice for validity. The configuration engine comprises a configuration model defining mutual predefined relations between the selectable elements and comprises programs for validating a set of choices against said configuration model. The invention relates to the situation where a requested choice made by the user corresponds to an invalid configuration instance. According to the invention, the user is allowed to insist on this choice and an alternative investigation system according to the invention will present to the user a number of relevant proposals for undoing choices made previously so that a valid configuration instance can be obtained. According to the invention only relevant proposals are presented to the user and further in the most expedient way, seen from a customer's point of view. According to the invention the lowest possible number of choices to be undone is first presented to the user. Yet, a further aspect of the invention allows the user, during the alternative investigation process, to make previous choices cardinal choices, whereby the relevance of the proposals for obtaining alternatives will be further enhanced.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 交互式计算机配置系统是销售人员或客户轻松掌握和配置巨大配置问题的辅助工具。 用户与计算机系统交互并连续做出许多选择,配置引擎检查每个选择的有效性。 配置引擎包括定义可选元素之间的相互预定义关系的配置模型,并且包括用于针对所述配置模型验证一组选择的程序。 本发明涉及用户做出的请求选择对应于无效配置实例的情况。 根据本发明,允许用户坚持该选择,并且根据本发明的替代调查系统将向用户呈现用于撤消先前做出的选择的多个相关建议,以便可以获得有效的配置实例。 根据本发明,仅从客户的角度来看,以最便利的方式向用户呈现相关建议。 根据本发明,首先向用户呈现要撤消的最低可能数量的选择。 然而,本发明的另一方面允许用户在替代调查过程期间做出先前选择的主要选择,由此将进一步增强用于获得替代方案的建议的相关性。

标题: Apparatus and method for rejecting out-of-class inputs for pattern classification
摘要: Method and apparatus rejecting out-of-class inputs for pattern classification including a list of patterns with at least one in-context pattern and a rank tolerance. An input pattern is used to generate a classifier score for each pattern in the list and the classifier scores are ranked in decreasing order. The highest ranking score for an in-context pattern is determined and if the highest ranking score is 1 the in-context pattern is selected. If the highest ranking score is not 1 it is compared to the rank tolerance. When the highest ranking score is less than the rank tolerance the in-context pattern is selected and when the highest ranking score is greater than the rank tolerance the in-context pattern is rejected. Cohorts of the highest ranking pattern are removed from the list prior to the comparison.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 拒绝用于模式分类的类别外输入的方法和设备,包括具有至少一个上下文模式和等级容差的模式列表。 输入模式用于为列表中的每个模式生成分类器分数,并且分类器分数按降序排列。 确定上下文模式的最高排名分数,如果最高排名分数为 1,则选择上下文模式。 如果最高排名分数不是 1,则将其与排名容差进行比较。 当最高排名分数小于排名容差时,选择上下文模式,当最高排名分数大于排名容差时,拒绝上下文模式。 在比较之前从列表中删除排名最高的群组。

标题: Associative pattern conversion system and adaption method thereof
摘要: An associative pattern conversion system is disclosed which may be used for image recognition. The system includes an image input portion, an image processing portion and a recognition portion. The image processing portion includes a process unit for extracting characteristics and a frame memory for holding image data. The recognition portion, which includes a component for the learning of data to be associated, obtains the extracted characteristics from the image processing portion and performs associative pattern conversion from the image input portion. The system of the present invention may be applied to any neural network, preferably a matrix calculation type neural network.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 公开了一种可用于图像识别的关联模式转换系统。 该系统包括图像输入部分、图像处理部分和识别部分。 图像处理部分包括用于提取特征的处理单元和用于保存图像数据的帧存储器。 识别部分包括用于学习要关联的数据的组件,从图像处理部分获得提取的特征并从图像输入部分执行关联模式转换。 本发明的系统可以应用于任何神经网络,优选矩阵计算型神经网络。

标题: Map determination method and apparatus
摘要: A map determination method and apparatus for calculating the coefficients to give a minimum evaluation function quickly and reliably where a map is expressed as the linear sum of a function gi(X) and a coefficient ci while a map for transforming a N-dimensional vector (x0, x1, x2, x3) to a M-dimensional vector y is being decided. The coefficient ci for the map is obtained by giving a learning sample and a teaching sample, obtaining an evaluation function and solving a simultaneous linear equation for which the partial differential is zero.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种用于快速可靠地计算系数以给出最小评估函数的映射确定方法和设备,其中映射表示为函数 gi(X) 和系数 ci 的线性和,而映射用于变换 N 维向量 (  x0, x1, x2, x3) 到一个 M 维向量 y 正在被决定。 地图的系数 ci 是通过给定一个学习样本和一个教学样本,获得一个评价函数并求解一个偏微分为零的联立线性方程组得到的。
发明人: WATARI, MASAO | ISHII, KAZUO | KATO, YASUHIKO | OGAWA, HIROAKI | OMOTE, MASANORI | WATANABE, KAZUO | MINAMINO, KATSUKI

标题: 利用行動電話呼叫用戶指定資訊的方法
摘要:
本發明描述一種利用行動電話呼叫資訊的方法。
行動電話的SMS訊息被用來呼叫在時間和位置上並未和行動電話連接的資訊。為了指定想要資訊並定義一些簡短命令，行動電話用戶會使用具有連接到資訊提供者(information provider)之資訊線路，例如:網際網路(Internet)連接的資料處理設備，藉由該設備，他就能夠利用資訊提供者存放查詢簡要表(query profiles)。此外，可以使用一種語音電腦(speech computer)加以製作查詢簡要表。用戶能夠藉由一些簡短命令來呼叫諸多暫停的查詢簡要表，進而得到所需資訊。藉由行動電話，將以看得見或聽得到的方式複製想要資訊。因此，兩種通信媒介(media)的優點會以一種理想的方式彼此結合，其中行動電話的硬體及/或它的操作方法則保持不變。
摘要(译)(简体中文):
本发明描述一种利用行动电话呼叫资讯的方法。 
 行动电话的SMS讯息被用来呼叫在时间和位置上并未和行动电话连接的资讯。 为了指定想要资讯并定义一些简短命令,行动电话用户会使用具有连接到资讯提供者(information provider)之资讯线路,例如:网际网路(Internet)连接的资料处理设备,藉由该设备,他 就能够利用资讯提供者存放查询简要表(query profiles)。 此外,可以使用一种语音电脑(speech computer)加以制作查询简要表。 用户能够藉由一些简短命令来呼叫诸多暂停的查询简要表,进而得到所需资讯。 藉由行动电话,将以看得见或听得到的方式复制想要资讯。 因此,两种通信媒介(media)的优点会以一种理想的方式彼此结合,其中行动电话的硬体及/或它的操作方法则保持不变。
发明人: 史蒂芬阿克波洛 | 傑瑞得阿若 | 麥可伊曼翠特 | 傑格曼特納其

标题: Verfahren zur Erkennung einer Benutzungsberechtigung für ein Fahrzeug
摘要: Die Erfindung betrifft ein Verfahren zur Erkennung einer Benutzungsberechtigung für ein Fahrzeug mit einer optoelektronischen Bildverarbeitungseinrichtung (1) zur Identifizierung eines Fahrzeugbenutzers.$A Erfindungsgemäß werden in Abhängigkeit eines Ausgangssignals (A) der Bildverarbeitungseinrichtung (1) Sperrfunktionen (10) zur Inbetriebnahme des Kraftfahrzeuges gesteuert, wodurch nur autorisierten Personen die Benutzung des Fahrzeuges ermöglicht wird und auch ein Entwenden des Fahrzeuges auch nach einem kurzen Halt, beispielsweise an einer Ampel nicht möglich ist.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 用于识别车辆使用授权的程序具有用于识别用户的光电图像处理器。 根据来自处理器的至少一个识别信号,锁定功能被释放以允许车辆操作。 为了生成该信号,将潜在用户的至少一个特征(例如他的头部)与已存储的至少一个参考特征进行比较。 在输入包含车辆数据的识别码之后存储参考特征。 潜在用户的图像是使用 CCD 相机拍摄的,该相机使用增加识别可靠性的光源,例如 一种在近红外波长。

标题: Document processing using heading rules storage and retrieval system for generating documents with hierarchical logical architectures
摘要: A document generating system which includes an input device for inputting document data, a heading candidate extraction section for extracting, as a heading candidate, the word corresponding to the heading stored in a heading dictionary from the document data input at the input section. A heading decision section is implemented in the system for checking the heading candiate, that was extracted by the heading candidate extraction section according to a heading rule stored in a heading rule dictionary and for deciding whether the heading candidate is a heading. Also, a document architecture decision section is implemented in the system for checking the heading decided by the heading decision section according to document architecture rules stored in a document architecture rule dictionary. The architecture decision section is for determining the heading as satisfying the document architecture rule as a true heading, and the heading not satisfying the document architecture rule as being false heading.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种文档生成系统,包括用于输入文档数据的输入装置、用于从在输入部分输入的文档数据中提取与存储在标题词典中的标题相对应的词作为标题候选的标题候选提取部分。 在系统中实现了一个航向判断部分,用于检查由航向候选提取部分根据存储在航向规则字典中的航向规则提取的航向候选,并用于确定航向候选是否是航向。 此外,在系统中实现了文档架构决策部分,用于根据存储在文档架构规则字典中的文档架构规则检查由标题决策部分决定的标题。 架构决策部分用于将满足文档架构规则的标题确定为真标题,将不满足文档架构规则的标题确定为假标题。

标题: Relationelles Datenbanksystem HINTERGRUND DER ERFINDUNG1. Gebiet der Erfindung
摘要(译)(简体中文): 在关系数据库系统中使用的装置，用于维持一个基表（101）的行中的用户定义字段与另一个基表（101）中的一组行的状态之间的依赖性。有三种依赖字段：计数字段（107），其包含集合中的行的计数，和字段（105），其是集合的行中的字段的总和，以及基本副本向下字段（113），它是该组的行中的字段，其包含一个基表的行中的字段中的值的副本。两个基表构成引用引用对，并且来自一个表的行具有主键（103），其用作另一个基表的行集中的外键（111）。该装置由数据字典中的组件（313,306）组成，其定义用户定义的从属字段和依赖性的性质，包括其上的任何条件，以及数据库系统的运行时系统中用于维护的依赖性和组件（319）。依赖。每次更改引用基表中的行的状态时，运行时系统使用数据字典来确定是否存在用户定义的从属字段，如果存在，则确定是哪种依赖字段。然后，运行时系统中的代码重新建立变更行所需的依赖关系。
法律状态/事件: 未缴年费 | 权利转移

标题: 足具系統
摘要: 一種足具系統，它係藉著降低足部在一般狀況下所收到的衝擊與剪力，而讓穿鞋者足部得到更佳的保護性及舒適感。該足具系統包括一編織襪及一鞋部。該編織襪疊合在該鞋部上，同時與該鞋部接觸，並包括有一腳球部份，一腳踵部份，以及界於該腳球部份與該腳踵部份間之蹠弓部份。該腳球部份與該腳踵部份皆係由較厚的編織物所構成，其厚度較該蹠弓部份為厚，因此，穿鞋者足部的腳球部份與腳踵部份便得到較該蹠弓更多的保護及避震效果。該鞋部包括一具有腳球部份，腳踵部份及一升高之蹠弓部份之鞋底，以分別地與該襪子之各個部份重疊接觸。當該襪子穿在穿鞋者之足部，同時穿上鞋子時，該鞋底之上升之蹠弓部份，可與該襪子之較薄蹠弓編織部在縱長方向上完全貼合，進而提供了足部與鞋子的完全密合之界面關係，以提供穿鞋者更大的保護及舒適。
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种足具系统,它系借着降低足部在一般状况下所收到的冲击与剪力,而让穿鞋者足部得到更佳的保护性及舒适感。 该足具系统包括一编织袜及一鞋部。 该编织袜叠合在该鞋部上,同时与该鞋部接触,并包括有一脚球部份,一脚踵部份,以及界于该脚球部份与该脚踵部份间之跖弓 部份。 该脚球部份与该脚踵部份皆系由较厚的编织物所构成,其厚度较该跖弓部份为厚,因此,穿鞋者足部的脚球部份与脚踵部份 便得到较该跖弓更多的保护及避震效果。 该鞋部包括一具有脚球部份,脚踵部份及一升高之跖弓部份之鞋底,以分别地与该袜子之各个部份重叠接触。 当该袜子穿在穿鞋者之足部,同时穿上鞋子时,该鞋底之上升之跖弓部份,可与该袜子之较薄跖弓编织部在纵长方向上完全贴合,进而提供 了足部与鞋子的完全密合之界面关系,以提供穿鞋者更大的保护及舒适。
发明人: 里昂.E.凱利 | 詹姆士.G.麥克里蘭德 | 詹姆士.L.索尼伯格 | 道格拉斯.H.瑞曲 | 維克多.J.高倫史丹

标题: System for changing common card mode data in a card image data processing system
摘要: A system for changing common card mode data a plurality of card images including: a memory area for old card mode data; a memory area for old card data; a memory area for card mode data; a memory area for card data; and a memory area for the field correspondence between the old and card mode data. In accordance with the content of the corresponding memory area, all or part of the old card data is transmitted from the old card data memory area to the card data memory area.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种用于改变多个卡片图像的普通卡片模式数据的系统,包括:用于旧卡片模式数据的存储区; 旧卡数据的存储区; 卡模式数据的存储区; 卡数据的存储区; 以及用于旧模式数据与卡模式数据的字段对应的存储区。 根据对应存储区的内容,将旧卡数据的全部或部分从旧卡数据存储区传送到卡数据存储区。
当前第一申请(专利权)人: FUJITSU LIMITED, A CORP. OF JAPAN

标题: 連想検索装置および方法
摘要:
【課題】 連想記憶メモリ等で検索キーにより記憶データのアドレスを検索するとき、所望の優先順位を簡単に指定できるようにする。
【解決手段】 検索キーの入力を受け付けてアドレスを全部の範囲から検索するとき、同時にアドレスの入力も受け付ける。入力されたアドレスを開始位置として範囲を制限し、この範囲のアドレスを検索されたアドレスから抽出する。このように検索されてから抽出されたアドレスを結果として出力するが、抽出されるアドレスが存在しない場合には、全部の範囲から検索されたアドレスを結果として出力する。従って、アドレスの入力により検索範囲に優先順位を設定することができ、ユーザが所望するアドレスを迅速に検索することができる。
摘要(译)(简体中文):
[问题] 当使用内容可寻址存储器等中的搜索关键字搜索存储数据的地址时,容易地指定期望的优先级。 
 SOLUTION: 当一个搜索关键字的输入被接受并从整个范围内搜索一个地址时,地址的输入也同时被接受。 范围以输入地址为起始位置进行限制,从检索到的地址中提取该范围内的地址。 搜索后提取的地址作为结果输出,但如果没有要提取的地址,则从整个范围内搜索到的地址作为结果输出。 因此,可以通过输入地址来设置搜索范围内的优先级,快速搜索到用户想要的地址。
发明人地址: 東京都港区芝五丁目7番1号  日本電気株式会社内

标题: Feature extracting method
摘要: A feature extracting method converts an image data of an input line drawing into a graph representation and recognizes the input line drawing by use of the graph representation. The feature extracting method comprises a first step of equally dividing the image data of the input line drawing into meshes, a second step of obtaining a cell by integrating one or more meshes, and a third step of recognizing a cell pattern for each of cells which are obtained so as to form a graph in correspondence with each of the cells.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 特征提取方法将输入线条图的图像数据转换为图形表示,并通过使用图形表示来识别输入线条图。 特征提取方法包括:第一步,将输入的线图图像数据等分为网格;第二步,通过整合一个或多个网格获得一个单元;第三步,识别每个单元的单元图案 获得,以便形成对应于每个单元格的图形。
当前第一申请(专利权)人: RICOH COMPANY, LTD., NO. 3-6, 1-CHOME, NAKAMAGOME, OTA-KU, TOKYO, 143 JAPAN A JAPANESE CORP.

标题: Fremgangsmåte for å representere i signalform et bilde bestående av bildeelementer, samt fremgangsmåte og anordning for å sammenligne et sekundært bilde med et hovedbilde
摘要: Fremgangsmåte for å inspisere et bildeelement for tolererbare variasjon fra et tilsvarende utvalgt bildeelement i et originalbilde, omfatter å etablere et dataord i hvilke bits'ene hver indikerer hvorvidt samtlige originalbilde-bildeelementér i nærheten av det valgte bildeelementet alle har verdier (dvs. lyshetsverdier) innenfor et respektivt område. Et dataord som representerer verdien av det inspiserte bildeelementet sammenlignes samtidig med områdene av verdier som er knyttet til nevnte bits i dataordet, hvilket tilveiebringer styring for sammenligningene. 22.06.84, Storbritannia, nr 8415996.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种检查像素与主图像中相应选定像素的可容忍变化的方法,包括建立数据字,该数据字的每个位指示选定像素的邻域中的所有主图像像素是否都具有值(即,亮度) 值)在各自的范围内。 表示所检查像素的值的数据同时与与数据字的位相关联的值的范围进行比较,这为比较提供了门控。
当前第一申请(专利权)人: THE GOVERNOR AND COMPANY OF THE BANK OF ENGLAND

标题: Method of processing image formation
摘要: A method of processing image information is disclosed, for detecting the movement of an object with a simplifed system structure, and high speed treatment. The method is comprised of the steps of entry of a stereoscopic image of an object, extraction of edges of the object, and dividing it into segments based on the local feature of the image. On each segment, tracing points (sampling points) are selected, the inter-frame correlation of selected points is obtained, the three-dimensional coordinates of the points are measured, and thus the position and attitude of the object are detected, wherein the inter-frame correlation is performed by evaluating the similarity between frames based on correlation between the tangential direction of tracing points and the luminance value of the surface.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 公开了一种处理图像信息的方法,以简化的系统结构和高速处理来检测物体的运动。 该方法包括输入物体的立体图像、提取物体的边缘以及基于图像的局部特征将其分割的步骤。 在每一段上,选择跟踪点(采样点),获取所选点的帧间相关性,测量点的三维坐标,从而检测物体的位置和姿态,其中帧间 - 帧相关是通过基于跟踪点的切线方向与表面亮度值之间的相关性来评估帧之间的相似性来执行的。
[标]当前申请(专利权)人: HIRAISHI JIRO PRESIDENT OF INDGIJUTSUIN | 斯坦雷电气株式会社
发明人: SUMI, YASUSHI | TOMITA, FUMIAKI | ISHIYAMA, YUTAKA

标题: Compression/ decompression algorithm for image documents having text graphical and color content
摘要: A computer program product for compressing data files representative of an image document. The document includes color information and/or graphical information. The product is on a computer readable medium and includes instructions for causing a computer to provide a first image file at a first resolution and a second image file at a second resolution of said document with said second resolution being lower than said first resolution. The product causes a computer to process the first image file to convert the first image file into a text file representation of the document and compress the text file representation of the document to provide a first compressed file. The computer processes the second file to extract information corresponding to color information and graphics information. It compresses the second file using a second, different compression technique to provide a second compressed file corresponding to the image and the color information from the low resolution image file. The product causes a computer to store said first and second compressed files to provide a composite file corresponding to the compressed file of the document.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种用于压缩代表图像文档的数据文件的计算机程序产品。 该文档包括颜色信息和/或图形信息。 该产品在计算机可读介质上并且包括用于使计算机以所述文档的第一分辨率提供第一图像文件和以第二分辨率提供第二图像文件的指令,其中所述第二分辨率低于所述第一分辨率。 该产品使计算机处理第一图像文件以将第一图像文件转换为文档的文本文件表示并压缩文档的文本文件表示以提供第一压缩文件。 计算机处理第二文件以提取对应于颜色信息和图形信息的信息。 它使用第二种不同的压缩技术压缩第二个文件,以提供与图像和来自低分辨率图像文件的颜色信息相对应的第二个压缩文件。 该产品使计算机存储所述第一和第二压缩文件以提供对应于文档的压缩文件的复合文件。
发明人: KURZWEIL, RAYMOND C. | MACKENZIE, KENNETH M. | DIONNE, MARK S.
法律状态/事件: 期限届满 | 质押 | 权利转移

标题: Method and device for concurrency control of shared data updates and queries
摘要: Method for shared data update and query operations wherein two control fields are associated with each data block of interest. Before any data in shared memory is modified, a value different from the present value is written into one of the shared memory control fields. The shared memory data is then updated. Thereafter, the other shared memory control field is updated to the new value, thus making the values of the shared memory control fields identical once again. During query operations, the data and control fields of interest are copied into private storage. The values of the control fields in private memory are compared. If the values are equal, the data in private storage is considered to be consistent. Otherwise, the data is considered to be in the process of being updated and the data is ignored until the values of the shared memory control fields become equal.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 用于共享数据更新和查询操作的方法,其中两个控制字段与每个感兴趣的数据块相关联。 在修改共享内存中的任何数据之前,将不同于当前值的值写入共享内存控制字段之一。 然后更新共享内存数据。 此后,另一个共享内存控制字段被更新为新值,从而使共享内存控制字段的值再次相同。 在查询操作期间,感兴趣的数据和控制字段被复制到私有存储中。 比较私有内存中控制字段的值。 如果值相等,则认为私有存储中的数据是一致的。 否则,数据被认为处于更新过程中,数据被忽略,直到共享内存控制字段的值相等。
发明人: ARNOLD, MICHAEL EDWARD | BATE, GRAHAM PAUL
发明人地址: 126 Sylvan School Road,Snow Camp, NC 27349,US | 12176 Hidden Brook Terrace,Gaithersburg, MD 20878,US

标题: Spectral subtraction noise suppression method
摘要: A spectral subtraction noise suppression method in a frame based digital communication system is described. Each frame includes a predetermined number N of audio samples, thereby giving each frame N degrees of freedom. The method is performed by a spectral subtraction (150) function H( omega ) which is based on an estimate (140) PHI v( omega ) of the power spectral density of background noise of non-speech frames and an estimate (130) PHI x( omega ) of the power spectral density of speech frames. Each speech frame is approximated (120) by a parametric model that reduces the number of degrees of freedom to less than N. The estimate PHI x( omega ) of the power spectral density of each speech frame is estimated (130) from the approximative parametric model.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 描述了一种基于帧的数字通信系统中的频谱减法噪声抑制方法。 每个帧包括预定数量N个音频样本,从而给每个帧N个自由度。 该方法由基于非语音帧的背景噪声的功率谱密度的估计(140)PHI v(omega)和估计(130)PHI的谱减法(150)函数H(omega)来执行 x( omega ) 是语音帧的功率谱密度。 每个语音帧由将自由度的数量减少到小于 N 的参数模型近似 (120)。从近似参数估计 (130) 每个语音帧的功率谱密度的估计 PHI x( omega ) 模型。

标题: Gerät zum Erfassen von Kennmarken auf einem Informationsträger
Needle transfer device
摘要: A needle sorting device includes an infeed device which first singulates a bulk supply of surgical needles into single file with an intermittently driven vibratory feed bowl assembly, and then individually separates and deposits the needles on a first conveyor for transmission to a processing station with a linear slide discharge mechanism. The first conveyor is translucent and during transit, one or more cameras obtain an image of the individual deposited needles. The image is digitized and the digital signals are transmitted to a control system computer which evaluates the position and orientation for needles and processes the information to obtain data for communication to one or more robot assemblies having grippers. Utilizing the position and orientation data, the robot assembly grippers removes selected needles from the first conveyor and transfers each needle to an engagement device located upon a second precision conveyor. This second precision conveyor is provided with additional devices to further orient the needle transferred thereto. A moveable hard stop is provided at the end of the precision conveyor to provide precise positioning of the needle to an accuracy of 0.001 inch at needle hand-off. Each oriented and precisely positioned needle is conveyed by the second conveyor to an automatic swaging station where sutures are automatically attached.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 针头分拣装置包括进料装置,该进料装置首先将大量供应的外科针头与间歇驱动的振动进料碗组件分离成单个文件,然后将针头单独分离并放置在第一输送机上,以便通过线性输送机传输到处理站。 滑动卸料机构。 第一个传送带是半透明的,在运输过程中,一个或多个摄像头获取单个放置的针的图像。 图像被数字化,并且数字信号被传输到控制系统计算机,该计算机评估针的位置和方向并处理信息以获得用于与一个或多个具有夹具的机器人组件通信的数据。 利用位置和方向数据,机器人组件夹具从第一传送带上移除选定的针,并将每根针传送到位于第二个精密传送带上的接合装置。 该第二精密传送器设有附加装置以进一步定向传送到其上的针。 在精密传送带的末端提供了一个可移动的硬止动装置,以在针切换时提供针的精确定位,精度为 0.001 英寸。 每个定向和精确定位的针由第二个传送带传送到自动型锻站,在那里缝线自动连接。

标题: System and method for selectivety defining access to application features
摘要: A method and system are described for defining a user's access to one or more features of an application. One or more "attributes" are assigned to users of a computer system and stored in a data table. Each attribute has a name which designates the feature to which access is being defined, (e.g, the ability to access data within the database), and a value defining the limits of access. Attributes may be assigned in groups to eliminate the burden of preparing attribute assignments one by one for each user. When an application is run, the attributes are retrieved and enforced such that the user's access to the features of the application is defined in accordance with the retrieved attributes.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 描述了一种用于定义用户对应用程序的一个或多个特征的访问的方法和系统。 一个或多个“属性”被分配给计算机系统的用户并存储在数据表中。 每个属性都有一个名称,用于指定要定义访问的功能(例如,访问数据库中数据的能力),以及一个定义访问限制的值。 可以分组分配属性,以消除为每个用户一一准备属性分配的负担。 当应用程序运行时,属性被检索并强制执行,以便根据检索到的属性定义用户对应用程序特征的访问。

发明人: GERSHFIELD, JAMES N. | BARGER, SHAWN G.
法律状态/事件: 期限届满 | 权利转移

标题: Voice recognition system
摘要: A voice recognition system for selecting word templates necessary for voice recognition from among a plurality of word templates. The system includes an input phoneme extraction unit for extracting distinctive phonemes which can be clearly recognized from an input pattern of the voice, and all phonemes possibly existing in the input pattern, and a dictionary phoneme extraction unit for extracting the distinctive phonemes which can be clearly recognized and can be previously determined at each word template, and all phonemes possibly existing at each word template. A pre-selector selects valid word templates for performing voice recognition based on phoneme information extracted by the input phoneme extraction unit and the dictionary phoneme extraction unit.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种语音识别系统,用于从多个单词模板中选择语音识别所需的单词模板。 该系统包括一个输入音素提取单元,用于从语音的输入模式中提取可以清楚识别的独特音素,以及输入模式中可能存在的所有音素,以及一个字典音素提取单元,用于提取可以清楚地识别的独特音素。 识别并且可以在每个单词模板处预先确定,以及所有可能存在于每个单词模板处的音素。 预选器根据输入音素提取单元和词典音素提取单元提取的音素信息,选择用于进行语音识别的有效词模板。

标题: ICの傾き検査方法
摘要:
【目的】 ICの位置決めのための傾き検査を2値画像に基づかずとも、高速かつ高精度に実行し得るICの傾き検査方法を提供することを目的とする。
【構成】 ICピン先端を含む検査領域を設定し、各々の検査領域の濃度投影図から各々のICピンの両端と先端を検出し、この先端に沿った直線上で各検査領域を代表する点を求め、対辺に位置する検査領域を代表する点の座標差に基づきICの中心及び傾きを求める。
摘要(译)(简体中文):
本发明的目的是提供一种IC倾斜检查方法,其能够在不使用二值图像的情况下高速且高精度地执行用于IC定位的倾斜检查。 
 [构造] 设置包括IC管脚尖端的检查区域,从每个检查区域的密度投影图中检测每个IC管脚的两端和尖端,并检测沿该尖端的直线上代表每个检查区域的点.得到,根据位于相对侧的代表检查区域的点之间的坐标差,得到IC的中心和倾角。

标题: Method and apparatus for structured document difference string extraction
摘要: A document difference extraction method and apparatus which is used for extracting the difference between structured documents properly meeting the sense of a document editor taking the logical meaning and structure of the structured documents into consideration. Structured documents are edited and stored in a memory unit by a document editing program. With reference to a comparison criterion set for the logical structure of each structured document before and after edition, the logical structure of the structural documents before and after edition read from the memory unit is analyzed by a structured document parsing program, and the difference between the structured documents is extracted by a structured document difference extraction program in such a manner as to satisfy the comparison criterion in accordance with the result of parsing. The comparison criterion assumes the form of a table containing a plurality of tags representing logical structures and types of tags for the comparison criterion. The tag types for comparison criterion include tags having contents which are compared only when the particular tags are coincident with each other, tags having contents which are ignored at the time of comparison, a set of tags having the same logical meaning, and a set of tags having contents which are not compared with each other.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种文档差异提取方法和装置,用于在考虑结构化文档的逻辑含义和结构的情况下,适当地满足文档编辑者的感觉来提取结构化文档之间的差异。 结构化文档由文档编辑程序编辑并存储在存储单元中。 参考为每个结构化文档的编辑前后的逻辑结构设置的比较标准,通过结构化文档解析程序分析从存储单元读取的编辑前后的结构化文档的逻辑结构,并分析其差异。 结构化文档差异提取程序根据解析结果以满足比较标准的方式提取结构化文档。 比较标准采用表格的形式,该表格包含表示比较标准的逻辑结构和标签类型的多个标签。 用于比较标准的标签类型包括具有仅当特定标签彼此一致时才比较的内容的标签、具有在比较时忽略的内容的标签、具有相同逻辑含义的一组标签以及一组具有相同逻辑含义的标签。 标签具有不相互比较的内容。

标题: Quick image processor of reduced circuit scale with high image quality and high efficiency
摘要: A quick image processor of reduced circuit scale for carrying out compression and expansion of image data, including a quantization-inverse quantization device which executes a quantization of the image data using quantization steps corresponding to frequency components and an inverse quantization of decoded data using the quantization steps. The quantization-inverse quantization device includes a first shifter for executing a predetermined bit number shift of input data, an add-subtract device for adding or subtracting the output of the first shifter to or from the input data, a look-up table device for multiplying the input data by a multiple previously stored therein, and a second shifter for executing a predetermined bit number shift of either the output of the add-subtract device or the output of the look-up table device, resulting in carrying out ready IC fabrication and improving approximation accuracy of the quantization steps.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种用于执行图像数据的压缩和扩展的缩减电路规模的快速图像处理器,包括量化-逆量化设备,其使用对应于频率分量的量化步骤来执行图像数据的量化以及使用量化来执行解码数据的逆量化 脚步。 量化-逆量化装置包括:第一移位器,用于执行输入数据的预定位数移位;加减装置,用于将第一移位器的输出与输入数据相加或相减;查找表装置,用于 将输入数据乘以预先存储在其中的倍数,以及用于执行加减装置的输出或查找表装置的输出的预定位数移位的第二移位器,从而进行准备好的IC制造 提高量化步长的逼近精度。

标题: Speaker independent speech recognition method and system
摘要: Recognition of sound units is improved by comparing frame-pair feature vectors which helps compensate for context variations in the pronunciation of sound units. A plurality of reference frames are stored of reference feature vectors representing reference words. A linear predictive coder (10) generates a plurality of spectral feature vectors for each frame of the speech signals. A filter bank system (12) transforms the spectral feature vectors to filter bank representations. A principal feature vector transformer (14) transforms the filter bank representations to an identity matrix of transformed input feature vectors. A concatenate frame system (16) concatenates the input feature vectors of adjacent frames to form the feature vector of a frame-pair. A transformer (18) and a comparator (20) compute the likelihood that each input feature vector for a frame-pair was produced by each reference frame. This computation is performed individually and independently for each reference frame-pairs. A dynamic time warper (22) constructs an optimum time path through the input speech signals for each of the computed likelihoods. A high level decision logic (24) recognizes the input speech signals as one of the reference words in response to the computed likelihoods and the optimum time paths.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 通过比较帧对特征向量来改进声音单元的识别,这有助于补偿声音单元发音的上下文变化。 多个参考帧存储有表示参考词的参考特征向量。 线性预测编码器(10)为语音信号的每一帧生成多个频谱特征向量。 滤波器组系统 (12) 将频谱特征向量转换为滤波器组表示。 主特征向量变换器 (14) 将滤波器组表示变换为变换输入特征向量的单位矩阵。 连接帧系统 (16) 连接相邻帧的输入特征向量以形成帧对的特征向量。 转换器 (18) 和比较器 (20) 计算帧对的每个输入特征向量由每个参考帧产生的可能性。 该计算针对每个参考帧对单独且独立地执行。 动态时间扭曲器 (22) 通过输入语音信号为每个计算出的可能性构建最佳时间路径。 高级决策逻辑(24)响应计算的可能性和最佳时间路径将输入语音信号识别为参考词之一。

标题: Method and system for providing a multimedia presentation
摘要: The invention comprises a method and apparatus for the distribution, processing, and display of combinations of audio, video, still images, and text which are represented by binary data files. The invention may be adapted for use with any of the various audio, video, still image and text data formats which are utilized to represent such information. A specific embodiment of the invention adapted for use on a personal computer is disclosed.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 本发明包括一种用于分发、处理和显示由二进制数据文件表示的音频、视频、静止图像和文本的组合的方法和设备。 本发明可以适用于用于表示这种信息的各种音频、视频、静止图像和文本数据格式中的任何一种。 公开了适用于个人计算机的本发明的特定实施例。
发明人: YAGER, THOMAS | LOVERIA, III, GREGORIO O. | GETMAN, STEVEN
发明人地址: Fort Worth, TX | Binghamton, NY | Williamsville, NY

标题: Propogating updates efficiently in hierarchically structured data under a push model
摘要: One embodiment of the present invention provides a system that efficiently propagates changes in hierarchically organized data to remotely cached copies of the data. The system operates by receiving changes to the data located on the server, and applying the changes to the data on the server. These changes are propagated to remotely cached copies of the data on a client in response to an event on a server, and independently of events on the client, by (1) determining differences between the current version of the data at the server and an older copy of the data at the client, which the server has stored locally; (2) using the differences to construct an update for the copy of the data, which may include node insertion and node deletion operations for hierarchically organized nodes in the data; and (3) sending the update to the client where the update is applied to the copy of the data to produce an updated copy of the data. According to one aspect of the present invention, the act of determining differences, and the act of using the differences to construct the update both take place during a single pass through the data. According to another aspect of the present invention, the update for the copy of the data may include node copy, node move, node collapse, node split, node swap and node update operations.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 本发明的一个实施例提供了一种系统,该系统有效地将分层组织的数据的变化传播到远程缓存的数据副本。 系统通过接收对位于服务器上的数据的更改并将更改应用到服务器上的数据来运行。 这些更改被传播到客户端上远程缓存的数据副本,以响应服务器上的事件,并且独立于客户端上的事件,通过(1)确定服务器上数据的当前版本与旧版本之间的差异 服务器在本地存储的客户端数据的副本;  (2)利用差异构造数据副本的更新,可能包括对数据中分层组织的节点的节点插入和节点删除操作;  (3) 将更新发送到客户端,在客户端将更新应用于数据副本以生成数据的更新副本。 根据本发明的一个方面,确定差异的动作和使用差异来构造更新的动作都发生在单次通过数据期间。 根据本发明的另一方面,对数据副本的更新可以包括节点复制、节点移动、节点折叠、节点分裂、节点交换和节点更新操作。

标题: 음성 인식 시스템에서 데이타 축소 방법 및 장치
摘要: The present invention describes a method and arrangement for reducing a sequence of initial frames into a reduced set of representative frames by combining the initial frames into a plurality of representative frames, the combining process including generating a distortion measure associated with each representative frame and comparing each distortion measure to a distortion threshold. From these representative frames, a set of mutually exclusive frames is determined to minimize the number of representative frames, whereby each representative frame in the set represents a unique set of contiguous initial frames and has an associated distortion measure which does not exceed the distortion threshold.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 本发明描述了一种方法和装置,用于通过将初始帧组合成多个代表性帧来将一系列初始帧减少为一组减少的代表性帧,该组合过程包括生成与每个代表性帧相关联的失真度量并比较每个 失真测量到失真阈值。 从这些代表性帧中,确定一组相互排斥的帧以最小化代表性帧的数量,由此该组中的每个代表性帧代表一组独特的连续初始帧并且具有不超过失真阈值的关联失真度量。
[标]当前申请(专利权)人: 摩托罗拉解决方案公司

标题: Movement vector detection device
摘要: The present invention relates to a movement vector detection apparatus for obtaining the movement amount of an image from the density difference between frames and the spatial inclination. More particularly, the present invention relates to a movement vector detection apparatus having a first operation circuit for operating the movement vector in accordance with an estimation equation approximating an influence of the diagonal spatial inclination component, a second operation circuit for obtaining a signal denoting the amount of the diagonal spatial inclination component of a supplied image signal and a third operation circuit for averaging the output from the first operation circuit under a weight which corresponds to the output from the second operation circuit.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 本发明涉及一种用于从帧之间的密度差和空间倾斜度获得图像的移动量​​的移动矢量检测设备。 更具体地,本发明涉及一种运动矢量检测装置,其具有用于根据近似对角空间倾斜分量的影响的估计方程来运算运动矢量的第一运算电路、用于获得表示该量的信号的第二运算电路 提供的图像信号的对角空间倾斜分量的计算和第三运算电路,用于在对应于来自第二运算电路的输出的权重下对来自第一运算电路的输出进行平均。
发明人: KONDO, TOSHIAKI, CANON K.K. | SEKINE, MASAYOSHI, CANON K.K.

标题: Online handwritten character recognizing system and method thereof
摘要: An online handwritten character recognizing system and method thereof, is provided which includes a feature extracting section for providing a Fourier transformation of the coordinate points of the character strokes that have been inputted through a tablet input/output section and normalized for distance and time by a preprocessing section. The Fourier coefficient is provided by converting a coordinate function expressing the time between inputted points into a frequency function. The recognizing system also includes a character recognizing section for dividing the Fourier coefficient provided by the feature extracting section into an imaginary part and a real part and multiplying a weight to the imaginary part and the real part and thereafter recognizing this as a character by utilizing perceptron, so that complicated Hangul (Korean alphabet) and English characters can be rapidly and precisely recognized.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 提供了一种在线手写字符识别系统及其方法,包括特征提取部分,用于提供已经通过输入/输出部分输入的字符笔划的坐标点的傅里叶变换,并通过距离和时间进行归一化。 预处理部分。 通过将表示输入点之间的时间的坐标函数转换为频率函数来提供傅立叶系数。 识别系统还包括字符识别部分,用于将特征提取部分提供的傅立叶系数分成虚部和实部,并对虚部和实部乘以权重,然后利用感知器将其识别为字符。  ,从而可以快速准确地识别复杂的韩文(韩文字母)和英文字符。
发明人: LEE, HEUN J. | JOE, MOON J.

标题: Způsob samočinného hotovení vícebarevné rastrové patrony a zařízení k provedení způsobu

标题: Voice-dialog system for automated output of information
摘要: A voice-dialog system outputs information, in particular a telephone number. An alphabet-identifier identifies an utterance which is spelt out by the user and selects utterances that can be spelt in a similar manner from a plurality of predetermined utterances; an utterance-identifier compares the utterance input by the user with the utterances selected by the alphabet-identifier and supplies at least one utterance for output to the user. A lexicon operates on-line and stores orthographic-phonetic information for the plurality of predetermined utterances which the alphabet-identifier, the utterance-identifier and a synthesizer can access in real time.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 语音对话系统输出信息,特别是电话号码。 字母标识符识别由用户拼出的话语,并从多个预定话语中选择能够以类似方式拼写的话语; 话语标识符将用户输入的话语与字母标识符选择的话语进行比较,并提供至少一个话语以输出给用户。 词典在线操作并存储字母标识符、话语标识符和合成器可以实时访问的多个预定话语的拼字语音信息。
发明人: GEORG, FRIES | KARLHEINZ, SCHUHMACHER | ANTJE, WIRTH | BERNHARD, KASPAR

标题: Method and system for recognising routing information on letters and parcels
摘要: The invention relates to a method and a system for recognising routing information on letters and parcels by means of OCR reading and video coding. The aim of the invention is to provide a more rapid, efficient system of reading the information. To this end, when one of the automatic stages of the OCR process fails to produce clear results, the process is paused in its current state. In order to obtain clear results for this stage of the process, a video coding request stating the present results and the operations to be executed is automatically conveyed to one or several video coding points, based on the clear and unclear results/intermediate results obtained thus far. The clear video coding results replace the unclear results, the paused OCR process stage is successfully completed and the next stage is started.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 本发明涉及一种利用OCR读取和视频编码识别信件和包裹路由信息的方法和系统。 本发明的目的是提供一种更快速、更有效的信息读取系统。 为此,当 OCR 过程的一个自动阶段未能产生清晰的结果时,该过程将暂停在其当前状态。 为了获得这一阶段过程的明确结果,根据由此获得的明确和不明确的结果/中间结果,将说明当前结果和要执行的操作的视频编码请求自动传送到一个或多个视频编码点 远的。 清晰的视频编码结果取代不清晰的结果,暂停的OCR处理阶段顺利完成,开始下一阶段。

标题: Verfahren und Anordnung zum Abschätzen des Bewegungsausmasses bei einemBildelement eines Fernsehbildes.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 通过比较像素（P1）的图像信号值和相应像素（P1min）的图像信号值，在像素级执行电视图像（TP）的图像元素（像素）（P1）的运动估计。前一个和/或后一个电视图像以及所述图像中的多个周围像素（P2min，P3min，P4min，P5min）的电视图像。取决于是否超过阈值，确定是否没有运动或是否存在运动。在与周围像素的比较中，存在用于检测“无运动”的OR函数。假设第一和第二比较结果“无运动”与像素 - 像素比较相关并且与之相关对于电视图像（TP）的像素（P）存储像素组比较。随后，第一和第二比较产生与像素（P1）相关联的子区域（MA1），其中像素矩阵（P1 ... P64）根据像素数的商的关系进行处理（P）在子区域（MA1）中表示“无运动”，并且子区域（MA1）中的像素总数（P1 ... P64）分别大于相关联的第一和第二阈值数量，这是总数的一部分。在该子区域级别，决定像素（P1）处的运动程度，取决于超过或不超过第一和第二阈值数量的组合。超标。

标题: Physical database design system
摘要: A physical database designer which is embodied in computer software that generates a physical database design. The designer follows a process which includes the steps of (a) entering a logical schema representing the database to be designed; (b) entering a hierarchial definition of the workload experienced by the database, which includes, for each level of a hierarchy of operations, a separate specification of workload; and (c) applying expert rules to the logical schema and the workload definition to generate the physical database design.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种物理数据库设计器,它体现在生成物理数据库设计的计算机软件中。 设计者遵循的过程包括以下步骤: (a) 输入表示要设计的数据库的逻辑模式;  (b) 输入数据库所经历的工作量的分级定义,其中包括,对于操作分级的每一级,单独的工作量说明;  (c) 将专家规则应用于逻辑模式和工作负载定义以生成物理数据库设计。

标题: Dual color camera microscope and methodology for cell staining and analysis
摘要: A method and apparatus is disclosed for use in performing automated classification of cells and other microscopic specimens. The apparatus provides a compact, adjustable assembly that is operable to provide: an operator-apparatus interactive classification system for the cell analysis; alternative techniques for different cells, cytoplasms and cell populations; and enhanced image or color separation and analysis.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 公开了一种用于对细胞和其他显微样本进行自动分类的方法和设备。 该设备提供了一种紧凑的、可调节的组件,该组件可操作以提供: 用于细胞分析的操作员-设备交互式分类系统; 针对不同细胞、细胞质和细胞群的替代技术; 以及增强的图像或颜色分离和分析。

标题: Method and apparatus for synthesizing speech from speech recognition templates
摘要: A user-interactive control system for an electronic device which synthesizes speech from speech recognition templates to generate voice reply feedback to the user indicative of which template word was recognized. The acoustic features of the user-spoken speech are extracted by the acoustic processor (110) and applied to the training processor (170) to generate word recognition templates stored in the template memory (160). Recognition processor (120) compares the user-spoken features to the recognition templates to provide voice command data for the device controller (130) which controls the operating parameters of the electronic device (150). The device controller also produces device status data for the synthesis processor (140) which synthesizes a speech reply signal from the word recognition templates. In the preferred embodiment, a hands-free user-interactive control system for a mobile radiotelephone is provided utilizing speech synthesis from speech recognition templates.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种用于电子设备的用户交互控制系统,其合成来自语音识别模板的语音以生成语音回复反馈给用户,指示哪个模板词被识别。 用户口语的声学特征由声学处理器(110)提取并应用于训练处理器(170)以生成存储在模板存储器(160)中的单词识别模板。 识别处理器(120)将用户口语特征与识别模板进行比较,以为控制电子设备(150)的操作参数的设备控制器(130)提供语音命令数据。 设备控制器还为合成处理器(140)产生设备状态数据,合成处理器(140)从单词识别模板合成语音回复信号。 在优选实施例中,提供了一种用于移动无线电话的免提用户交互控制系统,其利用来自语音识别模板的语音合成。

标题: Information recording medium and information reproducing apparatus for use therewith
摘要: An information recording medium and an information reproducing apparatus for use therewith for putting information into a system easily and quickly. The information recording medium records, in units of blocks, reproduction data such as voice data, image data and text data as well as reproduction data management information including address information and continuous reproduction information. The address information is built in a layered structure to designate addresses at which the reproduction data are stored. The continuous reproduction information specifies any one of two ways, i.e., continuously or selectively, in which to reproduce the reproduction data. The information reproducing apparatus comprises discriminating means for discriminating the continuous reproduction information in each block, and reproducing means for reproducing the reproduction data in units of blocks continuously or selectively depending on the result of the discrimination by the discriminating means.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种信息记录介质和与其一起使用的信息再现装置,用于将信息容易且快速地放入系统中。 信息记录介质以块为单位记录诸如语音数据、图像数据和文本数据的再现数据以及包括地址信息和连续再现信息的再现数据管理信息。 地址信息建立在分层结构中以指定存储再现数据的地址。 连续再现信息指定再现再现数据的两种方式中的任何一种,即,连续地或选择性地。 该信息再现装置包括鉴别装置,用于鉴别每个块中的连续再现信息,以及再现装置,用于根据鉴别装置的鉴别结果连续地或选择性地以块为单位再现再现数据。

标题: 電漿蝕刻製程中之晶片屬性之主動神經網路控制
摘要: 本發明根據事實說明在製造集體電路中所使用電漿輝光放電之放射跡線，包含關於在製程中造成電漿反應器、曝露在電漿之晶圓密度、電漿化學性、及其他材料濃度等變動現象的資訊。根據本發明，發表一種利用神經網路，在集體電路製程中判定電漿蝕刻結束點時間的方法。該結束點時間是根據光放射跡線之現場監測來判定。逆向傳播法是用來訓練網路。更明確地，神經網路可用於調節製程中控制變數及材料，生產具有所需品質屬性之輸出產品。反應品質屬性及製程間之關係的識別製程簽字，可用來訓練該神經網路。
摘要(译)(简体中文): 本发明根据事实说明在制造集体电路中所使用电浆辉光放电之放射迹线,包含关于在制程中造成电浆反应器、曝露在电浆之晶圆密度、电浆化学性、及其他材料浓度 等变动现象的资讯。 根据本发明,发表一种利用神经网路,在集体电路制程中判定电浆蚀刻结束点时间的方法。 该结束点时间是根据光放射迹线之现场监测来判定。 逆向传播法是用来训练网路。 更明确地,神经网路可用于调节制程中控制变数及材料,生产具有所需品质属性之输出产品。 反应品质属性及制程间之关系的识别制程签字,可用来训练该神经网路。

标题: SISTEMA DE SEPARACION E IDENTIFICACION DE CLASE DE PATRONES NO LINEALES, ADAPTATIVO, PARALELO Y DE UNIDADES MULTIPLES
摘要: A system is disclosed for separating and identifying alasses of patterns or events which are not necessarily linearly separable. The patterns are represented by an input signal S. The system comprises (1) a plurality of classification inits, connected in parallel to receive the input signal S, and 2) a class selection device, responsive to the output signals broduced by the classification units, for producing a single butput response R representing the class of each respective battem. In a preferred embodiment each classification unit ncludes a pattern feature encoding device, responsive to the nput signal S, for producing an intermediate signal Fi repre- bentative of the features contained in the pattern, and a battem classifier, responsive to the signal Fi, for producing an output signal Ri representative of the respective class of he pattern, as identified by the features encoded by the eature encoding device.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 公开了一种用于分离和识别不一定是线性可分离的模式或事件组的系统。 这些模式由输入信号S表示。该系统包括(1)多个分类单元,并联连接以接收输入信号S,以及2)类别选择设备,响应于由分类单元产生的输出信号 ,用于产生表示每个相应电池组的类别的单个输出响应 R。 在优选实施例中,每个分类单元包括模式特征编码装置,响应于输入信号S,用于产生中间信号F i  模式中包含的特征的代表,以及响应信号 F 的 Battem 分类器 i ,用于产生输出信号R i  代表模式的相应类别,由特征编码设备编码的特征所识别。
发明人: CHRISTOPHER L. SCOFIELD | LEON N. COOPER | CHARLES ELBAUM | DOUGLAS L. REILLY

标题: Verkehrsmodellierungs- und Vorhersagesystem mit künstlicher Intelligenz
Associative memory using recirculatory shift register cells
摘要: In an associative memory, each cell 20 (FIG. 2) includes a recirculatory shift register 30 in which information is stored, a comparator 31 for comparing the stored information with a key fed on line 22, a gate 32 for passing the results of the comparison only in a key field defined by key field signals on line 23, and a flip-flop 33 which is set to 1 if the comparison fails. Flip-flop 33 controls reading from the cell. A flip-flop 37 is used to record whether the cell is full or empty, and a compare chain 40a, 40b passing through all cells in sequence is energized onwards from the first cell in which comparison is successful.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 在相联存储器中,每个单元20(图2)包括其中存储信息的循环移位寄存器30、用于将存储的信息与在线22上馈送的密钥进行比较的比较器31、用于传递比较结果的门32 仅在由第 23 行上的关键字段信号定义的关键字段中,以及如果比较失败则设置为 1 的触发器 33。 触发器33控制从单元读取。 触发器37用于记录单元是满的还是空的,并且依次通过所有单元的比较链40a、40b从比较成功的第一个单元开始通电。
[标]当前申请(专利权)人: 霍尼韦尔信息系统公司

标题: Apparatus and method for syntactic signal analysis
摘要: An apparatus and method for syntactic signal analysis which is suitable for processing signals which deviate, within a freely selected margin, from a set of signals predetermined by a grammar, the apparatus being provided with a feature unification mechanism which detects violations of features, and an adaptive threshold mechanism coupled thereto. The feature unification mechanism, which processes the features in groups so that rapid processing is obtained, determines a violation score, thus providing a measure of the deviation of the analyzed signal from the set of signals predetermined by the grammar and indicates what elements of the signal are not satisfactory so that these can be corrected if necessary. The adaptive threshold mechanism enables a number of analyses to be delivered each having a violation score, so that on the basis thereof, in combination with other factors which may be available, it is possible to select the best analysis. The apparatus is applicable to signal correction, signal verification and signal recognition.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种句法信号分析的装置和方法,适用于处理在自由选择的范围内偏离语法预定的一组信号的信号,该装置具有检测特征违规的特征统一机制,以及 与之耦合的自适应阈值机制。 特征统一机制将特征分组处理以获得快速处理,确定违规分数,从而提供分析信号与语法预先确定的信号集的偏差的度量,并指示信号的哪些元素 不令人满意,以便在必要时进行更正。 自适应阈值机制使得能够传送多个分析,每个分析都具有违规分数,使得在此基础上,结合可能可用的其他因素,可以选择最佳分析。 该装置适用于信号校正、信号验证和信号识别。
发明人: VAN VLIEMBERGEN, EDUARDUS J.W. | HEEMELS, ROBERTUS P.E.H. | CREMERS, LOUIS M.G. | HOMMERSOM, FREDERIK J. | GERRITSEN, JAN
发明人地址: Venlo, NL | Roermond, NL | Nijmegen, NL

标题: Automatic HLA typing apparatus
摘要: Apparatus for automatically typing HLA (Human Leukocyte Antigen) is disclosed. An optical image of a sample containing lymphocytes is formed by a phase-contrast microscope. The optical image is transformed into electrical picture signal through a image pick-up unit which in turn is transformed into binary picture patterns for a predetermined area site in the image through a window circuit. The obtained binary picture patterns are compared with template patterns of predetermined features corresponding to reacted and non-reacted lymphocyte images to detect and type the lymphocyte image. With this typing apparatus, HLA typing test can be conducted automatically with high accuracy.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 公开了一种自动分型HLA(人类白细胞抗原)的装置。 包含淋巴细胞的样品的光学图像由相差显微镜形成。 光学图像通过图像拾取单元转换为电图像信号,图像拾取单元又通过窗口电路将图像中的预定区域位置转换为二值图像模式。 将获得的二值化图片模式与反应和未反应淋巴细胞图像对应的预定特征的模板模式进行比较,以对淋巴细胞图像进行检测和分型。 使用该分型仪,可自动进行HLA分型检测,准确度高。
发明人: KAWAHARA, ATSUSHI | SAWADA, MASAHIRO | FUJII, NORIO
发明人地址: Tokyo, JP | Kawasaki, JP | Urawa, JP

摘要(译)(简体中文): 用于自动检测地址的布置，例如字母上的地址。该字母通过传输设备经过扫描电路，例如电视摄像机，用于第一次粗光栅扫描操作，其中地址码位于字母上，然后经过第二扫描电路，用于提供图像解剖器管，用于第二次精细光栅扫描操作，其中识别代码。扫描电路包括用于将信息转换成脉冲信号的扫描装置，以及处理第一扫描操作的信号的处理器，以便定位地址码并控制扫描装置以扫描代码的各个字符。

标题: Method, apparatus, and radio for optimizing hidden markov model speech recognition
摘要: In a statistical based speech recognition system, one of the key issues is the selection of the Hidden Markov Model that best matches a given sequence of feature observations. The problem is usually addressed by the calculation of the maximum likelihood, ML, state sequence by means of a Viterbi or other decoder. Noise or inadequate training can produce an ML sequence associated with a Hidden Markov Model other than the correct model. The method of the present invention provides improved robustness by combining the standard ML state sequence score (416) with an additional path core (418) derived from the dynamics of the ML score as a function of time. These two scores, when combined, form a hybrid metric (420) that, when used with the decoder, optimizes selection of the correct Hidden Markov Model (422).
摘要(译)(简体中文): 在基于统计的语音识别系统中,关键问题之一是选择最匹配给定特征观察序列的隐马尔可夫模型。 该问题通常通过使用维特比或其他解码器计算最大似然、ML、状态序列来解决。 噪声或训练不足会产生与隐马尔可夫模型相关联的 ML 序列,而不是正确的模型。 本发明的方法通过将标准ML状态序列分数(416)与从作为时间函数的ML分数的动态导出的附加路径核心(418)相结合来提供改进的鲁棒性。 这两个分数在组合时形成混合度量(420),当与解码器一起使用时,优化正确隐马尔可夫模型(422)的选择。
发明人: KUSHNER WILLIAM M. | SRENGER EDWARD | HARTMAN MATTHEW A.

标题: Image processing method and apparatus and storage medium therefor
摘要: It is an object of the present invention to appropriately extract areas for character recognition from a color image. It is another object of the present invention to separate and extract characters from a background color in a color image if the background of the manuscript is not white and if the characters are printed in a portion having a color that is not commonly used all over the image. To achieve these objects, this invention binarizes an input color image in a plurality of stages and extracts area from binary images obtained in each stage to enable areas and text sections to be appropriately extracted despite the unknown colors of the characters and background contained in the input color image.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 本发明的目的是从彩色图像中适当地提取用于字符识别的区域。 如果手稿的背景不是白色并且如果字符被打印在具有在整个图像中不常用的颜色的部分中,则本发明的另一个目的是从彩色图像中的背景颜色中分离和提取字符 图片。 为了实现这些目的,本发明在多个阶段对输入的彩色图像进行二值化,并从在每个阶段获得的二值图像中提取区域,以使得区域和文本部分能够被适当地提取,尽管输入中包含的字符和背景的颜色是未知的。 彩色图像。

标题: Navigation apparatus for land vehicle inputting road traffic information
摘要: A navigation apparatus stores road data which are formed by a network of internally stored road links and traveling costs corresponding to the respective ones of the internal road links. When the navigation apparatus receives traffic information corresponding to a specific external road link which is set for communication of traffic information, the apparatus identifies one or more internal links or portions thereof corresponding to the external link for which traffic information has been received, and the stored traveling costs are updated, on the basis of a conversion table. The traveling cost for an internal road link corresponding to a specific external link which is closed to traffic is updated to " INFINITY ". The apparatus searches for and identifies a route between an origin and a destination based on the updated traveling costs and the network of the road links. The internal links do not need to correspond directly to the external links, but rather may include more branch points for example. Traffic information of different types and for different links can be processed and assimilated for correspondence with the internal links.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 导航设备存储由内部存储的道路链接的网络形成的道路数据以及对应于各个内部道路链接的行驶成本。 当导航设备接收到对应于为交通信息通信而设置的特定外部道路链路的交通信息时,该设备识别对应于已经接收到交通信息的外部链路的一个或多个内部链路或其部分,并且存储的 旅费根据换算表更新。 对应于禁止通行的特定外部链路的内部道路链路的行驶成本被更新为“INFINITY”。 该设备基于更新的行驶成本和道路链接的网络来搜索和识别起点和终点之间的路线。 内部链接不需要直接对应外部链接,例如可以包括更多的分支点。 可以对不同类型和不同链路的交通信息进行处理和同化,以与内部链路对应。
[标]当前申请(专利权)人: 住友电气工业株式会社
发明人: NISHIMURA, SHIGEKI | NAKANO, HIROYUKI | NAKAJIMA, MASAHIRO

标题: Bank note identification
摘要: Apparatus for identifying the denomination of a bank note comprises a sensor 14 which senses light reflected from an incremental area 16 of a bank note 10 to produce an output which is passed to a storage 24 at intervals. When sufficient sample outputs have been stored in the storage 24 a control 28 causes each sample to be compared in a comparator 30 with a number of previous samples taken in a pre-selected sequence so as to produce a multi-bit correlation number. Each correlation number thus formed is then compared with reference multi-bit numbers derived from scanning a corresponding section of a number of notes of the different denominations to be identified. If the multi-bit number derived from the scanning is the same as any of the reference multi-bit numbers, a correlation count for that particular denomination is incremented.; This process is repeated for the whole area of the note and, on completion, the correlation counts for the different denominations are compared. Provided the ratio of the largest correlation count to the next highest correlation count is 1.28 or greater and the largest correlation count is at least 28, the note is identified, as shown by an indicator 36.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 用于识别钞票面额的设备包括传感器14,传感器14感测从钞票10的增量区域16反射的光以产生输出,该输出不时地传递到存储器24。 当足够的样本输出已经存储在存储器24中时,控制器28使每个样本在比较器30中与在预选序列中取得的多个先前样本进行比较,以便产生多位相关数。 然后将由此形成的每个相关数与参考多位数字进行比较,参考多位数字是通过扫描要识别的不同面额的多个钞票的相应部分而得出的。 如果从扫描得到的多位数字与任何参考多位数字相同,则递增该特定面额的相关计数。 对纸币的整个区域重复此过程,完成后,比较不同面额的相关计数。 如果最大相关计数与下一个最高相关计数的比率为 1.28 或更大,并且最大相关计数至少为 28,则该音符被识别,如指示器 36 所示。

标题: Method for multi-step filtering spatious objects by utilizing MMP filter in spatial database system
摘要: The present invention relates to a method for multi-step filtering a candidate object which is filtered by a minimum bounding rectangle (MBR); and, more particulary, to a method of multi-step filtering a candidate object by employing a minimum maximum point (MMP) filter to improve spatial query filtering process performance by refiltering the candidate objects, which are filtered by using a rotated minimum bounding rectangle (Rotated Minimum Bounding Rectangle) surrounding spatial objects during filtering process at a step of spatial query filtering and refining of spatial database, by using spatial filter, i.e., MMP filter.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 本发明涉及一种对通过最小边界矩形(MBR)过滤的候选对象进行多步过滤的方法; 更具体地说,涉及一种通过使用最小最大点 (MMP) 过滤器对候选对象进行多步过滤的方法,以通过重新过滤候选对象来提高空间查询过滤处理性能,这些候选对象是通过使用旋转的最小边界矩形进行过滤的。  Rotated Minimum Bounding Rectangle) 在空间查询过滤和空间数据库细化步骤中,通过使用空间过滤器,即 MMP 过滤器,在过滤过程中围绕空间对象。
发明人: KIM, MI YEON | CHOE, SANG KYU | LIM, SU MI | KIM, JANG SU

标题: Semiconductor device and method for processing multiple input signals
摘要: A semiconductor device having a source region, a drain region, a channel region between the source region and the drain region, a gate consisting of at least three input electrodes provided above the channel region, and a potential modulating film provided between the channel region and the gate. The potential modulating film can assume at least two potential modulating states, so that the potential of the channel region is modulated between and held at different values. The potential of the channel region is modulated by changing the state of the potential modulating film. Specifically, the potential of the channel region is modulated by not only applying voltages to the input electrodes but also controlling the state of the potential modulating film. If in processing at least three input signals, a predetermined one of them corresponds to control of the state of the potential modulating film and the remaining input signals correspond to the input voltages to the input electrodes, the number of wires can be decreased.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种半导体器件,具有源区、漏区、源区和漏区之间的沟道区、由设置在沟道区上方的至少三个输入电极组成的栅极、以及设置在沟道区和沟道区之间的电位调制膜。 大门。 电势调制膜可以呈现至少两种电势调制状态,使得沟道区的电势在不同值之间被调制并保持在不同值。 通过改变电位调制膜的状态来调制沟道区的电位。 具体而言,不仅对输入电极施加电压,还通过控制电位调制膜的状态来调制沟道区域的电位。 如果在处理至少三个输入信号时,其中预定的一个对应于电位调制膜的状态控制,其余输入信号对应于输入电极的输入电压,则可以减少布线的数量。

标题: APARATO DE INSPECCION DE CARACTERES IMPRESOS PARA OBJETOS SOLIDOS.
摘要: UN PRIMERO, UN SEGUNDO Y UN TERCER RAMS (18,29 Y 34) QUE PREVIAMENTE HAN ALMACENADO UN VALOR ABSOLUTO DE UNA DIFERENCIA ENTRE CUALQUIER COMBINACION DE DOS SEÑALES DIGITALES SALIDA DE UNOS MEDIOS DE CONVERSION A/D (3), SON PROVISTOS CON EL PRIMER, EL SEGUNDO Y EL TERCER CIRCUITO CODIFICADOR Y DIFERENCIAL (5,6 Y 7), POR LO CUAL REPRESENTAR UN PROCESADOR EN TIEMPO REAL DE LA SEÑAL DIGITAL PARA UN APARATO DE INSPECCION DE LETRA IMPRESA PARA OBJETOS SOLIDOS.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 第一、第二和第三RAM 18、29和34预先存储了从A/D转换装置3发出的两个数字信号的任意组合之间的差的绝对值,具有第一、第二 第三差分和编码电路5、6和7,从而对用于立体物体的印刷文字检测装置的数字信号进行实时处理。
发明人: YAMAMOTO, TAIZO | KONISHI, HIROKAZU | KAWAGUCHI, YOSHIHISA | NAGAO, AKIRA

标题: Automated proofreading using interface linking recognized words to their audio data while text is being changed
摘要: Data processing apparatus is disclosed for receiving recognition data from a speech recognition engine and its corresponding dictated audio data where the recognition data includes recognised words or characters. A display displays the recognised words or characters and the recognised words or characters are stored as a file together with the corresponding audio data. Link data is formed to link the position of the words or characters in the file and the position of the corresponding audio component in the audio data. The recognised words or characters can be processed without loosing the audio data.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 公开了用于从语音识别引擎接收识别数据及其对应的口述音频数据的数据处理装置,其中识别数据包括识别的单词或字符。 显示器显示识别的单词或字符,并且识别的单词或字符与相应的音频数据一起存储为文件。 形成链接数据以链接文件中的单词或字符的位置和音频数据中相应音频分量的位置。 可以处理识别的单词或字符而不会丢失音频数据。
发明人: MITCHELL, JOHN C. | HEARD, ALAN JAMES | CORBETT, STEVEN NORMAN | DANIEL, NICHOLAS JOHN
法律状态/事件: 期限届满 | 诉讼 | 权利转移

标题: Method and system for selecting pattern recognition training vectors
摘要: A computer-based method and system selects a plurality of training vectors for a pattern recognition system by creating a plurality of clusters and then uniformly sampling the clusters. Each of the clusters is associated with a particular class and includes a plurality of example signals. The example signals are assigned to the clusters as a function of cluster-example distances. If a cluster includes one or more overlapping example signals, the number of clusters associated with the overlapping cluster is increased and the example signals are re-assigned to the clusters.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 基于计算机的方法和系统通过创建多个集群然后对集群进行均匀采样来为模式识别系统选择多个训练向量。 每个集群都与特定类别相关联,并且包括多个示例信号。 示例信号作为集群示例距离的函数分配给集群。 如果集群包括一个或多个重叠的示例信号,则增加与重叠集群相关联的集群的数量并且将示例信号重新分配给集群。
[标]当前申请(专利权)人: 摩托罗拉解决方案公司

标题: 快速90度旋转双态图象的系统
摘要: 正负９０°旋转双态图象数据的方法。选出８×８象素块进行旋转，利用查找表动态地生成一个中间矩阵并且存储到处理机的两个３２位寄存器里。中间矩阵的生成达到部分的旋转，奇数行存储到第一和第三３２位寄存器里，偶数行存储到第二和第四３２位寄存器里。第一和第二寄存器沿相反方向移位一位，分别与第四和第三寄存器进行逻辑“或”运算这样偶数位放在一个寄存器里而奇数位放在另一个寄存器里。对所有剩余的图象数据块重复这些步骤。
摘要(译)(简体中文): 正负９０°旋转双态图象数据的方法。选出８×８象素块进行旋转，利用查找表动态地生成一个中间矩阵并且存储到处理机的两个３２位寄存器里。中间矩阵的生成达到部分的旋转，奇数行存储到第一和第三３２位寄存器里，偶数行存储到第二和第四３２位寄存器里。第一和第二寄存器沿相反方向移位一位，分别与第四和第三寄存器进行逻辑“或”运算这样偶数位放在一个寄存器里而奇数位放在另一个寄存器里。对所有剩余的图象数据块重复这些步骤。

标题: 圖像讀取裝置
摘要: 一種沿著文件之長度方向以既定之相對速度與文件作相對移動以讀取文件圖像之圖像讀取裝置，其含有沿文件之寬度方向配成一行之多數個感像器，每一個感像器具有由第１至第ｎ個光電轉換元件以等間隔於一行上配置而成之行列，及用為使各個感像器之光電轉換元件之行列以既定之時間依第１至第ｎ之順序掃描之掃描裝置。各個感像器之光電轉換元件之行列係如此配置，即第ｎ個光電轉換元件相對於第１個光電轉換元件係於與上述之相對移動成相反之方向上以既定之距離對文件之寬度方向成傾斜配置，該既定距離係由既定相對移動速度及既定時間所定。
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种沿着文件之长度方向以既定之相对速度与文件作相对移动以读取文件图像之图像读取装置,其含有沿文件之宽度方向配成一行之多数个感像器,每一个感 像器具有由第1至第n个光电转换元件以等间隔于一行上配置而成之行列,及用为使各个感像器之光电转换元件之行列以既定之时间依第1至第n之 顺序扫描之扫描装置。 各个感像器之光电转换元件之行列系如此配置,即第n个光电转换元件相对于第1个光电转换元件系于与上述之相对移动成相反之方向上以既定之距离对文件之宽度方向 成倾斜配置,该既定距离系由既定相对移动速度及既定时间所定。

当前第一申请(专利权)人: 京西拉三田股份有限公司

标题: Apparatus and method for production planning
摘要: Apparatus and method for production planning in a manufacturing facility is provided. The apparatus and method generates a plurality of theoretical plans and a constraint-based model for receiving one of the theoretical production plans, and applying at least one constraint thereto. Further, a cost function is computed for the theoretical production plans. Then, the apparatus and method searches for a feasible production plan among the plurality of theoretical plans, where the feasible plan is the plan which does not violate the applied constraint and has the least computed cost function.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 提供了用于在制造设施中进行生产计划的设备和方法。 该设备和方法生成多个理论计划和基于约束的模型,用于接收理论生产计划之一,并对其应用至少一个约束。 此外,计算理论生产计划的成本函数。 然后,该装置和方法在多个理论计划中寻找可行的生产计划,其中可行的计划是不违反所应用的约束并且具有最小计算成本函数的计划。

标题: Method and apparatus for system documentation
摘要: A method for system documentation includes photographing at least part of a system from at least two directions to obtain photographs with a camera having a film plane and a measuring grid plate in front of the film plane. The photographs are digitized. Center lines for individual system parts are separately determined. The digitized photographs are evaluated and a three-dimensional image of the system is prepared with a CAD method from the course of the center lines, for a three-dimensional representation of the system. An apparatus for system documentation includes a camera having a film plane and a measuring grid plate in front of the film plane for taking a photograph of at least part of a system. A digitizing apparatus is provided for the photograph. An apparatus for determining a center line of the system part is connected downstream of the digitizing apparatus. A CAD system is connected downstream of the apparatus for determining the center line.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种用于系统记录的方法包括使用具有胶片平面和位于胶片平面前面的测量网格板的照相机从至少两个方向拍摄系统的至少一部分以获得照片。 照片是数字化的。 各个系统部件的中心线是单独确定的。 对数字化照片进行评估,并使用 CAD 方法从中心线的过程中制备系统的 3D 图像,用于系统的 3D 表示。 一种用于系统记录的设备包括具有胶片平面和在胶片平面前面用于拍摄系统的至少一部分的照片的测量网格板的照相机。 为照片提供了数字化设备。 用于确定系统部分的中心线的装置连接在数字化装置的下游。  CAD系统连接在用于确定中心线的装置的下游。
发明人: FRAAS, KARL-CHRISTIAN | KAMSTIES, KLAUS-DIETER | LOCKAU, JURGEN

标题: 하선ㆍ방선 생성장치

摘要(译)(简体中文): 无内容。

标题: Video image motion data generator for computer graphics
摘要: A motion information generating apparatus arranged such that a desired portion of a picture (27) displayed on a monitor receiver (11) is designated by a bar mark (28) and image data corresponding to the desired portion of the designated picture is sampled in a one-dimensional fashion, whereby an information indicating a motion of a picture is formed on the basis of the thus sampled image data.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种运动信息生成装置,其被配置为使得显示在监视器接收器(11)上的图片(27)的期望部分由条形标记(28)指定,并且对应于指定图片的期望部分的图像数据被采样到 一维方式,由此基于如此采样的图像数据形成指示画面运动的信息。

标题: Method of and apparatus for installing bearings on engine components
摘要(译)(简体中文): 轴承自动安装在内燃机的发动机部件上，例如连杆，曲轴，气缸体等。读取并存储发动机部件上指示的数据并识别发动机部件。匹配发动机部件的轴承基于存储的数据从轴承储料器中选择。然后将所选轴承传送到安装机器人，该机器人将轴承安装在发动机部件上。

标题: Automatic method of generating feature probabilities for automatic extracting summarization
摘要: A method of automatically generating feature probabilities that allow later automatic generation of document extracts. The computer system generates the probabilities by analyzing each document a document at a time. First, the computer system designates one of the documents as a selected document. Next, the computer system analyzes each sentence of the selected document to determine the value of the paragraph feature and the value of the uppercase feature. The computer system repeats this effort for each document of the document corpus. Afterward, the number of occurrences of each value of each feature is calculated and is used to calculate feature value probabilities for all of the features.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种自动生成特征概率的方法,允许以后自动生成文档提取。 计算机系统通过一次分析每个文档来生成概率。 首先,计算机系统将其中一个文档指定为选定文档。 接下来,计算机系统分析所选文档的每个句子以确定段落特征的值和大写特征的值。 计算机系统对文档语料库的每个文档重复这一努力。 之后,计算每个特征的每个值的出现次数,并用于计算所有特征的特征值概率。
发明人: KUPIEC, JULIAN M. | PEDERSEN, JAN O. | CHEN, FRANCINE R. | BROTSKY, DANIEL C. | PUTZ, STEVEN B.
发明人地址: 10079 Craft Drive,Cupertino, California 95014,US | 3913 Bibbits Drive,Palo Alto, California 94303,US | 975 Sherman Avenue,Menlo Park, California 94025,US | 1162 Colusa Avenue,Berkeley, California 94707,US | 351 Rosemont Drive,Santa Clara, California 95051,US

标题: Method and system for imaging target detection
摘要: A system and method for imaging target detection includes scanning a target area to produce an image of the target area and discriminating a target by identifying image pixels of similar intensity levels, grouping contiguous pixels with similar intensity levels into regions, calculating a set of features for each region and qualifying regions as possible targets in response to the features; discriminating the background by identifying image pixels of similar intensity levels, grouping contiguous pixels of similar intensity levels into regions, calculating a set of features for each background region and qualifying background regions as terrain characteristics in response to the features and analyzing the qualified terrain characteristics and qualified target candidates to determine and prioritize targets.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种用于成像目标检测的系统和方法,包括扫描目标区域以产生目标区域的图像,并通过识别具有相似强度水平的图像像素、将具有相似强度水平的连续像素分组到区域、计算一组特征来区分目标。 每个区域和合格区域作为响应特征的可能目标; 通过识别具有相似强度级别的图像像素,将具有相似强度级别的连续像素分组为区域,为每个背景区域计算一组特征,并将背景区域作为地形特征来响应特征,并分析合格的地形特征来区分背景和 合格的目标候选人来确定目标并确定目标的优先级。
发明人: DEAETT, MICHAEL A. | DEGRAAF, ERIK J. | JOHNSON, STEPHEN G. | NORCROSS, MELINDA L. | PAWLAK, ANTHONY J.
发明人地址: North Kingstown, RI | Derry, NH | Little Compton, RI | Hudson, NH | Manchester, NH

标题: A learning method for an image analysis system for use in the analysis of an object as well as uses of the method
摘要: In the teaching of an image analysis system, a video image of a reference object is captured. Several areas, each of which represents a class (22, 23), are marked on the video image, which is divided into pixels having their separate identification, such as colour. Once all classes have been formed, each class is given a colour which is assigned to all pixels in the class irrespective of identification. Pixels which may belong to more than one class, a so-called conflict class (24), and pixels which do not belong to any class, a so-called 0 class (25), are transferred to a residual class. Then the entire video image is processed in that the pixels which are not represented in the zero class (25) or the conflict class (24), are given a colour value from the class having a pixel identification which is closest to the pixel concerned. The principles of the invention may be applied in general in connection with analysis techniques where objects may be characterized by means of an N-dimensional set of parameters. This provides a method which can teach an image analysis system in a quick and safe manner for use e.g. in connection with analysis of cells/tissue, analysis of cuts of meat, metallurgical analyses and other similar fields.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 在图像分析系统的教学中,捕获参考对象的视频图像。 在视频图像上标记了几个区域,每个区域代表一个类别 (22, 23),这些区域被划分为具有其单独标识(例如颜色)的像素。 一旦形成了所有类别,就为每个类别赋予一种颜色,该颜色分配给该类别中的所有像素,而与标识无关。 可能属于一个以上类别的像素,即所谓的冲突类别 (24),以及不属于任何类别的像素,即所谓的 0 类别 (25),被转移到残差类别。 然后处理整个视频图像,其中未在零类(25)或冲突类(24)中表示的像素被赋予来自具有最接近相关像素的像素标识的类的颜色值。 本发明的原理通常可以结合分析技术应用,其中对象可以通过N维参数集来表征。 这提供了一种可以以快速和安全的方式教授图像分析系统以供使用的方法,例如 与细胞/组织分析、肉块分析、冶金分析和其他类似领域相关。
发明人: LOCHT, PETER | MIKKELSEN, PETER | THOMSEN, KNUD
法律状态/事件: 权利终止 | 权利转移

标题: Tape system storage and retrieval process
摘要: A tape storage and retrieval system is provided to facilitate the archival of machine data to tape and optionally to disk storage in a manner which enables the retrieval of the data in a batch or on-line processing environment. A hierarchy of storage levels is adopted for data objects within the system. The manner of the storage of the data object within the tape system is determined by the storage level which is changed over time to reflect the need for access to the data object. For example, those tapes storing data object allocated the highest level of storage may be stored in parallel on disks, may only be written so as to occupy only part of the tape volume, or stored on the tape system drive.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 提供了一种磁带存储和检索系统,以便以能够在批处理或在线处理环境中检索数据的方式将机器数据存档到磁带和可选的磁盘存储中。 系统内的数据对象采用存储级别的层次结构。 磁带系统中数据对象的存储方式由存储级别决定,存储级别随时间变化以反映访问数据对象的需要。 例如,那些存储分配了最高存储级别的数据对象的磁带可以并行存储在磁盘上,可以仅写入以仅占用磁带卷的一部分,或者存储在磁带系统驱动器上。

发明人: MCGOVERN, THOMAS CHARLES | WATERS, GERAINT | SHAUGHNESSY, WILLIAM

标题: Bildwiedergabegerät
摘要: An image displaying apparatus stores plural image data (13) and displays one of the image data, which image data represent a growing plant (animal) (13) or represent a series of motions of an animal. The apparatus further stores plural element data (13) for growing the plant (animal). When one of the element data (13) is selected, another image data of the plant (animal) is displayed in place of the previously displayed imaged data to show how the plant (animal) grew up thank to the selected element data. The apparatus is provided with a sensor for detecting motion of a user. Detecting the motion of the user, the apparatus displays new image data representing a motion of the animal in place of the previously displayed image data to show how the animal reacts to the user's motion.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种图像显示装置存储多个图像数据(13)并显示其中一个图像数据,该图像数据表示正在生长的植物(动物)(13)或表示动物的一系列运动。 该装置还存储用于培育植物(动物)的多个元素数据(13)。  When one of the element data (13) is selected, another image data of the plant (animal) is displayed in place of the previously displayed imaged data to show how the plant (animal) grew up thank to the selected element data. 该设备配备有用于检测用户运动的传感器。 检测到用户的运动,该装置显示表示动物运动的新图像数据代替先前显示的图像数据以显示动物如何对用户的运动作出反应。
[标]当前申请(专利权)人: 卡西欧计算机株式会社

标题: 構文分析方式
摘要: An automatic syntax analyzing method is applied to a natural language processing system. It includes the step of detecting by dictionary consultation the syntactic category of words forming an inputted sentence and steps of assumptively applying, when the input sentence includes at least a word unregistered in the dictionary section, an adequate category which satisfies a predetermined grammatical regulation of the input sentence to the unregistered word independent of the dictionary consultation.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种自动语法分析方法应用于自然语言处理系统。 它包括通过字典查询来检测构成输入句子的词的句法类别的步骤,以及当输入句子至少包括字典部分中未登记的词时假定应用满足预定语法规则的适当类别的步骤。 对未登录词的输入句子独立于字典查询。

标题: Method and apparatus for effecting secure document format conversion
摘要: A method and apparatus is provided for effecting secure document delivery in any of various document formats. A document is encrypted with the public key of a server associated with the recipient of the document, instead of with the public key of the intended recipient. The receiving server is located within a firewall. The encrypted document is forwarded to the server within the firewall. The server decrypts the document using its corresponding private key, converts the document to a now data representation, and then either forwards the document to the recipient inside the firewall, or re-encrypts the document with the public key of an intended recipient outside of the firewall or with the public key of another server that is associated with the intended recipient of the document.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 提供了一种方法和设备,用于实现各种文档格式中的任何一种的安全文档传送。 文档是使用与文档接收者关联的服务器的公钥加密的,而不是使用预期接收者的公钥加密的。 接收服务器位于防火墙内。 加密文件被转发到防火墙内的服务器。 服务器使用其相应的私钥解密文档,将文档转换为当前数据表示,然后将文档转发给防火墙内的接收者,或者使用防火墙外预期接收者的公钥重新加密文档 防火墙或与文档的预期接收者关联的另一台服务器的公钥。

标题: Method for reconstructing a shape and an apparatus for reconstructing a shape
摘要: An object of the invention is to provide a method for easily determining an integral interval when detecting inclinations of a subject in pixel units and reconstructing a shape of said subject by integrating said detected inclinations. This method photographs the subject with a left camera and a right camera, and obtains gradational images from the respective positions. This method obtains in pixel units parallaxes for the subject between these positions. This method determines as one integral interval each domain in which pixels showing the same parallax appear in succession.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 本发明的一个目的是提供一种方法,用于在以像素为单位检测对象的倾斜并通过对检测到的倾斜进行积分来重建所述对象的形状时容易地确定积分区间。 该方法用左相机和右相机拍摄对象,并从各自的位置获得渐变图像。 该方法以像素为单位获得这些位置之间的对象的视差。 该方法将显示相同视差的像素连续出现的每个域确定为一个整数区间。
法律状态/事件: 期限届满 | 权利转移

标题: Method of learning in a speech recognition system
摘要: A recognition test matches a speech segment supplied to the system with a set of parameters associated with a reference and memorized in a dictionary. A provisional version of each set of parameters to be memorized in the dictionary in association with a reference is estimated on the basis of one or more segments of speech, after which the provisional version is memorized in the dictionary in association with the reference. At least one repetition of the speech segment is submitted to a recognition test, after which depending on whether it has matched the speech segment with the provisional version, the provisional version is modified and the modified provisional version is memorized.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 识别测试将提供给系统的语音片段与一组与参考相关联并存储在字典中的参数匹配。 基于一个或多个语音片段估计要与参考相关联地存储在字典中的每组参数的临时版本,之后将临时版本与参考相关联地存储在字典中。 将至少一个重复的语音片段提交给识别测试,之后根据语音片段是否与暂定版本匹配,修改暂定版本并记忆修改后的暂定版本。
发明人: LOCKWOOD, PHILIP | GLORION, CATHERINE | LELIEVRE, LAURENT
发明人地址: Vaureal, FR | Saint-Cyr-l'Ecole, FR | Jouars-Pontchartrain, FR
法律状态/事件: 期限届满 | 质押 | 权利转移

标题: System for dispensing, verifying and tracking postage and other information on mailpieces
摘要: A system and method for marking mailpieces for postal fee and tracking purposes is described. The system greatly increases security now obtainable with conventional postage meters and postage stamp affixation. A central control computer under the control of a postal service enables the system. Host computers under the control of customers and the postal service are used to control and audit the printing of indicia marks on mailpieces. Mailpieces can be scanned with remote field readers at any step in the mail distribution process, thereby providing information to the postal service and to the customers. Real time analysis of the scanned indicia marks is used to reduce problems associated with counterfeiting of mailpiece indicia and mailpiece diversion. Information security is provided so that proprietary information of the postal service and the users of the system is maintained at all times.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 描述了一种用于标记邮件以用于邮政费用和跟踪目的的系统和方法。 该系统大大提高了现在可以通过传统的邮资计价器和邮票粘贴获得的安全性。 邮政服务控制下的中央控制计算机启用该系统。 在客户和邮政服务的控制下的主机用于控制和审核邮件上标记标记的打印。 邮件分发过程中的任何步骤都可以使用远程现场阅读器扫描邮件,从而为邮政服务和客户提供信息。 扫描标记标记的实时分析用于减少与伪造邮件标记和邮件转移相关的问题。 提供信息安全,以便始终维护邮政服务和系统用户的专有信息。

标题: Independent channel automatic gain control for self-scanning photocell array
摘要(译)(简体中文): 扫描的光电管阵列具有通过基于被扫描的介质建立比例范围而自动控制的每个光电池通道的增益。通过以光电池扫描速率调制模数转换器的参考输入来改变每个单元的表观增益。

标题: Apparatus for computer aided diagnosis of medical images having abnormal patterns
摘要: An apparatus for computer aided diagnosis of images comprises an entire area image memory for storing an entire area image signal representing a radiation image of an object, and a prospective abnormal pattern detecting device for detecting a prospective abnormal pattern in the radiation image in accordance with the entire area image signal. A judgment device makes a judgment as to the presence or absence of the prospective abnormal pattern in accordance with the results of the detection of the prospective abnormal pattern carried out by the prospective abnormal pattern detecting device. In cases where the judgment device has judged that the prospective abnormal pattern is present, a local area extracting device extracts a local area limited image signal corresponding to a local area containing the prospective abnormal pattern from the entire area image signal having been stored in the entire area image memory. A local area limited image displaying device displays the image of the local area in accordance with the local area limited image signal, which has been extracted by the local area extracting device. An entire area image displaying device displays the entire area of the radiation image of the object in accordance with the entire area image signal.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种用于图像计算机辅助诊断的设备,包括用于存储表示对象的辐射图像的全区域图像信号的全区域图像存储器,以及用于根据所述辐射图像检测预期异常模式的预期异常模式检测装置。 整个区域的图像信号。 判断装置根据由预想异常模式检测装置进行的预想异常模式的检测结果来判断预想异常模式的有无。 在判断装置判断存在预期异常图案的情况下,局部区域提取装置从已经存储在整体中的整个区域图像信号中提取与包含预期异常图案的局部区域相对应的局部区域受限图像信号。 区域图像内存。 局域限定图像显示装置根据局域提取装置提取的局域限定图像信号显示局部区域的图像。 整面图像显示装置根据整面图像信号显示被检体的放射线图像的整面。

标题: Low cost method employing time slots for thwarting fraud in the periodic issuance of food stamps, unemployment benefits or other governmental human services
摘要: Upon monthly revalidation of a benefit, the client's pin is read off of the client's benefit card and a PC produces a time slot assigned to the client who receives a food benefit allocation for the month only if the current date and time of day is within his assigned time slot. Since the assigned time slot is only 1-2 hours each month, and since the card holder stands in line, he simply doesn't have time to collect two food benefit allocations from two separated issue stations. He can't get a second food benefit card with a different time slot because the assigned time slot is tied to his unchanging biometric characteristics. However, since the time slots at each issue station are synchronized, he can report to any issue station for convenience. Transfer of a second fraudulently obtained card to an accomplice is thwarted by ink jet printing the applicant's facial image on the benefit card when issued, or using the pin to display his facial image on a CRT.
摘要(译)(简体中文): 在福利的每月重新生效后,客户的密码从客户的福利卡上读取,并且 PC 产生一个分配给客户的时间段,只有当当前日期和时间在他的时间范围内时,该客户才会收到当月的食品福利分配 分配的时间段。 由于每个月分配的时间段只有1-2小时,而且由于持卡人要排队,他根本没有时间从两个分开的发放站领取两份食品福利分配。 他无法获得第二张具有不同时间段的食品福利卡,因为分配的时间段与他不变的生物特征相​​关联。 但是,由于每个发布站的时间段是同步的,他可以方便地向任何一个发布站报告。 将第二张以欺诈方式获得的卡转移给同谋时,会通过在发放的福利卡上喷墨打印申请人的面部图像,或使用 pin 在 CRT 上显示他的面部图像来阻止。
发明人: KUHNS, ROGER J. | NATHANS, ROBERT L.

标题: Frequency compensation method for use in speech analysis apparatus
法律状态/事件: 未缴年费 | 权利转移

标题: 用於網路文件閱覽工具之方法及系統
摘要: 一種於電腦網路輔助使用者透過電腦網路以最少文件妨礙集合形成文件之方法及系統。最初，文件顯示於電腦網路之電腦圖形介面，該文件也顯示於電腦網路之眾多電腦之任一者。其次，部分文件由使用者標示可能加附註。此等部分文件自動關聯可顯示介面，其中使用者可進入有關該文件的註釋。然後，可顯示介面回應於使用者的輸入於圖形介面顯示。然後，許可使用者於可顯示介面進入文件關聯註釋，故註釋可分開儲存，隨後被檢索及用於形成文件而無需叢集。然後當文件相關註釋於可顯示介面之載入完成時，可顯示介面自動關閉。
摘要(译)(简体中文): 一种于电脑网路辅助使用者透过电脑网路以最少文件妨碍集合形成文件之方法及系统。 最初,文件显示于电脑网路之电脑图形介面,该文件也显示于电脑网路之众多电脑之任一者。 其次,部分文件由使用者标示可能加附注。 此等部分文件自动关联可显示介面,其中使用者可进入有关该文件的注释。 然后,可显示介面回应于使用者的输入于图形介面显示。 然后,许可使用者于可显示介面进入文件关联注释,故注释可分开储存,随后被检索及用于形成文件而无需丛集。 然后当文件相关注释于可显示介面之载入完成时,可显示介面自动关闭。

标题: 物體觀測方法及使用其方法之物體觀測裝置,以及使用此裝置之交通流量測量裝置及停車場觀測裝置
摘要:
（目的）
以高精確度觀測標的物體為目的。（構成）
將兩台攝影機3a、3b以其光軸平行朝向道路1 之狀態在道路1 之上方作縱向併列配置。攝影機3a、3b同時所攝取之影像乃輸入於控制處理裝置4 。控制處理裝置4就各攝影機送來之影像中抽出水平方向之邊緣成份後，對邊緣構成點進行影像間之對應關係定位處理，自該對應關係定位結果算出對應各邊緣構成點之三維座標。另外，控制處理裝置4 沿著各車道設定假想垂直平面，並將前述之各三維座標點投影於此假想垂直平面上。將此投影結果與記憶於內部記憶體之側面形狀模型比較，並自該比較結果辨別車道上之車輛種類及位置。
摘要(译)(简体中文):
(目的) 
 以高精确度观测标的物体为目的。  (构成) 
 将两台摄影机3a、3b以其光轴平行朝向道路1 之状态在道路1 之上方作纵向并列配置。 摄影机3a、3b同时所摄取之影像乃输入于控制处理装置4 。 控制处理装置4就各摄影机送来之影像中抽出水平方向之边缘成份后,对边缘构成点进行影像间之对应关系定位处理,自该对应关系定位结果算出对应各边缘构成点之三维座标。 另外,控制处理装置4 沿着各车道设定假想垂直平面,并将前述之各三维座标点投影于此假想垂直平面上。 将此投影结果与记忆于内部记忆体之侧面形状模型比较,并自该比较结果辨别车道上之车辆种类及位置。
